Summary: The place was so close to the beach and had a nice character feel to it without feeling too run down. It was clean and nice inside the room. They were very accommodating with my stay and even allowed me to extend my check out.

Summary Heading: Another Visit To This Funky Beach Art Motel
Summary: Stayed three nights for business and again loved the funky vibes of this mid century motel reborn with artist's California beach themes in each room. This time I was in the "Reclaimed Room" with reclaimed wood paneling and vintage surf music album covers. Its a very generous sized room and bathroom. The place was spotless. Fast internet and convenient in the sense of you didn't have to keep logging back in each day of your stay. Microwave and fridge. If you need coffee, there is a 7-11 next door. Free parking is below the motel, all the rooms are up small sets of stairs. Since my last stay, the onsite management is new, and Long and his staff are friendly &  efficient.  I appreciated that the door locks/deadbolts have been replaced and improved since last summer (I had commented
Room tip: The Reclaimed Room is a very generous sized room.

Summary Heading: Surfer Dude Decoration worked for us.
Summary: Old upstairs 'Motel' type rooms, only 6 I believe, each individually decorated in a 'Surfer Dude style'. We had room 6 for two nights (next to the PCH) and it suited our needs perfectly.  OK it's pretty basic but we liked the location, it was clean and tidy, safe and the bed was comfortable. Shower worked and we plenty of draw and cupboard space, heater worked too, didn't want to use it, but it gets cold at night during January in Huntington Beach.

We stayed in room 3 and it was wonderful! Both adults and kids loved the room theme and it was clean. We loved how close it was to the beach and the staff was very nice! They have beach chairs, towels, and toys to borrow. We will definitely stay again next time we are in town!

Coming in a little late with this review.  We stayed here for a couple of nights in November.  It’s an okay place, and our room was the only one with a view of the water across the street.  It’s older, but everything works.  Very good value overall, however it's under new ownership and I got the impression that they plan to modernize the place - I'd expect rates to go up as well.  I'd move fast if you want to stay here while it is still an inexpensive place by the beach.

We stayed here (room 4)for my daughters surf contest at Huntington Pier. It is only a few blocks north of main street so you can walk everywhere and not worry about parking.  The room was clean and beds were comfortable. The room decorations are a little funky but the room had everything we needed: refrigerator, microwave, small table with two chairs and an ocean view.  You should expect a little noise due to he motel being right on PCH. We would definitely stay here again due to the perfect location for beach access.
Room tip: I think Rooms 1-4 must have an ocean view.

Summary Heading: Friendly reception staff made our stay great
Summary: Just what we were looking for our for our trip.  We booked three rooms to fit our frisbee team that was in town for a busy weekend.  The front desk clerk was extremely helpful and accommodating to our group who arrived and checked out at different times.

When traveling, I always search for hotel that is a little different, as well as, very affordable. The Huntington Surf Inn is just the place. My family appreciated the unique decor that the small inn has to offer. Each room has its own individual style. My family stayed in the “Rock n Roll’’ themed room and we loved the vibe. The room was very clean and the beds were quite comfortable. The hotel is located right across the street from the beach and is within walking distance from many stores, restaurants and bars. However, we were most impressed with the hotel management. The owner and his manager were extremely helpful and very accommodating. We will definitely be staying there again soon!

Summary Heading: I few days on the Coast
Summary: We like Huntington Beach and the Huntington Surf Inn offerred Clean updated facitiliities a few minutes walk from the Warf just across fron the Ocean.  The people we met were friendly and clear on details.  The parking was free and great the view from the porch strait to the Ocean.
Room tip: The rooms are very clean, you We are in our 70's and found the artwork on the walls suitable...

Summary: Well equipped and spotless room. Amazing location with everything provided for a day on the beach. Short walk to restaurants etc. Easy parking. Owners helpful and very pleasant. Would recommend to couples and families.

Summary Heading: Affordable hotel with lovely towels and toiletries
Summary: Nothing fancy here, but my husband loved the KISS mural on the wall for his birthday. All the little touches make this place special- beach toys, towels, chairs, umbrellas- nice thick towels ( and plenty of them) in the bathroom- clean, nice showers, - great toiletries, too. Bed not too fancy but did the job, and plenty of pillows as well, which is much appreciated! Microwave and fridge provided. Will definitely stay again!!

This little gem is affordable in a great location. Loved having the beach so close and access to their sand toys and boogie boards for the kids. We stayed in room 6 and the shower was huge with insane water pressure. The little fridge was great for a few snacks. Short walk to Main Street and all the restaurants. We ate at Duke’s and sushi/shabu on Main Street.

The room was very clean, the hosts were friendly + accommodating, what a great stay. We will be back.   x2 :) The room was very clean, the hosts were friendly + accommodating, what a great stay. We will be back.

Nice cute little place where you can sit on patio and watch sunset.And walk across street to the beach.  Definitely not for handicap or elderly as there is no elevator. The do provide Beach towels, beach chairs, umbrellas and boogie boards and sand toys. It’s walking distance to Main st. No continental breakfast or coffee. However 7/11 is next door. We come to this hotel annually and choose it because of it’s location.

Loved our stay here! Lots of great places around and a quick walk to any of them! Staff was friendly and helpful with great recommendations! Rooms were clean and parking was a perk as well. Will plan to stay again in the future!

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in HB.
Summary: You won’t find a better location right on the PCH and so close to the pier and Main Street. The accommodations are amazing and they even have beach chairs and umbrellas in each room. Plus there is a patio overlooking the PCH with a great sunset view. Sand toys and boogie boards for the kids or big adult kids. :-) The staff are very friendly and the price is amazing given where the Inn is situated. We will definitely be back. Thank you from Wisconsin.

I saw on another review site a bunch of one star reviews, I choose to ignore them because of the location. I will never ignore 1 star reviews again, the manager and wife were not nice people to deal with. Very unfriendly and unhelpful. I go to HB a lot and I'm happy to pay top dollar, but I do expect top dollar service. Zero chance I will ever spend another dollar there.

Right across from the beach, close to downtown restaurants.    2*hotel that I would give a 5* rating.  Could even watch the sunset from the patio.  Loved that an umbrella and beach chairs and towels provided.

I just loved it here. Such a great place. Definitely going again. I took this pic there. The couple that oversee the place are fantastic. Only thing is the TV didn't work well as the internet was very slow

Renee and William were wonderful hosts. They are very friendly, helpful and responsive.  The location of the Surf Inn is very convienient to the beach (right across the street).   The Huntington Beach Pier is three blocks south, restaurants, bars and shopping are all a short walk away. All this for the most reasonable price in town!  Although the rooms are not posh or upscale, they are very clean, comfortable and provide everything a person really needs. For me that includes a refrigerator, great shower, TV and a comfortable bed. As far as an ocean view goes, some of the rooms have a view. But, just step outside any room onto the walkway/balcony for an impressive view of ocean surf and the most spectacular sunsets one could hope for.  One amenity that is very helpful is in every

We stayed here for 3 nights and it was great!  The staff was very kind and the room service worked very well. The beds were always well made and the trash cans were empty.   The patio is lovely and you have a wonderful view on the beach and the pacific! There are different tables and chair to spend your time there, eating, relaxing or chatting.   The air conditioner cools the room down greatly over the day and it’s usable over night too.  Overall the stay here was wonderful and we would highly recommend it to others!

The place is clean, and cozy.  Super close to all things: beach, food, shopping.  Takes more time to get to your car at large resorts then this does to walk to what you desire.  I would stay again with out hesitation.

Summary Heading: New Ownership, New Management, No Fun
Summary: If you’ve been a long-time guest of the HSI just know that it is no longer the HSI you’re used to, it’s under new ownership and management and it’s not the chill place for adults anymore. Please note, this is our seventh or eighth stay with the HSI. No more early check-in (even 30 minutes early, even if the room is ready), no more enjoying a drink and smoke on the deck, and no more rooms for under $200. It is well noted that this is a “FAMILY ESTABLISHMENT.” Be prepared to be met with about six signs informing you of all you cannot do before you even speak to an actual person.   Check in is at 3:00 p.m., we arrived at 2:34 p.m. and expected to check-in (most hotels allow a 26 minute early check-in), but were met with a hand-written note that read something like Check-in is at

Simple and clean room with a lovely staff, the room also came with beach chairs, towels and an umbrella. We needed it just for a couple nights and didn’t spend much time in the room, and it was perfect! We would definitely recommend this.

My family of stayed for 2 nights in room 6.  We loved the free parking as California is expensive!  This place isn’t fancy,  and it doesn’t need to be.  It’s not $600+ like some other beach front hotels.  Great location across from the beach and walking distance to the town and pier. Room was clean, beds were comfy. I liked the sky light in the bathroom as the room was really dark at night. We gashed our legs multiple times on the sharp metal corners of the bed. Having 4 suitcases made it a bit difficult to navigate around the room. The deck was great to sit out on while family got ready or to give you a place to relax. Beach towels and chairs were appreciated! Only con was the air conditioner which was quite loud while you’re sleeping. It did drown out any road noise! Would

The room was very neat and clean. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The best thing about this place is it’s right across the street from the beach, which makes it perfect if you’ve got kiddos with you. It’s within walking distance of eateries and shopping. Definitely check it out!

Super chill spot right across from the beach. Would stay again. Room 9 has no neighbors and a view of the beach, plus iron, hair dryer, beach towels, wifi... Didn't use the free parking but it would have been very convenient if we had a car.

Summary Heading: Funky Art Motel In Great Location
Summary: Stayed in this family run motel for several nights- its a 70's era motel renovated into art themed rooms.  Bathrooms completely renovated. Place super clean and comfortable, a small fridge & micro, and parking was free of charge. A quick walk to the beach, a coffee place, a taco place, and to the HB downtown shopping area and pier.  There is a cute seating area outside on the upper deck, and even beach towels and beach toys to loan out. Two small improvements suggested are: 1. the labels on all the various controls of the room a/c unit have rubbed off and so you have to guess what button does what - refreshed labels, or even just a little diagram would be nice.  2. The salt air has done a number on the room door/lock/frame - suggest a little more of a robust door

Fantastic location across from the beach and near Main Street Huntington with all the restaurants and surf shops, it was very clean, epic surf themed rooms, and the bed was soooo comfortable. For the price, you can’t beat this place. Will be back for sure!

Summary Heading: Cute cozy place with parking and short walk to beach and pier.
Summary: Rooms are individually decorated as beach and surfing themes. Great owners who are new as we have been coming here for years. Upgraded towels and toiletries on last visit. Parking is under cover and near rooms. Great balcony facing beach. Love this place!

I just bought a house 2 blocks away and my 2 year old son had to use the bathroom. They refused my 2 year old son to use their restroom and now I know where NOT to advice my guest to stay when they’re in town. Refusing a child is just heartless I’m speechless!

We had a really nice stay at the Huntington Surf Inn. The top priority for us is comfortable beds, which they were. We were a bit worried about street noise from the PCH as it was loud during the day, but it quieted down quite a bit at night (I brought earplugs as well).  We were in town to attend a surf contest across the street, so the location  (and decor) was perfect. Regarding the location, we loved that we could walk to Dukes Restaurant for dinner, and 602 Coffee House for breakfast. The couple running this hotel were really nice. We used the provided beach chairs and umbrella, a nice touch. Another plus was the parking spot, and that we were allowed to park there a little longer on our checkout day. Would definitely stay here again.

My husband, toddler and I stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn last weekend and had the best time! The location is perfect, right on PCH and across the street from Huntington Beach. We were met with a view of the beach as soon as we opened our door in the morning! The parking situation is very convenient, as there are parking spaces for guests provided under the Inn. Our room was very clean, with a comfortable bed, refrigerator and microwave, and cute beach decor. They provided beach towels and chairs in the room that we were able to use. On the patio (common area), there are boogie boards and beach toys that you you can borrow as well. The customer service was excellent. This spot is a gem, and we have already been talking about returning for another weekend getaway.

Summary Heading: Great view, good location, super clean
Summary: I stayed in room 1 this past Friday. Truly unparalleled view of the ocean from the front window. The room was exceptionally clean (carpet in particular—which is unusual in hotels). It was a 5-10 min walk to the main strip of shops, and it’s literally right next to coffee 602 which is super convenient. Front desk staff is present on site 24 hours a day and very nice to boot. There’s also easy parking on site. I would stay here again.

Stayed for 1 night over Easter with my family.  Nice clean rooms and close to everything. It was a Friday night with lots of traffic along the roadway, so some noise to be aware of into the evening.  We were in Room 3 which was a rock n roll Kiss theme. Would recommend this hotel if you want to be close to the action.

We stayed here for 2 nights. The room was comfortable and clean! The location is unbeatable and just minutes to the pier, beach, and restaurants. We also had an ocean view from our room. There is obviously noise from the highway but it quiets down at night. Great service from Renee, who accommodated us as we were dealing with the awkward time between checking out of one hotel and checking into this one. We would stay here again!

We stayed in Room 1 which had a good view but considerable road noise.  The shower has been remodeled and the room was clean.  The bed is a mattress on a steel frame which was adequate. The location is great as the pier and lots of restaurants are walking distance.  602 Coffee, CVS, and tacos are extremely close by.  Parking was free and it was nice that beach chairs, umbrella  and a towel were in the room to use. Room 9 is very nice - I would NOT recommend Room 8 as it is in the back with only one window in the bathroom. Cute surf themed rooms.  There is no room for them to store your luggage if you get there before 4 pm chec-kin and do not have a car. For the price - a good stay.

The rooms are super cute!  Everyone is super nice and the checkin process was easy!  Great location! Across from the beach and about two blocks to the pier.  I will definitely stay here again when i come back to HB!

Summary Heading: Best stay in the area. No cars needed!
Summary: This was the perfect get away in huntington.  The rooms are very clean which is a huge thing for me. It is so convenient and an easy walk to everything you could need.  Right next to the best coffee and tacos in Huntington.  Walk right across the road and your on the beach. Pier is right there! They even provide chairs and other beach accessories you can bring to the beach.  Such a great view from their deck too, perfect sunsets everyday.  I will be bringing my wife with me next year and definitely staying here again! Perfect place to bring your family.

. Honestly, the worst hotel I’ve ever stayed in.   No ventilation in the bathroom (no window nor did the extractor fan work) leaving the bathroom misty after taking a shower and leaving it smelly. Beds were extremely uncomfortable, might as well have slept on their sun loungers. The room was covered in dust. Under the beds were filthy with dirt and looked like they had been forgotten about for years.  AND the worst part of the stay were the hotel managers.  Completely unprofessional, rude, and dramatic about everything! Good luck with getting clean towels.  We practically had to threaten to leave and call the owners to receive them. The woman (we’ll call her “the wife” since she refused to give us her name) was over the top. If you were unhappy about anything she took it as a

Stayed here for two nights to attend a friend’s memorial service. Great location, clean and the management staff were very friendly and accommodating. Will stay again. Thank you for making a difficult journey easier.

We stayed in room 2 "Tropical" room and it was amazing. Can't wait for another trip to try other rooms. The couple that run this small (only 9 rooms) were great, inviting, and very helpful with our last day with things to see before our LATE flight. The room was very clean and the walk in shower was very nice, better than stepping over a tub wall. The shared balcony has a wonderful view to sip coffee and tea on in the morning while watching the surf roll in. We will definitely come back and stay again.

The Huntington Surf Inn offers clean, cozy, and affordable rooms. The location is steps from the beach and walking distance to multiple restaurant and bars! Each room is also equipped with some beach chairs and towels.

We stayed in room 2.  The tropical room.  It was very clean.  Adorable motif.  Great shared balcony overlooking the beautiful ocean.  Owners were super cool.  We checked in a little later than we anticipated because of a delayed flight.  No issue at all.  There is a some traffic noise because you are literally on PCH so that is totally expected.  Great location.  Close to the pier and a crosswalk so you can safely cross PCH to get to the beach.  We will be staying there again.  Rooms are a little small if you have more than 2 people.  But with the beach right there I can't imagine that you would be in the room often.  It also had a microwave and frig so that makes it easy to have snacks.

Renee and her husband run this place  like a champ. Attentive, friendly, and great people all the way around. Price is fair, rooms are clean, and the location  is perfectly close to everything in the area.  We booked 2 rooms me and my friend, and we both left happy and looking forward to come back.  Joe

Spendid view of the Pacific Ocean. Everything you need for a pleasant stay is right inside the room. Friendly staff. Wonderful decks. Walking distance to resturants and bars of downtown Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Great little treasure right on the beach!
Summary: We stayed in room #6 at the Huntington Surf Inn. It was super clean and the beds were comfy. Room was a bit small for our family of 4, but if you're there for the beach/other local activities like us, you're hardly in the room anyway. There is also a nice deck with a perfect view of the sunrise and sunset! We definitely plan to stay there again!

This was not the first time I have stayed here and will not be my last.   The managers went above and beyond to make my stay perfect. The room was great with a beautiful view and the balcony was perfect to enjoy the views of the beach. Thank you!

Summary Heading: It's like an iconic hotel right in the heart of Huntington Beach
Summary: The location of the hotel was perfect, being right across the street from Huntington Beach (the pier and beach).  The room was spacious, clean with a nice updated tiled shower.  It's owned by a husband and wife, so we were happy to be supporting a small business.  The beds were comfy, the room was not only clean , but we really loved the vibe!  Each room has its own theme.  Parking isn't a problem as there's parking underneath and it's included.  The tv was nice, the heating/cooling unit worked well and had a fan function if you like white noise, lol.  The price was perfect, fair and it all exceeded our expectations!

Summary Heading: New favorite hotel in So Cal
Summary: Amazing value for location.  A little outdated but that's part of the charm and everything was very clean/well maintained.  Owners and staff very friendly.  Will be staying here when I come back to visit.

We have stayed here a couple times.  It is right across from the beach, main street and where our daughter lives.  We just need a place to sleep at night and this fits the bill.  The managers are friendly and accommodating.  We love that this is available for us when we come.  It is a hidden treasure.

Summary Heading: Adorable little inn on the beach
Summary: This adorable inn had everything I needed. No fancy other fluff, just a room and free parking. Did I mention free parking? The office personnel are super warm & inviting. And they had a wonderful military discount. I would definitely stay here again. There’s bars @ shoppes not even half a mile away so there’s thing to do. Plus, the beach is literally across PCH 1. It was an amazing stay and I will be back. Thanks!

It was a nice hotel. It wasn’t extraordinary, but we had a good stay. We really liked the buckets and shovels for sand as well as the umbrella, body boards, and beach chairs that were provided. The hotel is also only a short walk from the beach, which was nice.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The staff was helpful and friendly and we loved the little balcony to hang out on. The themed rooms are fun (and clean!)  Super close to the downtown shopping area and of course the beach across the street. It does get a little noisy with PCH right there but its not bad. We will definitely stay here again if we are in the area!

This place was great!!! Good friendly service, clean room and bathroom, easy check in and out, great for the price and good location. Nice art on walls also. Easy convenient parking… fairly affordable considering being pretty close to the pier

I must say first and foremost the staff here is amazing. The hotel is in a great location and rooms are clean. Only issues we had was someone tried to steal our bikes in the parking garage. They cut our locks but someone must have caught them because our bikes where on the ground not on our rack that was locked up. Also the A/C unit went haywire the 2nd night but I believe it was because of the power outages due to a thunderstorm… also we arrived during the biggest oil spill in HB. In 20 years.. so our trip was already off to a bad start.  we went to Bolsa Chica State beach just north of the pier… be careful my son stepped on a stingray which caused us to just want to leave HB… also be careful at night lots of homeless now, my daughter saw a man overdose right in front of the

This place was so great, the staff was very friendly and the location was awesome! Our room looked out to the beach. My boyfriend and I are surfers and we enjoyed being able to wake up and look at the waves. Perfect location and would definetly come back again!!

I treated myself to a short de-stressor trip to Huntingon Beach to take in the US Open of Surfing. Didn't want to spend a lot since I was on my own and wouldn't be in the room for long but, wanted to feel safe since I was alone.  I also wanted to be within walking distance of Main street and the pier. The Huntington Surf Inn fit the bill perfectly! Such a cute place with it's themed rooms and cozy patio with an ocean view - perfect place to watch the sunset and enjoy a little happy hour. My room was very clean and appointed with all the necessities. The staff was very friendly and helpful too. I will definitely be back and stay longer next time!

If you’re looking for a rustic, no frills, beach location, this is your spot! Our room was clean and the location was within walking distance to anything you may need. It was a nice perk to have beach chairs, towels and an umbrella included with each room. Barbara was a pleasure to work with! We would definitely stay here again!

Easy check in, super friendly staff & location was awesome . Had everything we needed & were allowed to use beach equipment for the day after we checked out. Thanks so much. Would definitely recommend staying here.                                                          Jen & friends :)

Amazing location to the city and beach. The price is great compared to there with the same access to downtown and the beach. 200’ from the beach. Two blocks from downtown. They have a great lounging deck over looking the ocean. The staff is awesome. However…The carpet was very gross in multiple rooms, almost at squishy. All the rooms I went into smelled like wet outside, carpet or mold. But the rooms and beds were nice. Even though they looked worn out. Right on PCH so the road noise was very loud almost 24/7. Didn’t get a lot of sleep.

The staff were really helpful and wanted to see that my boyfriend and I had a good time.  The room was clean and all the beach kit was provided. There is also a mini fridge in the room which kept our beer nice and cold.

Summary Heading: Like being home. One of the last few smaller, beach hotels of it's kind.
Summary: Love this place. Coming back from living in Europe every couple of years this is exactly what I need. Directly on the Pacific Coast Highway, beach just over the street, and Main Street and the pier just 4 streets away. 5 minute walk to restaurants, bars, and stores, and only 5 minutes walk back to the comfortable hotel to leave the crowds and bustle again behind for a peaceful relaxing time. Sit on the sundeck, or walk across to the beach and walk or swim. Very clean and kept up, rooms all different and individually decorated in various surfstyle designs. Free parking is great since you do not even need to use your car when here. Tried a few other places around here over the years just to save a few bucks, even though the prices here are great, but was dissapointed by the

We had a wonderful beach vacation due to the hospitality of Huntington Surf Inn. Our original reservation was for a king bed room, but they gladly switched us to the double queen bed room when we asked, at no additional charge! The manager/owner even helped carry our bags up the stairs and would not accept any gratuity.  The rooms are clean and comfortable and a 7/11 is next door for any last minute needs! Just across the Pacific Coast Highway from the beach and  conveniently located a few blocks from the Huntington Beach Pier and numerous restaurants.

My go to place to stay when hitting the beach in SoCal. I discovered this little gem at the beginning of 2019, and I'm glad I did.   This was my 4th time here & longest stay, 5 nights. The customer service goes above and beyond. Barbara is becoming like family. In a world where this type of service is becoming a lost art, this crew nails it. Constantly cleaning, tending to the property & checking to make sure you have what you need.   As long as this little gem is here, it will be my go to! Sunsets from the deck are just the icing on the cake!

Amazing location for anyone focused on being at the beach or in the water.  Free use of beach chairs and umbrella.  Patio area with amazing view of the ocean. Friendly  staff and comfortable rooms.  We will be back.

Our family stayed here for three days, taking two of the rooms. We loved being so close to the beach (a walk across the street), the downtown dining and close proximity to Balboa (where we shopped one day).  The place was cute, quaint and clean.  We sat on the deck each night sipping wine and watching the sunset.  We will definitely come for another family mini-vacation getaway !

Summary Heading: Great stay in my favorite place!
Summary: We stayed for 2 nights & would’ve stayed longer if they weren’t booked solid. The rooms are all decorated so nice & unique, the shower is spacious and everything is clean. Located right across the street from the beach and everything else is within walking distance. I can’t wait to visit again!

We loved our stay. The hotel is smaller and each room is unique. The staff and hotel in general had a more personal feel as a result  We loved the shared balcony that overlooks the ocean. We had breakfast on it, and watched the sunset, it was also close enough to our room that we were able to go out and hang out after the kids were asleep. They had beach chairs, beach towels and boogie boards and sand toys that are shared with other guests. The bathroom was bigger than I expected and the shower was perfect for getting sand off of our kids. Also the location was perfect as it is right across the street from the beach and an on beach playground. The hotel doesn't provide breakfast (but has a refrigerator and lots of local places to get breakfast), a laundry room or an ice machine.

Summary Heading: Great location, amazing staff and well appointed
Summary: This place is a gem. The rooms are well appointed with everything you need. Including beach towels, chairs and umbrella. The staff is attentive, courteous and helpful. The location cannot be beat. Walking distance to everything Huntington Beach has to offer. Having the deck to relax on at the end of the day was perfect. Onsite free parking is a bonus!

It was a great location to stay at. It is very close to the beach and the pier. Just a few minutes away walking distance. The room is very comfortable. It’s also a pretty clean and calm property. 7 eleven, cvs, and other places to eat is near by as well.

We reserved a room at this hotel solely based on the excellent reviews it has received. We were unable to stay in the room I selected (due to activity of prior guests) so we were offered another room, which we accepted. They allowed us to check in an hour early, which we very much appreciated after a long morning of travel (flight, etc.) The room was very clean and the beds and pillows super comfortable! We loved that they had beach chairs, a beach umbrella and beach towels in the room. If you have kids, there are some beach toys on the deck you can grab on your way! We loved being able to sit on the common deck and watch the sunset as well as drink our coffee and eat our breakfast. The sunset view from up there was absolutely gorgeous! There was a GREAT little coffee shop about

This place is so cute and so close to many fun shops, excellent restaurants and of course the BEACH!  Great family feel and customer care! We have already booked our next stay in August!  Thank you Barbara!

Rooms are quaint and clean!  Staff is amazing and very kind. Love the deck for watching the sunset! Great for people watching too.  located close to shopping and many dining options. Next to a 7 eleven where some riff raff hang out but you can avoid it by walking north on 8th street.

This was the best stay! Super convenient that the beach is right across the street along with all the restaurants and shopping area. Comfortable beds, they provided beach towels and an umbrella when we went to the beach. Had my 6 week new born baby and it was really nice to have the room across the street from the beach and shopping area when we needed to change and feed her. Friendly staff. Will definitely be back!

My boyfriend and I came down to Huntington for a one day vacay! This Inn was directly across the street from the beach, and just a 6-7 minute walk to the pier. Beautiful location!  It was the the cutest little location to stay in. Clean and friendly staff. Definitely will be coming back here next time we come into town!!

Summary Heading: nice, clean, quiet place, and convenient location
Summary: We stayed at #5 for just one night but it was perfect. The rooms was clean, we didn't have annoying noises, and the people at the office were very nice.  The terrace is a lovely place to see the sunrise and sunset and to people watch.

Comfortable quant hotel.  But the location,   Across PCH from beach- 7 min walk to pier or Main Street.   Free parking-  beach toys-chairs and umbrella.  Frig and micro in the room.   Hidden gem!!  And the price is hard to beat.  Not the Ritz, but really how much time are you spending in the room.  Each room is a different theme and we stayed in room 2.  Noise from PCH was no issue- in fact very quiet in the morning until about 9 or so.

Great staff! Barbara was very accommodating! Rooms are clean and well equipped with a microwave and mini fridge, chairs, umbrella, and beach towels. The street noise can be loud in rooms 1 and 2 but no big deal! Great deck with an ocean view and covered parking!

We knew what we were looking for, which was a clean and affordable (for HB that is), place to stay for the weekend.  The Huntington Surf Inn met our expectations.  The onsite parking, the little deck/patio area, the themed rooms, all were great.  The room was clean and comfortable, and the location was just a short walk from all the downtown HB had to offer.  The 7-11 next door had what we needed, and although there are some interesting characters hanging out on the streets of HB, there was never a time that we did not feel safe.  We will likely stay here again if we return for this type of trip.

My family and I loved this spot. Nice a clean plus really nice staff. The location is also great right next to the beach. I highly recommend it! Next time we plan to come back to Huntington Beach we’ll stay there again it was that hospitable!

Summary Heading: Checked out early! Don’t waste your money.
Summary: This place has an excellent location.  Other than a great location and nice big shower with clean restroom, it was dingy.  I went with my husband, 5 and 7 year old. My kids even said they didn’t like the room.  The carpet was filthy! You can smell it when you walked in.  The pillows were lumpy and uncomfortable.  The heater didn’t work well, kept us up all night.  The blanket and sheets were dingy.  No drawers to put clothes in.  We had a horrible experience! As soon as my girls woke up we checked out.

The room was nice, clean and affordable! Loved the theme in our room! The location was great and perfect for us and our little to enjoy! Walking distance to downtown, pier and park! If your not looking for luxury but more of a beachside family vibe this is definitely the place for you! 100% will recommend and will be staying here again in any future visit❤️

Summary Heading: The "beach friendly" heart of Huntington Beach
Summary: From the check-in to the check-out everyone was friendly, helpful, and relaxed.  There is a comfortable patio in the front of the hotel overlooking the ocean and Pacific Coast Hwy that is a great place to watch the sunset and have a drink.  The rooms are cozy and clean  and the beds are very comfortable.   They even provide beach chairs, towels and umbrellas to use during your stay. My main reason for visiting was to bring my grandson to fish on the pier.  The room was perfect for the two of us.  But the best thing for me was the location.  You can easily walk to the pier and Main Street in 5 minutes.   If you stay here you are close to the heart of everything happening in Huntington Beach.

We wanted something close to the shore and downtown area near the Pier when in Huntington Beach.  Typically I'm a loyal brand follower for hotels but decided to roll the dice and try Surf Inn.    As mentioned in other reviews its an older hotel.  The rooms are very basic and a bit dated, but is that really why you are staying here (for the hotel?).  Probably not.  What sets this place apart is the location.  Right on Pacific Coast Highway, and about 2 blocks from the downtown area next to the pier.  Easy walking distance to everything.    The customer service also sets this place apart.  Very friendly, wants you to get the most out of your stay at the hotel and area.  Very flexible for us in terms of check in and check out.  The type of ownership you root for and want to do

although the rooms are simple... fridge-freezer, microwave.  each is unique. Barbara made us feel at home from the start. there is a cool deck to watch the sunset and unlike most places...... they dont charge for parking, you feel like a guest. you can walk to anything you might need, we enjoyed our stay very much and will be back !! the comfort of the bed was better than expected.

This is a no bells or whistles kind of place, but at the same time, a very unique and cool vibe in the heart of HB.  It is more than enough for basic needs; microwave, mini fridge, and definitely walkable to most places you're going to want to go. The beach is just across the street, a great coffee house is a walk to the corner, and Main Street a few blocks away.  Do know the place is older, and has been remodeled and revamped several times, so the Hyatt Regency, it is not. If I had to give one bad knock it would be the carpet. I have stayed in 2 different rooms over the years, and in both rooms the carpets were very dirty and sticky in spots. Not a deal breaker; I just put down beach towels down (that they provide) during my stay, and I was good to go. Other than that, I cannot

This hotel has great charm, is clean, and within a few blocks of many places to eat including the beautiful pier and beach across the street. Also peaceful location, friendly staff, and within 15 minutes to John Wayne airport.

Great location and Danny was very helpful with booking and recommending places to see, the patio they have made breakfast with a few so cute , my boyfriend and I had an amazing time here and it was great that they provided us with beach towels and chairs

We very much enjoyed our stay.  The hotel is old but very cute.  Has everything you need except for a coffee pot, but there is a great coffee place a 2-minute walk away, not to mention a good taco joint there, too, so wasn't an issue for us.  Has chairs and umbrella for the beach and a lovely viewing deck with seating where you can enjoy the sunsets.  Check-in was easy.  Front desk gal great and very friendly.  And the best part was the location.  Once we parked our car, that was it for driving which is exactly what I wanted.  We walked everywhere.  This hotel is directly across the street from miles of beach as far as the eye can see, minutes from the pier and downtown for shopping and dining.  We will definitely be back!

The best location if you want to hang at the beach or main st, you get the real experience of downtown H.B like the locals down to the decor of the rooms. For me I loved it as it brought back so many memories as I grew up right down the street being able to just walk or ride my bike to the water. Plus there is no silly addition fees when you arrive not even parking fees. Can’t wait to go back.

My two teenaged kids and I loved our stay and our room. It was neat, clean and well stocked with all the beach essentials including beach towels, chairs, umbrella and even castle building toys. One is never too old to build sand castles!   The staff is friendly,  accommodating and always smiling! We will definitely be back again!

We loved our 2 night, 3 day stay at Huntington Surf Inn! My mom was visiting from Minnesota and loves Huntington Beach. During this pandemic, it’s been a weird time, but it actually turned out to be one of the best times with family that I’ve had. Thank you Huntington Surf Inn for a welcoming stay. We will for sure be back!

Great hotel, awesome location. Quaint, in need of finishing touches(outer blinds in rm 9 didn't work so we couldn't enjoy the view, and bed posts at end of bed were jagged on the top so I have bleeding shins! ) overall a nice room with a great location if you're looking for quaint surfer-feel rather than elegance

Love the deck for sunset and early mornings.  Always good to see Barbara, so sweet and my family adores her :)  Think I have stayed in almost every room but #1 is my favorite with the front window and the All American with the surfer astronaut.

This place is absolutely wonderful!!  This isn’t a five star posh hotel and they aren’t pretending to be.  What they are is such a cool, surfer vibe hotel.  The manager, Barbara, is absolutely the best. She goes out of her way to make guests feel welcome and comfortable.  Our room had a comfortable king size bed, microwave, mini fridge, flat screen tv, iron & board, little table and 2 chairs, dressers, 2 beach towels and 2 beach chairs (yes, to use on the public beach). The only thing I would have wanted was a coffee maker but with the 7-11 being next door, it was fine.  Bathroom was well stocked with linens. Important to me is that the place was clean!!  The deck is great for sunset views and of course people watching.  And the very best is the location!  Across the street from

I truly appreciated the hospitality shown to us by the manager!!  She was always smiling and took care of me and my nephews who were visiting from out of town.  I love the quick access to the beach and dining and my car was parked right under our rooms so it was extremely convenient.   The hotel has only 9 rooms and is very quaint, clean, and cozy and above all the property is unique.  At night the AC was very cold so we got a great night's sleep bundled under the warm blankets. The price was great and we were close to all the action being only two blocks from Main Street and Huntington Pier.  Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable and above all for making it a personal experience for us as well.  The recommendations to the best local bike rentals and restaurants were

Summary Heading: Perfect Weekend Stay for a Beach Getaway
Summary: Our stay at this hotel room was just right.  It's not fancy, but has cool surfer decor and it was very clean and comfortable.  Very friendly staff!  We didn't have maid service the next morning, however that is not necessary for us and if you need extra towels, you can just ask the front desk.  The hotel is pretty small with roughly 9 rooms, so it has that personal touch to it.  There is a 7 / 11 right next to it in case you need ice or other supplies.  Just a short walk across the street and you are at the beach, perfect.

Summary Heading: I’m in love with this hotel!!!
Summary: What an AMAZING place to stay. 5 mintue walk to the Huntington Beach Pier. The management team was absolutely amazing and accommodating with any of our needs. Great pricing for the location.   I must add... the rooms are awesome. Each room has its own theme which added to the uniqueness of the hotel. I will definitely be back and recommend this gem to everyone at home.   Thank you again Huntington Surf Inn

I thought paying $185/night would give me a decent hotel with amenities but not the case here. Admittedly it was a rushed booking and I wanted something on the PCH but I would not have paid more than $100/night for this place. Our room was very dated and basic, no USB plug in points and the microwave looked like it belonged in a dolls house it was so small! Office staff was extra friendly though and knowledgeable to the area but that was our only high point. Look around, I’m sure you can do much better in quality for this price point.

My husband and I decided at the last minute to book a room in Huntington Beach. We booked the last room available that night and can I just say IMPRESSED! Parking included, quiet and cute room right in the heart of it all.

We loved this hotel. It was clean, fun and had super cute rooms. We enjoyed the open deck with its ocean view. Staff was so nice and accommodating. I would highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a cool beach vibe.

I have stayed here several times and love love love this place.   Friendly, real people who are so accommodating. and how can you not like the decorated rooms!  Located walking distance from the Huntington Beach Pier with great ocean and sunset views from the patio.

Ran the Huntington beach marathon and this was the best place to stay for it. Anything you needed you could walk to and the views were stunning. I was able to walk to the marathon start line. The staff was amazing!  I will be staying here again.

Summary Heading: I will stay here again!  Fantastic people, comfortable beds, excellent location!
Summary: The owner/managers of this small property are simply fantastic people.  They made sure I was comfortable and completely satisfied.  I will absolutely stay here again.  It is close to the pier, Dukes, Main Street, 602 Coffee and awesome food and stores.  Everything in walking distance, and off street parking for the car.

Location location location. Good people. Down home. They had Plenty of heat for a very cold few days. Parking is included and when you get here you realize how important that is! Much like the motels we used to have as a norm.

Summary Heading: Neat, clean and a perfect location
Summary: We stayed in the Huntington Surf Inn a couple of days in January. Reception was super-friendly and professional, the rooms are very clean and generous in space. The decoration is surfing, surfing, surfing, but that´s exactly what you want down in Huntington - and expect in a hotel called Surf Inn :-). Location is perfect, anything relevant is only a short walking distance anway. They have a nice terrace with beach view that has cosy chairs and sofas - perfect for a glass of wine or beer as sun downer. The central location of course means some noise from the PCH, starting at about 6 in the morning. Nothing exorbitant, though, you´ll have the same in other places that are so close to the beach.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, very close to Huntington Pier
Summary: Super-friendly staff, couldn't do enough to help. Rooms are comfortable and have cool, quirky décor - our son loved it. Nice deck outside where you can sit and watch the sunset (see photo!). Would definitely stay here again.

It was perfect for walking around and getting to the pier and to town.  The rooms were comfortable and the owners were especially nice.  If staying at the Hilton is your style. The Surf probably isn’t your style. If being part of the surf beach culture is your idea of fun.  This is the nicest place to be.  Enjoyed it the first part of our  trip and came back when before leaving.  Thank you Barbara and your associates for a great place to stay.

We fell in love with this hotel! Barbara is absolutely incredible. So warm and accommodating. It feels like home. So close to so many different shops and places to eat. We had the room in the front with a beautiful view of the ocean right across the street. So romantic! I absolutely recommend staying here. Don’t take my word for it, check it out for yourself and make your own magical memories.

LOVE LOVE LOVE  2nd Christmas trip here for me Love the deck convenient parking Extremely clean Comfotable Perfect location So easy to walk to the pier, restaurants and shopping Hope to stay here every time as part of my annual holiday trip!

Summary Heading: Great value for what you get
Summary: Located right on the PCH, you can see the beach/waves from the hotel.  A couple of blocks from the pier which offers many things to do (I went out to a new spot every of my four nights.  Also rented surf boards and longboards for cheap) .  Toilet was running a bit and being near PCH it was noisy, but turning on the AC fan drowned out everything.  the room was tidy and they offered free beach towels and folding chairs.   Great value for what you get; I'd stay here again.

Terrific spot, right across from the beach and a few blocks from lots of restaurants, shopping and the pier. Clean room with beach chairs and beach towels:)  Staff could not be more accommodating, Barbara you rock!

Old motel with a hippy surfer vibe. Great location across the road from the beach and Huntington pier. Easy walk to Main Street. Beds comfy, shower pressure ok. Air conditioning noisy. We didn't have any trouble with highway noise - we were in room 4 with the astronaut

Our team rented the whole place for 10 nights and it was perfect for us. Everything was taken care of, clean and super friendly. Barbara also allowed us a late checkout as our surfing event was still running. I cannot say enough about how great the place is. Hope we get to come back again!

Only stayed In town one night and one day, hotel is very low key, room was clean and comfortable, staff was awesome, Patio deck has a great view,everything is very accessible beach, stores, restaurants.Highly recommend

I stayed at the huntington surf hotel for a race I was running. I'm an avid Marriott fan (ambassador level) so I was nervous about staying at a different brand. I loved it! The location was awesome, the staff even better, and the rooms are cozy. I will make it a point to come back and visit and wouldn't think of using another hotel.

Summary Heading: Great place for a group gathering!
Summary: Our (birthday celebration) group rented the whole place and it was nothing short of PERFECT.  The establishment (i.e. Barbara) was great; location was great and the deck worked out wonderful for a gathering spot.  Highly recommended~

Perfect location, atmosphere, views, staff, rooms and more. Thank you for being such kind, generous and wonderful hosts! We arrived a few hours before check in and the staff graciously allowed us to store our luggage and even let us take a few towels and chairs to the beach while our room was being cleaned.

Love returning here! Barbara is so sweet and lovely! The deck is the best spot to watch the sunrise, see the day start with all the beach walkers and surfers. Amazing location, can't wait to come back 😊

My two sons and I spent two nights in the Tiki room while visiting family.  Great location across from the beach and a few blocks from the pier and all the shops and restaurants on Main Street.  And Barbara was great help and made check-in and check-out simple.

The staff is very friendly and accommodating 👍 will definitely tell all my friends about this place.I especially love the sun deck. My mother and I stayed here couple times and she loved it as well because it’s very close to the pier 👍

Fantastic location and great staff. Love this place. I cannot wait to return. Rooms are very clean and deck overlooking PCH is a great chill spot. It is an easy walk to some great surf and awesome food.

Was great. Got what I think was probably the worst room, but I did book very late and it was the only one available. It was still fine but didn't have a sea view. Manageress couldn't have been friendlier or more helpful/

Perfect if you like small, low key place. Beautiful deck to see the ocean and sunset. Walk to pier and everything. Walk across the street to beach. No lobby, no pool just 2 beds and a clean upgraded bathroom.

Summary Heading: So Close to the Beach, Shops, and Restaurants
Summary: We highly recommend the Surf Inn as an affordable, well-maintained motel in a terrific location.  We could easily walk to the beach, the pier, and Duke's Huntington Beach restaurant -- so nice to be able to just park the car for free and enjoy everything on foot.  Our room (#9) was spacious and comfortable, and the front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  The only negative is that we heard more road noise than expected, although still got a good night's sleep.

Loved this Inn! Very clean, friendly staff, amazing location (we walked across the street and were in the sand) and comfortable beds. Great patio that overlooks the beach,  Only downside, we didn’t stay another night!

Such a nice and clean place with a modern surfer vibe, right across from the beach! Friendly owners and staff and all just a very short walk to shops and pier. We stay here at least a couple of nights every time we visit Huntington Beach.  Highly recommend planning your stay here! 🤙

We stayed here for a girls' trip and loved our experience! Staff was friendly and accommodating. Very affordable for such a convenient location and clean, comfortable room. Beach towels were provided, bathrooms were updated, microwave and mini fridge in the room. It is one block away from a coffee shop, across the street from the beach, and just a few blocks from Main St and Pacific City.

Summary Heading: Great location at an affordable rate
Summary: Located across the street from Hunting Beach. Near Main Street shops, restaurants, and the pier. Friendly and accommodating staff. The rooms are clean. On-site parking. Enjoyed the view from the deck.

Summary Heading: Huntington Surf Inn was a perfect cozy place!
Summary: My daughter and I stayed here because she had a surf comp and it was a perfect location. Great friendly staff. Fun decor in rooms, especially for a surf enthusiast. We are staying here again for the next competition in a few weeks. Highly recommend.

Very cute, clean and reasonably priced! Comfortable bed, too. This is a kitschy beach and surf themed hotel, right across PCH from the beach. Only two blocks from downtown Huntington Beach with upscale restaurants and shopping. Very friendly hotel staff. Glad we chose this one!

Stayed here for 3 nights with my teen son whilst visiting Dew Tour. Rooms were uniquely decorated and very clean. Staff excellent and accommodating. Our room was closest to reception and recommend dimming the lights outside room 6 as it reflected into the room making for a disturbed sleep. Other than that, highly recommended.

Summary Heading: Great place for a beach getaway
Summary: This is a great option for a trip to the beach...the hotel provides beach chairs, towels, and umbrella.  The beach is right across the street, and the pier is just a few blocks down the street from the hotel.  The room was clean and the surfing theme of the room was very unique.  The customer service was also excellent.  Highly recommended, and we would definitely stay here again!

Summary Heading: Laid-back surf-themed place in perfect location
Summary: You pay for the location, which is just perfect. The people working  there are super friendly, and we felt welcome at all times, especially with our 2,5 yr old. They even let us use their parking until 2pm after check-out, so we could go to the beach without needing to find a new spot. We stayed only one night and spend the day at the beach, so we weren’t really at the terrace or our room, which was just as advertised. I‘d say the price is good for SoCal and the location! We only had two minor issues: chlorine/sea smelling water in the shower and a stink inside our room in the morning from some sort of burning plastic (only our room had that smell, no other, so it was an unlucky coincidence), but no harm done. Would not keep us at all from returning :-) thank you for a lovely

Summary Heading: Another great stay: location and service spot on!
Summary: I had previously stayed here a few years ago and decided to return having had a great experience last time. I had another wonderful visit!!-- you cannot beat this location. I came for the beach and to surf and just chill out. You cannot get any closer to the water than from this property! The waves were great, service was attentive and timely and I had an awesome experience. I'll be back the next time I'm in the area! No sense searching for anything better, considering the value for the amazing location and customer service.

first time back to cali in 15yrs.sister recommended bc shes stayed several times and loved it too.customer service is ON POiNT! just enough to make sure you got what you need but not enough to annoy you.rooms were cleaner than any other beachside hotel ive been in.perfect.literally across the street from the water.the patio has an amazing view as well.these guys are FOR REAL. we will definitely be staying there again!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay, Great Service, Fantastic Location!
Summary: I'm late to the review party, but my husband and I stayed the first week of March 2019. We had an EXCELLENT stay here and will be returning on our next trip to Huntington. We stayed one night.  We arrived from LAX very early and took a drive up PCH to Malibu and then back to Huntington Beach. We ate breakfast on the Pier and called over to the hotel to see if we could possibly have an early check in, since we wanted to change clothes for the day. They told us our room was ready (We were in Room #1-- IMHO the best view out of all the rooms) and we drove to the hotel. Parking is easy and underneath the hotel at street level. Then you walk up the stairs to the hotel which is on the second level.   We were greeted by the manager, I am so sorry, I forgot her name, but she was AMAZING

Stayed here last weekend with some friends who have never been to California. This hotel is is prime location, close to the beaches and in between LA and SD. The staff here was amazing, beds we’re really comfy and rooms we’re super clean. Super quiet and peaceful at night too which I loved. Will definitely stay here again if I’m ever in the area!

Summary Heading: No staff present, unable to check in
Summary: Let me preface this review by stating that I was unable to complete check-in, because I waited over an hour and fifteen minutes for a staff member to show up at the check-in window, so I cannot comment on the quality of the room, its cleanliness, etc. I literally was prevented from checking into the room that I booked and paid for.  I am extremely disappointed that no staff members were present during normal business hours.   I booked a room for one night, one guest. I arrived at approximately 6:00 pm. When I arrived, I went up the stairs to the Check-In office.  When I arrived, there was a sign in the window that said “We will return at...” with a clock beneath it. The clock hands were set to 6:40 pm.  Seeing a couch nearby, directly across from the check-in window, I sat and

Perfect location and price for our short visit.  This is across the street from an excellent beach and an easy walk to Main Street.  The staff was so friendly and accommodating. And...free parking!  Happy!

Really enjoyed the location. Loved the deck and outdoor seating. Beds were comfortable.  Only complaint was the lighting. Overhead light above beds did not work and bathroom lighting could definitely have been brighter.

Summary Heading: Perfect spot for the beach area.
Summary: Nice and comfortable stay within walking distance of the pier and a children's playground on the beach.  You park, free, underneath the rooms.  We loved the outdoor porch area to sit and enjoy the view.

Charming inn on Pacific Coast Hwy in Huntington Beach within walking distance to the Pier and Main Street. The rooms are all different and decorated in adorable, unique themes. The staff is exceptional and very accommodating!! Great balcony to watch sunsets or drink morning coffee on. Will definitely stay here again when in Huntington Beach!!

My husband and I love to find small, reasonably priced, sometimes quirky, places to stay close to the beach in California. Huntington Surf Inn is perfect for us. Across the street from the beach, a few blocks from Main Street restaurants, shops, and clubs, the inn has retained the unique decor and vibes of surf and sand culture while updating its rooms and maximizing its location. I loved the view from our room and the deck a few steps away that is perfect for people and wave watching, as well as sunset viewing. Friendly and helpful staff is outstanding and makes you feel at home instantly. We've already planned out next visit!

This is my second stay at the Huntington Surf Inn. Stayed in room 1. A little noisy from the street traffic. Nice room. Short walk for coffee, shopping, restaurants, beach & pier. The staff is super friendly. Will definitely stay again. Very clean.

We were originally going to stay at one of the major chains but decided to look for something with more of a local feel. This place has it! We stayed in Room 9 and loved it. There is a great patio area to sit and watch the sunsets. It is close to the downtown area where there are great bars and restaurants. The staff is friendly and helpful. Overall we loved our stay here and would definitely come back.

Always our favorite place to stay in HB. 3 years in a row! Great location, rooms, price. Location location location.  Tuesday night street fair. Lovely staff.  Thanks Barbara. Cheers from Canada! Aaaaaaaaa!

Summary Heading: AWESOME, and great value for the price!
Summary: I hesitate to rave about this Inn, because I don't want it to booked up through 2020!   With so many establishments exaggerating how close they are to the beach, I'll tell you flat out:  you walk across the street, and you are in the sand.  Not "a few blocks away," not, "five minute drive," and even the view is unobscured by a row of beach front places - it's street, sand and surf, in that order (You can NOT beat the view from their deck)!  I have never been to a beach motel that was so close to the water, and perfectly located regarding places you might want to walk (there's a CVS a block away, and all the cute shops and places to eat are easy walking distance), while still being very affordable.  I paid 160 dollars for my room on NEW YEARS EVE.  The parking was easy, the

Great location, great price. Clean, friendly staff. Mini fridge, WiFi and microwave a plus. Fantastic location- Steps away from Main Street and the pier. No complaints. Would absolutely stay there again!

This place was perfect! There are only 9 rooms or so, which made it very quiet and cozy. I was there for a work trip (on the beach) and it was close to everything. The location couldn't be better. The price was great! My room was very clean, had a beautiful view of the ocean, adorable surf-boutique decor and very cozy bed. Parking was extremely convenient (and free!). The staff was the exceptional and even worked with me on a billing issue. I 100% recommend and will stay again in future.

Summary Heading: Reminded me of the good old days
Summary: Back when I was more of a surfer, I loved Huntington Beach. Haven't been in the neighborhood for a long time. Maybe 15 years or more.  The Surf Inn has done a great job preserving the best of my memories. Rooms are great. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Overall it's just a great vibe.  I wouldn't stay anywhere else.

Stayed a night at this awesome property. Staff were super friendly, the room was clean and comfortable with lots of space. Excellent views of the ocean And so close to everything. We will definitely be visiting again.

The Huntington Surf Inn is a unique hotel. Several of the rooms were decorated with surf motifs as part of a surfing contest promotion. They were so popular, the owner converted the remainder with cool individual themes.  The location is perfect - right on the Pacific Coast Highway and across the street from the beach. There's a little coffee shop and a taco takeout two minutes away. It's a five minute walk to the Pier or Main Street for food and libations. The manager recommended Duke's and it didn't disappoint - the fish and chips were outstanding.    Ah, the room! We stayed in #3 - the Rock Queens room. The one of a kind artwork on the walls included Ace Frehley, Jimi Hendrix & Alice Cooper. It featured Deep Purple walls and a sparkly ceiling. The beds were comfortable and

Huntington Beach is a good place, and this hotel is well located, with nice rooms and views, and very close to the pier & surf... I visited with my wife only for one day, and we both got the same conclusion:  We will be back!!

The surrounding area of PCH may have modernized and changed but the good old HUNTINGTON SURF INN still maintains the feel of the late 60's when surfing was cool. It made my wife and I feel like kids again! What a great flashback we had staying in this nicely kept old memory. The staff was young and very friendly; they even called, after our departure, to tell us we left a pillow behind! Great people, great memories.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review.  We indeed aim to give customers a taste of the classic SoCal beach and surf vacation that evokes the goodness and fun of that carefree time in our lives. However we do present you with modern amenities like high speed internet and USB charging ports in addition to perks like free parking and complementary use of beach accessories.  Please take care and we look forward to serving you again soon! Thank you so much for your patronage.   L Han

Summary Heading: Right on the beach , nice place to stay and chill
Summary: Nice and pleasant people at the Hotel , the Rooms are very clean ! The position is fantastic right on the beach  . First impression of the rooms was very strange but after a wile very nice , all of the rooms are painted a different way , in a way fits very well to the surfer paradise . My stay was very nice i would stay there again

This is our 2nd time staying at the Huntington Surf Inn in a matter of months.  I like that it is small in size (only 9 rooms), very clean and staff is so nice. The walk to the beach is literally across the street.   Everything we wanted or needed was within easy walking distance.

Loved this place!  It is an older hotel but very clean and nice!  We had a very cute room, cool surfer decor.  They even supply beach umbrellas for you to use...no other hotel on our way down hwy 1 did that.  We would definitely stay again!  The manager was super nice and friendly as well!

Loved this hotel. Nice and quiet and clean. Close to everything. The rooms all have different themes. So fun. Everyone was nice and helpful. We stayed in room 2. I’m already planning a trip next year. My only regret is that we didn’t stay longer.

Enjoyed the view from the room and friendly staff. Check in and out was easy and always a relaxed atmosphere  on the deck. Absolutely  recommending Holiday Surf Inn to everyone!!Every room is decorated  differently.  So amazing 😎
Manager Response: Dear danie1672, Thank you so much for spending some time with us this weekend.  Your kind words are much appreciated also. Ours is indeed a small property where we hope to provide guests with a laid back, friendly sense of community that is representative of the Southern California beach culture. Once again, we appreciate you and look forward to taking care of you again soon!

Summary Heading: Work and Play while I Stayed
Summary: If you are looking for a hip, surfer, true SoCal experience then look no further. You honestly cannot beat the price for the location. The rooms are really fun and the view of the sunset from the balcony patio is AMAZING. I was able to work outside and view the beach (bonus for me haha) then run for a quick dip in the ocean at lunch. Barbara (the Manager) is super nice and helpful! She let me store my luggage and gave me a towel so I could go to the beach while I waited for my late night flight after I checked out. She's fun to talk to and made my stay more enjoyable. Highly recommend this place and room number 9!

It was a great stay. On the last minute I asked if we could stay an extra night and Barbara was more than accommodating definitely our favorite place we're looking forward to going back again and staying much longer I highly recommend it fair price playful rooms nice patio to sit and look at the ocean a home-away-from-home Feeling

This was a nice little place. The lady at the "Reception Window" was really nice and easy to talk to. Got everything done quick and easy. The room doors have 2 locks. One of the two was a deadlock which didn't actually lock. It would just spin in place. It's right next to the street, so depending, can be kind of loud with people walking by, or cars zooming by. The bathroom was extremely nice and clean, that was probably the best part of the room  if we're being honest. It's super, super close to the beach. Literally about a 5 minute walk. The AC can also be a tad lad. Roared up pretty loud randomly through the night. Room also came with 2 chairs, and an umbrella for the beach! Nice little place. I'd recommend it if you plan on just being there for a day. No longer than that

Great place enjoyed our stay the Hotel was really nice very clean and comfortable breeze off the ocean was incredible would go back again.Girl that checked us in was very informative and helpful in locating good places to eat.

Always nice, courteous and kind staff.  The rooms are fun, designed well and clean.  The small amenities like a beach umbrella, chairs, towels and a body board make all the difference.  The view is awesome.  Thanks again we’ll be back!

Summary Heading: Very nice small hotel at the beach of Huntington
Summary: Nice and very helpful owner/manager of the hotel. Very well located in Huntington, close the center (Main street) and directly located at the beach.  Very nice sunset from the patio of the hotel.  Good rooms with comfortable beds, clean.  Complementary beach towels and chairs available in the room.

I cannot wait until my next trip. This little place is the best! Super convenient to beach. Very easy walk. Very clean and well kept. I enjoyed having the shared deck. Nice to be able to walk back to the room for a break in the afternoon. Had a fantastic time.

I want to get a beach vacation but couldn’t afford going to a private island. The service in was my private island sleeping on that huge king bed surrounded by blue waves on the wall I felt as if I was. The manager Barbara was attentive and helpful and very kind and I know I will be back to visit again. The morning and evenings to be able to sit on the deck and watch unbelievable and close to Stores and places to eat. I recommend this place

I stayed in room 8 from July 17-20. When I arrived, I was told there was good news and bad news, but the bad news wasn’t bad at all. The AC in my room had gone out but the lovely ladies here had secured a portable unit that was perfect - it cooled the room and provided white noise which was great because I can’t sleep without a fan anyway. I have no complaints about my stay here whatsoever; it’s located at PCH and 8th (if I remember correctly) so literally everything is in walking distance, from the beach to Main Street to Pacific City. I parked my car and didn’t get back in until check out. Beach chairs, towels, and an umbrella were provided in the room. The room itself was very clean and comfortable; next time I stay here (because there will be a next time) I’m torn between

Very clean and we love the theme rooms! Right on PCH and walking distance to everything in Huntington Beach. Make sure you book early as the 8 or 9 rooms go very fast. Staff is very helpful and friendly. Will be back!

My husband and I stay here at least a couple of times a year. The rooms are clean and have themes. Its conveniently located walking distance from Main st and right across from the beach. The balcony overlooks the ocean and passersby if your in to people watching. The owner is very sweet and accommodating.. <3

Summary Heading: Loved it! We will be back!
Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The Inn is within walking distance of restaurants, shopping, the beach, the pier, and is super cute! My family had a lot of fun during our stay. We will be back again. Highly recommended!

We stay here every year during the 4th of July holiday and will continue to do so. The location is perfect, the price is competitive, but the staff is the main reason we come back every year. They are so friendly and helpful, it beats out staying anywhere else near Huntington.

Summary Heading: We have stayed here several times because it is right across the Street from the beach.
Summary: Nice motel with very helpful managers.  We mostly stay here because of the location right across the street from the beach and within walking distance of lots of shops, bars and restaurants.  Lots of different themed rooms.  A little pricey because of the location but much better than the hotel across the street where the Managers are very unaccomodating.

Summary Heading: Great location run by great people
Summary: This is the second time we’ve stayed here - the management and staff are awesome - high integrity and so helpful.  Our daughter left her wallet in the room after we checked out and they called and made arrangements to send it out same day.  Very clean, fun rooms.  Fantastic sunset viewing deck.

This is a great place to stay!! Walking distance for the beach with lots of great things to do and a peaceful place to relax.  Highly recommend.  Staff is very helpful and courteous.  Place is clean with a great view on the deck.  Thank you Barbara!!  Anne :)

We’ve been staying here for 10+ years. I’m reluctant to post this review because I don’t want people to find out about it. There are only 9 rooms. It's nothing fancy, but it’sclean and less than half the price of other hotels on the street. Their deck offers an awesome place to chill and view the ocean. You can park your car when you get here and never drive while you’re here. The beach, restaurants, and dining are all within walking distance. Barbara is a great hostess and makes sure you have everything you need. She remembers us every time, which makes us  feel right at home. We will continue to make this our go to place to stay for vacation!

Wanted to spend our last day in Cali at the beach. Huntington Surf Inn did exactly that. A quick walk across the street and your toes are in the sand. Check in was easy. Room was clean and AC worked great (did rattle like crazy) gotta watch your knees/shins when in the room (#4) because you will bang them on the beds. Main Street is also a short walk. Location location location... this is the no frills no partying and no visitors inn that you want. The money spent is worth it just for the location. Great deck to hang out and relax. They also have beach chairs and towels for you to use free of charge if needed. Checkout was also super easy.  We will definitely stay again. Thanks for a great last day.

Great location across from the beach and only a couple of blocks from Main Street.  Rooms are very clean with a great shower.  Community deck is great for morning coffee with a lovely view.  Would definitely recommend.

What a Fantastic weekend with family. The staff is wonderful.  Totally accommodating.  Perfect location for walking to all and Pacific view from the deck.  We had a great time and will Definitely return!

This place is awesome!  We will be staying here whenever we are in the area.  Great staff, great location, clean rooms, awesome deck for relaxing at night.  My family and I came to town for a softball tournament, and this place was perfect!  I have spent over 1000 nights in Marriott hotels, and I will stay here every time I come to town!  Beach towels, beach chairs, and umbrella included!

Such a cool place to stay!  Very clean room and bathroom.  Funky, vintage decor.  Such a relaxed vibe.  The giant shared deck that over looks the beach was our favorite spot to hang out!  We would stay here again for sure!  Sweetest staff too!  👍🏼👍🏼🌊☀️

Summary Heading: Awesome stay, great location and great staff!
Summary: We stayed at HSI for 8 nights in March 2018- two nights in Room 5 and 6 nights in Room 9.  Room 5 was a bit smaller, and only had one window, but I would say was slightly quieter than Room 9.  Room 9 had three windows which was lovely to let the light and breeze in, and it was also larger and had a view of the water.  Both rooms had a microwave and a fridge, which was great.  The deck is awesome, though the weather was on the cooler side when we were there, so we did not use it that much, it would be lovely during the warmer months. Room was clean and tidy.  Barbara and Danny were great, very friendly and helpful with suggestions of restaurants etc.  All of the housekeeping staff were very friendly as well.  This is small 9 room hotel, which we thoroughly enjoyed and will

The front desk person, Barbara, was fabulous! She gave great recommendations for local shops and restaurants, as well as being very personable to me and my family! The room was comfortable and fun! We will definitely be staying there again! :)

Everything was great - location, cleanliness, service. My bed was comfortable and there were all the necessary amenities in the room - TV, fridge, etc.. The bathroom was really nice and they provided some beach accessories for free.   My only complaint (completely fixable) is that the AC would sporadically make a really loud, long-lasting scratching noise all through the night. It was too hot to not have the AC on but that noise made good sleep very difficult. I am sure that if that was fixed the sleep would have been great.

Stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn for just 1 night but wish I could of stayed longer. Excellent location, friendly staff and great facilities made it an enjoyable stay. Will definitely go back in the future.

Summary Heading: Awesome Location and the Friendliest Staff
Summary: Great place to stay for a trip to the beach, which is right across the street.  The room came with beach chairs and beach towels.  It had everything I needed.  Close to great coffee, food, and shopping.  Each room is interesting and unique.  My favorite thing about the entire stay was the friendly staff!
Manager Response: Dear Dan C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and I am glad you enjoyed the company of our wonderful staff!  I do agree with you that many of the local coffee shops are very good for a quick pick-me-up.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel soon.   Warm Regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Absolutely no idea why it was #1 on Trip Advisor.  It was dirty including stains on carpet and walls and dirt on sheets.  One bed squeaked horribly.  A/C unit was right in one persons face and super loud.  TV was small.  Great location but for a lodging experience it was not great, I felt dirty the whole time.
Manager Response: Dear Kurt E, I appreciate your candor about your recent stay at the Inn.
