I wish your constructive criticism was shared with our staff during your stay because I am certain they would have welcomed the opportunity to do everything possible to make your experience more comfortable. In recent days we have renovated the hotel by replacing carpets and baseboards in the majority of our rooms, and we are making double sure that the screws on the bed frames are fastened correctly.  Thank you once again, and I hope one day you will give us another chance so we can shine for you as we have for many guests in the past.    Sincerely, Danny Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay at Huntington Surf Inn!
Summary: We had a wonderful stay at Huntington Surf Inn! The staff was so friendly ( as was most of the people we came across in Huntington!). The rooms are updated, clean. The beds were comfortable. Location is great, close to shops, pier and across the street from beach. Would definitely recommend and would come back to stay again if we get the chance! :-)
Manager Response: Dear teresaF1672ZV,  Thank you for your kind words about our inn.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and I agree that most people in Huntington Beach are friendly.  We look forward to welcoming you back again and have a great day!   Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: A very nice place to stay, clean & tidy & very close to Main Street the pier & beaches. Danny & Barbara are great hosts. I have stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn many times before, it is always cost effective & there is plenty of off street parking.
Manager Response: Dear Chris G,  We are always happy to see you return to the hotel; you are a true friend of mine as well as our staff.  Thank you very much for the kind words, and we are looking forward to the next time you visit.   Warm regards, Danny  Manager

Summary: Lucky to have found Hunting Surf Inn! Such a great location, right across from the beach and next to a convenience store which is nice with kiddos. It’s a cute, clean place to stay has microwave, mini fridge, dinette area, just everything you can need.  There are different themes rooms.... we stay in room #6 the surfer girls room, has two queen beds, it has a nice view can be seen from the window or opening the door. I think next time we will try one of the lower numbers they are closer set to the ocean view 😊 Also, such a caring staff.... that’s a nice bonus too! Thanks guys!
Manager Response: Dear Lindsay F,  I am happy you were able to find our little inn, and you are correct because getting one of the lower numbered rooms will give you a little bit of a better view and some more natural sunlight as well (I would recommend Room#4).  Thank you for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Perfect location across from the beach. The rooms are spacious, clean and the beds are very comfortable. Although the hotel doesn't have room service, it is only 4 blocks from Main Street, which has plenty of options for breakfast, lunch and supper. I would recommend Sessions for breakfast and lunch. They also do great coffee. The HSI has the welcome benefit of parking and fast WIFI, but above all the friendly staff made all the difference. They are incredibly helpful with recommendations and requests, and genuinely make you feel like you are a part of their family. The inn has a lot of return guests, which speaks for itself. I, for one, will be returning!
Manager Response: Dear FerrisB,  I am so glad you were able to have this experience at our inn.  One of the best things we have here is our staff because they always want to find out an answer for you.  They are very knowledgeable about the area although I have never had breakfast at Sessions, so I will have to try it one day.  Thank you for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: This place is awesome!  I was in town for 2 nights on business & decided last minute to cancel my Hilton hotel to stay here two nights.  It was a great decision & I will be staying with them next year.  You are one block away from Main street & you have great restaurants to choose from.  I was in room 4 the first night & then they moved me to room 5 the second night.  They both had great views & were very nice.  The sheets were very nice as well as the bathrooms.
Manager Response: Dear He00323,  I am glad you enjoyed both of the rooms that you were in, and I hope that it was not too troublesome moving from one room to another.  Thank you for your kind words about the hotel and for the shout-out to our sheets. We look forward to welcoming you again!  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: The staff was excellent and made sure we had everything we needed.  The view from the deck was beautiful. We needed to book on short notice because we were coming in for a funeral and the tranquility of the beach was very theraputic. Thank You
Manager Response: Dear Janie B,  I am sorry for your loss. It is nice to know that our team was able to offer a hassle-free accommodation during your time of mourning, and the beach was comforting.  I have found the the beach to be therapeutic in times of need as well.  Thank you for staying with us, I hope the best for you.    Warmest sincerities, Danny Manager

Summary: Great location right by the beach and everything else you would want to be within walking distance of in Huntington. We will be staying here again for sure. Rooms are nice, with a nice seating area outside you can see the beach from. Great staff.
Manager Response: Dear Kylea G,  Thank you for the kind words!  I love walking downtown form the hotel too, it is always a good day when I am able to visit some of the attractions that Huntington Beach has to offer, and I am glad you were able to do so during your trip here.  We look forward to welcoming you again.    Warm Regards, Danny  Manager

Summary: We have stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn three times now. Both my wife and I are in our early 60's, if you need some demographic information about us. We love the low price compared to the other nearby hotels. We love the proximity (easy walking distance) to all of downtown Huntington Beach and the pier. Typically we park our car in the hotel's covered parking and just walk everywhere for the few days we are there. Not having to drive in traffic for a few days makes for an awesome, relaxing vacation. We also love sitting on the raised deck, looking at the ocean across the street. We have met some very fun and interesting people while sitting on the deck. We have joined others we have met for everything from Corona's to Champagne. We also like that it is a small 9 room hotel
Manager Response: Dear Steve B,  Thank you for your loyalty to our inn!  Nothing makes our team happier than to hear a loyal guest enjoy their stay every time they visit us.  We look forward to welcoming you again, and maybe our staff will join you on the deck after their shift next time!    Warm Regards, Danny  Manager

Summary Heading: The place to stay at Surf City!
Summary: We had a night to spend in So. Cal and looking around...we found this absolute gem in Huntington Beach.  It's right on the PCH, just a couple of blocks from the pier.  The owners are great, and ready with suggestions if you want them on where to go for different things.  The room was clean and very nice!  And we really didn't hear traffic at all.  They have a nice deck to watch the sunset from, and from our room #5, you can see the beach.  The price was also outstanding.  You can pay three times as much and stay down the road, but remember what Martin Mull said...when you turn out the lights...all hotel rooms look the same!
Manager Response: Dear nichoj19,  I am happy you found us and you enjoyed your stay.  Room#5 is a great room to stay in, and I hope you were able to witness a stellar sunset from the deck!  We would love to welcome you back soon!   Warm regards, Danny

Summary: We loved our stay at HSI. The staff was very helpful and offered great suggestions for places to go in the downtown area and pier which is only a 2 block walk. We had room #3 (rock n roll theme) which was very cool. I would definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Joey T,  Thank you for your kind words about the inn!  Exploring the famous Downtown Huntington Beach and Pier should be on every travelers to-do list when visiting our hotel, and I am glad you were able to experience them.  We look forward to welcoming you again!    Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: is this a 5 star resort,no is it the best place to stay right on the beach ,yes, rooms very clean ,we had room #1 and it looks right at ocean,staff was super freindly. If i could do more stars i definitly would. HIGHLY RECOMEND THE SURF INN!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ron W,  Is this the longest review we've gotten? no but its the best!  Haha!  I'm glad you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you again.    Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary Heading: Nice and clean, fantastic location, great personalized customer service
Summary: This is a fantastic little place with clean rooms, updated bathrooms, and outstanding customer service.  The location is just a couple of blocks from the pier and all the restaurants and shops and just across the street from the beach.  The beach chairs and umbrella in the room were a nice convenience.  There is a small deck with chairs to sit out and enjoy the ocean view/sunsets.  Rooms are fun with their different themes, and although they are a little dated, they are clean and in good order.  Bathrooms are updated and nice.  The owners/employees go above and beyond to make your stay great.  They held our luggage for us when we arrived early and rushed to get our room ready a little early for us.  When we left, our room was not booked that night so they let us check out late
Manager Response: Dear Chad2005,  Thank you for staying with us during your getaway!  It was very nice meeting you, and we hope to welcome you again in the future.  I'm glad we were able to accommodate an early check in for you, and figure out the luggage situation when you were leaving.    Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: this little inn is only 2 blocks from downtown so you can enjoy all the downtown fun without the price.  The managers and staff are very friendly and went out of their way to make sure we had an enjoyable stay.  The rooms are small and nothing fantastic but the are clean and the bed was comfortable.  They provide beach towels and chairs if you want them as well as beach toys.  There is a great little community deck that you can sit out on and enjoy the view.
Manager Response: Dear Shane F,  Thank you for your kind words.  Our staff prides themselves in trying to make your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible.  I am glad you were able to enjoy our proximity to the downtown area, and our wonderful little deck.   I hope you have a great day!  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary Heading: We Can't Wait to go Back!
Summary: Every year my husband and I take one kid-free trip to the beach for our anniversary to reconnect and refresh, we usually go to Pismo Beach, but last year we opted for Huntington Beach as we saw it was geared more toward a young crowd and has a thriving nightlife scene. We chose the Huntington Surf Inn for its proximity to the beach and to "The Strand" (two streets teeming with bars, restaurants, and shops) and for its price, which is about $100 cheaper than all the other hotel with comparable beach proximity. We were not disappointed with our decision not to stay in a chain hotel.   The HSI was perfect for us! We stayed in Room One which has a window that faces the ocean, and the door opens directly out to the amazing deck, which is a shared space by all hotel guests. The deck
Manager Response: Dear packyourheart,  Thank you for your kind words about the inn as well as the feedback.  I apologize about the problem you had with the bathroom.  We have already sent maintenance to fix the bathroom situation in Room#1, and to revise all the other bathrooms as to make sure they do not have a similar problem.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards, Danny    Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice and well located hotel
Summary: Nice room, very clean. Good location and very kind employees.  Indeed was a great pleasure meeting the crew and enjoying good and sunny days.   Perfect place for spending some lonely vacations and enjoy the place.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Juliano C,  Thank you for your review of our inn!  We have a high standard of cleanliness here at the inn and I am glad you were able to experience it.  We hope to see you again soon!    Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Had a great time. Let us check in early and let us park our car there even earlier then check in so we could go and enjoy the beach.  The surf room was awesome and we had a great time. Great customer service, will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear angela h,  I am glad we were able to accommodate you with an early check in, and that you were able to enjoy the beautiful beach across the street from the inn.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards, Danny Manager

Summary Heading: Great view of the Ocean on the deck and the rooms were very clean
Summary: Great  place with a great location with just a short walk to the pier. Rooms were decorated with surfing themes and very clean and had been redone. For the price it would be dificult to match by any other hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Marcus H,  We are very lucky to be in close proximity to the downtown attraction of Huntington Beach, and I am always happy to see when a guest is able to enjoy the location of the inn.  We try to set our prices to a point where we are able to give a good deal to our guests as well as make the owner happy lol.   Thank you for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: The hosts Danny and Barbara, and their assistance Alisa - very friendly and so accomodating. The rooms have a different theme - the bathrooms are fabulous and modern, and my sister and I loved the fact that the bedspreads were NOT those awful  shiny types!  You can't ask for a better location, and the fact that this is a small inn is one reason I chose the Huntington Surf Inn...mahalo Danny and Barbara!
Manager Response: Mahalo Jenny C,  Thank you for the shout out!  It was very nice meeting you, and I am glad you enjoyed our selection for bedspreads at the inn.  It is the same set up I have in my home :)  We look forward to welcoming you back at the inn.    Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Danny & Barbara  are wonderful host...the rooms are unique & always clean etc...and close to everything..the beach..pier.. and many food choices within walking distance..   can't wait to visit again...Rob W.
Manager Response: Dear Rob W,  Thank you Rob for your kind words.  I am glad you were able to enjoy our unique rooms that were designed by Antonio Ballatore.  One of the best qualities of our hotel is the location, and it is a lot of fun when I see guests like yourself enjoy our proximity to local attractions.  It was very nice meeting you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Warm Regards, Danny  Manager

Summary: This hotel has the perfect location, close to the beach, shopping and dining. Very quiet. Convenient parking. We would recommend this hotel to all of our family and friends. Loved the room we stayed in, it had windows with a view of the ocean and Huntington Beach Pier. Can't say enough good things about this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mary M,  Thank you for your kind words about the hotel.  It is truly a labor of love for me and our team, so it means a lot to hear when a guest truly enjoys their stay.  Thank you.  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: We loved the relaxed and chilled feeling of this place. Simple friendly accommodation only a few minutes walk from all the bars and restaurants of HB. Rooms are individually styled with cool beach and music themes.  Great sunsets from the deck.
Manager Response: Dear Luke E,  We are truly blessed to have such a beautiful view of the sun setting over the Pacific every evening.  I am happy you were able to enjoy it as well as some other aspects of our hotel.  Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Awesome hotel in a perfect location to see the area.   Very very clean!! Great "themed" rooms to reflect your personality!! Would definitely stay here again. We had a wonderful time and we had no problem arriving with a vehicle.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly A,  I am glad you did not have a problem parking in our garage, as I know sometimes the spaces can be tight, and it has made my parking skills over the years increase haha.  In all seriousness, we do make sure that every guest has at least one parking space to accommodate their car, as we have 9 rooms at the inn as well as 9 available parking spaces.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you again soon.      Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: This was a very convenient location, located across the street from the beach with Main St. shops and restaurants nearby. The innkeepers were so helpful and allowed us to leave our cars in the lot for a while after check out, and even allowed us some extra time to check out. The only negative was noise from the street, but being so close allowed a beautiful view of the ocean and from the deck, as well! Restrooms were updated and the decor was bright and cheerful in the bedroom. We had 2 next door units for a family trip. Refrigerators in the rooms, beach towels and beach chairs with umbrella are included! Check in/out at the second level window outside. Someone appears almost immediately when you ring the bell. I would love to stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear tmr1106,  I am glad you enjoyed your stay at the inn.  Unfortunately being so close to the beach in Huntington Beach also means that we are very close to the Pacific Coast Highway, and although we have fitted all of our rooms with double paned windows, the street noise can still be noticeable when a Harley or Lamborghini come screaming by the inn.  I am also happy we were able to accommodate a late check out for you, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family again.  Warm Regards, Danny Manager

Summary: We have stayed here 3 years in a row. The rooms are very clean and each one is decorated different and really cool! The location is great! Right across from the beach and a short walk to main street. The owners are very friendly. Next year when we go we'll be staying here again!!
Manager Response: Dear mcvette24,  Thank you for your loyalty to the inn!  Over the past three years we have made some improvements to ensure a better, and more comfortable stay to our guests, and I hope that when you come back for a fourth year we will be able to offer some more homey-touches for you to enjoy.   Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: We did a last-minute trio to HB and decided to stay here, based on the reviews and access to the beach.  We were pleasantly surprised and will definitely be back. The people were very nice and hospitable, even helping us with our bicycles.  We could walk or bicycle everywhere we wanted to go. There is some noise from traffic, but it does quiet down and you can hear the waves crashing on the beach. The deck is pretty cool; we enjoyed an evening cocktail & watched the sunset every night.  Our only downside was the towels are pretty rough and we couldn’t bring our dogs. Understandable, but we were disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa L,  Thank you for your kind words about the inn, and I am glad you decided to stay with us.  We are currently looking into how we can become a more pet-friendly hotel, as we know that the dog beach located one mile south of us is always better enjoyed with a dog.  I have also noticed our towels being a little bit scruffy, and I have done some research on how to preserve them to staying softer for longer periods of time, so hopefully next time we will be able to offer a softer towel.  Thank you for your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you again to the inn.    Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: We spent one night here while extending a business trip.  We loved the little Inn.  Great service, great location, great time in Huntington Beach!  Close to the pier, shopping and everything beach related!  We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Shon S,  We love welcoming business travelers here at the inn because I know that coming to Southern California for work does not always mean sunshine and enjoying the beach, but here at the inn it is so easy to be able to enjoy some of the the best parts of Southern California, and get some work done at the same time.  Thank you very much for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you again.   Warm Regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Stayed for one week. Unassuming from outside but a gem inside. Clean, peaceful, nice decor, close to water and action, convenience shop next door, viewing terrace, hi-speed wifi, nice people - what else do you want?
Manager Response: Dear Ian G,  Walking up to our hotel for the first time has been a delightful surprise for many of our guests, because for being built in the 60s you can never really know what to expect when opening that room-door for the first time.  I am very lucky to work with an owner who truly cares about guests' experiences and it definitely shows with the time and energy that makes each one of our rooms unique.  We recently upgraded our free wifi service to a mesh network, and I am glad it worked well for you.  Thank you for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: We spent 2 nights here in the beginning of September.   Rooms were very clean and the decor was awesome.  Everyone we encountered was super friendly.   The Inn is right across from the beach and a quick walk to the pier and shops!   We traveled from PA and really appreciated the beach towels and chairs.   We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Berries97,  Most of my family is from PA as well, and it was actually a request from one of my family members to have these amenities installed!  I am glad you were able to take advantage of the beach while you visited, and we are glad to welcome you back at anytime.  Thank you.  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Our group had a mini reunion here early Sept. We found this gem to be a perfect place. Very close to the beach. Enjoyed an early morning walk. Staff is very responsive and accommodating. Microwave available on request. Rooms are also furnished with mini fridge. Free parking was a welcome bonus.
Manager Response: Dear Alma C,  It was a lot of fun accommodating the hotel for you and your reunion party.  Everyone in your group I got to speak with was so nice, and I am very happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  Warm regards, Danny  Manager

Summary: We are a family of four and were very comfortable here. The beds are comfortable and rooms are clean. The decor is really cool. When we showed up we were a little worried about how quiet it would be but they assured us that there would be no problems and there wasn't one. The owners live on the premises. The location was prime and the beaches are directly across the street. There is a small refrigerator and the closet had two chairs, an umbrella and towels for the beach. Thank you for a great time!
Manager Response: Dear Teresa J,  I am glad you were able to rest well during your stay.  Since we have managers on site 24/7 we are able to provide safe and quiet stays for our guests.  At anytime after 10pm we ask our guests to be mindful of the others who may be trying to sleep.  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you soon.  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: Perfect location within walking minutes of all Huntington Beach's best activities and attractions. The unique decor of each room iS unparalleled when compared to any other beach motel in the wide open area. But what really sets the Surf Inn apart is the couple managing the place. Pretty much every review of the Surf Inn says this, but it's true - they are extremely friendly and laid back. Couldn't have asked for a better experience. So much ALOHA felt at this establishment - big mahaloz to the Huntington Surf Inn!
Manager Response: Mahalo marcus_ocean,  Barbara and I want to say thank you for your kind words.  It was very nice meeting you, and I am glad you enjoyed your stay.   We look forward to welcoming you back again!  Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Huntington Beach
Summary: It always feels like home when we come to stay here.  The staff are very friendly and the rooms are always clean. Having a refrigerator in the room is very handy. Parking has never been a problem and it is a short walk to shops and restaurants. It is nice to sit on the terrace in the evenings and watch the sun set.
Manager Response: Dear JoRo R,  It is always a pleasure to welcome you back to the inn!  Thank you for your kind words, and I hope all is well.  We look forward to seeing you again.   Warm regards, Danny Manager

Summary: My mom, 3 of my kids and I stayed here over Mother's Day weekend (2017) and it was wonderful!  The couple who manage the hotel were so so nice.  Whenever we needed anything, they were quick to help us.  The owner was there that weekend and he was extremely nice, too!  We were able to get a microwave in our room, to save on eating out.  We were there to see my 3 older boys who live in HB and it was just a perfect place to meet.  We hung out on the nice patio or walked down to the beach, while my older boys surfed.  The hotel is within walking distance to Main Street, which was great.  There's also a CVS and 7-11 within walking distance, in case you need to pick up some essentials.  The beds were very comfortable (we stayed in room 2) and the bathroom is in new condition and very

Summary Heading: Birthday and Fourth of July Celebrations with family in HB
Summary: We feel like family when we stay at Surf Inn!  We stayed in room 8, which is farthest from the ocean but we love how quiet and peaceful this room is.  It's spacious and has a refrigerator, drawers, and a bistro table, as well as a huge comfy bed! The viewing deck is perfect for the Independence Day parade, and they stock it with coffee and juice. My daughter and granddaughters stayed in room 7, and we had a blast! The Inn is across the PCH from the ocean, a couple blocks walk to Main in HB, and close to everything! We love the family who runs the Inn and how welcoming they are!

When we arrived at the hotel we were greeted by a very professional and extremely friendly host.  The room was unique and comfortable. within walking distance of downtown and the pier. A little noise from the street below but not bad.  We will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for a few days at the beach
Summary: We stayed a Friday through Monday. Within easy walking distance to the pier, shops, restaurants and bars.  The beach is just across PCH. Street is busy but there are convenient crosswalks with lights. HSI is quaint with awesome staff. They provide beach towels and umbrellas if you ask at the desk.  We stayed in room 9. Plenty big for two. Great windows with room darkening shades if you want to sleep in. A view of the beach from the shower too!  Refrigerator in the room.  A convenience store just down the block for late night munchies and ice.

Summary Heading: Great! Location, staff, room, price, all great!
Summary: On PCH, near downtown, small, quaint hotel.  Not to many rooms, nice helpful staff. Free parking.  Stayed in the Jimi Hendrix room, each room has a theme, ask about them when you book, call them, it's quirky, but it works.  The prices at the new hotels around downtown are soaring, this one is still affordable.  Can walk to pier, downtown, beach, can bonfire, surf and bike rentals across the street, watch sunsets, just a really awesome location for this hotel.

Summary Heading: Great location for activities around Huntington
Summary: The rooms are nice and clean, with a surf theme, and parking is available. The management and staff are very friendly. You can't beat this location for going surfing or shopping in Huntington.  Everything is within walking distance and that's a plus.

Great people great room. I even left my coach wallet outside and Peggy grabbed it brought it to me in the morning. Honest and excellent people and place. Will be back. Not dog friendly but in a great area close to Main st.

Very fun, unique place to stay. Large communal deck with a gorgeous view of the ocean Very clean, warm and wonderful staff Can't wait to stay here again Rooms have decent sized apartment style refrigerators, large shower. The one table in our room was small, but didn't need to use it this trip

We loved the staff .Especially  Danny and Alisa who are very welcoming .We will definitely be staying here again . The location is perfect .Walking distance to restaurants and shopping also the night clubs.

Value, location and charm!!  This is the hotel we will continue to use when in the area.  And the people in the office are super nice.  I hesitate to give a great review because I always want a room available for us!!

Very warm welcome, all staff is nice, flexible when they can on checkout, amazing rooms ! Mine was the big wave tube - feeling like I was already surfing. Well located. I will be back for sure ! Enjoy !

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, comfortable rooms, and beach access location!
Summary: Our two-night stay at this beach inn was amazing. Staff is friendly, genuine, and have great suggestions on what to do. The rooms are unique - each one designed differently. The staff offered us beach towels and beach sports equipment, if we were interested.   Access to the beach is right across the street, walking distance to pier, and Main Street. Wifi and parking included, not many extra amenities, but this wasn't an issue for us as we were mainly on the beach or walking around. Mini fridge in room. No breakfast or coffee service. Comfortable beds and pillows.   We were very happy with our stay and would recommend the property to others!

Unique 9 room motel on PCH directly across from the beach and around the corner from  all the Main St. action.  Rooms are basic with surf (or music) decor, comfortable beds & modern bathrooms.  There is a mini-fridge but unfortunately no coffee maker nor ice machine.  All rooms are on the second floor with parking underneath.  There is a nice large deck so guests can sit out and enjoy the view.  Nice owners too!

Summary Heading: location, location... well you know the rest
Summary: nothing fancy, just the perfect place to power down and bum around huntington. i've stayed here many times, sort of a local secret, not advertised on expedia or travel zoo. great balcony overlooking the ocean, walking distance to everything, the perfect spot. the rooms are very basic, but do have a theme with wall murals that create a simple laid-back charm. bring your own coffee maker, or go to the 7-eleven right next door. then head out and enjoy huntington with a nice base to crash.

Summary Heading: Amazing staff, clean rooms, killer location!
Summary: If you are seeking a beach resort with onsite amenities and food service, keep seeking. If you are looking for a super reasonably priced clean room, comfy bed, with a clean private bath in an excellent location this is your place. There is ample space to unpack and the in-room fridge is terrific for keeping beach bevies chilled. (I will admit not having any type of coffee service was a bummer, but we survived) The motel is right on the PCH so if you are a light sleeper request a room in the back. Wi-fi and parking are included, but the beach access is right across the street, and main street and the famous pier are just a couple of blocks away so you may end up leaving your car parked the whole time. The staff are incredible! Very accommodating, friendly and quick to help with

The Huntington Surf inn lives up to its name, our room had surf decor, very polite and accommodating staff. Answered all questions we had, got the inside scope on the attractions downtown, some of which as a former local I never knew about. Room was very cozy and the mini fridge was nice to store left overs. Rooms were spacious bathrooms were very nice and well furnished. Towels and maid service daily, very clean and professional. Right across the street from the beach and walking distance from main street and pacific city. Management was very polite and friendly.

First, the good things: The location right on the PCH is great except the motorcycle traffic at night is really loud, (which is not the fault of the hotel but something to consider,)  free parking, convenient smoking area, and a nice walk-in shower. Otherwise, pretty disappointed in this property. Yes, the rooms are each is painted up with a funky theme, but the carpeting is thin and furniture may or may not be intentionally distressed. The air conditioning unit in the wall rattled terribly the first night and there is no office staff on site. Had to stuff paper in the front to try to get it to stop. Hotel rooms are pricy in HB, so maybe $165/night is a bargain, but really...no clock or coffee maker in the room, a phone tucked under a table, and the maid left us with half a roll

We checked in and the owner was so nice. Our room was exactly as pictured. The bathroom is very modern. The location was fantastic.  We were on a road trip and it was great to walk to the pier, restaurants and shops after driving all day. We had to leave early the next day so did not get to hang out, but I'd definitely stay here again.

I was there two days in the off season. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Others at the small hotel were very quiet so noise wasn't a big problem. PC Highway is just outside the door, so you hear cars a lot. Room is a throwback style and not fancy, but I liked it a lot. I didn't have much contact with the staff, but what I did was good.  Beach and town access is great. Great price. I travel for business a TON and stay at a lot of hotels, so have seen it all.  This will be my place of choice for Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Cool and Quirky (in a good way)!
Summary: Small motel with fun rooms.  Room was clean and staff was super accommodating. Right on the Pacific Coast Highway and directly across from the beach.  Head down the pier for great views. Just a short walk to downtown Huntington Beach.  There is a huge and very cool farmers market each Tuesday night!

Summary Heading: Favorite hotel can walk to beach.
Summary: Great staff and each room individually and uniquely decorated. We have stayed here at least 8 times and loved every visit. Walk to downtown and beach right across the street. Small hotel with only 8 rooms with parking below.

The room was clean, the staff was wonderful. The heater did not work but they brought in a space heater immediately and it was perfect. A wonderful patio on the second floor with a great ocean view. I would definitely stay there again! Thank you Elly H

This is a perfect place for enjoying Huntington Beach. Everything is walking distance and it has a great view of the ocean. The staff were incredible and so helpful with everything to make the trip enjoyable. Thanks so much!

Great location- right across from the beach & quick walk to Huntington Beach shops & restaurants. Excellent unique property. I'll definitely be staying again! When you stay stop into Sanchos Tacos 2 blocks away!

I was in 3 hotel in Huntington Beach and the guys they make very good job,room clean,anytime ready to help you,wifi very fast,not like others place around. Definelly I'll come back to visit!!🙏🙏 The the terrace for the sunset.....OMG 😉

Unless you're looking for 5 stars with a restaurant and spa, this hotel is everything! The couple who run it are wonderfully sweet, helpful and open. The rooms are so fun and interesting. The location is absolutely perfect, with an amazing view from the patio. My biggest worry was noise, will it be loud every time someone walks by or leaves their room since its so small and quaint. That was never an issue. Everyone was very respectful of other guests and very friendly.

Well kept property with nine rooms, and shared upper deck (think sunset).  Everything HB within 15 minute walk makes for a fantastic place to stay. We rented bikes from Mikes (2 blocks).... never moved our car from the covered, free parking for three days :)  When you check in, feels like family, with helpful suggestions for HB fun.

If you're not in the mood for 4-5 Star Glamour Hotels but want a great location for surf, restaurants and shops then The Huntington Surf Inn is your place. Comfortable beds and friendly staff.  Nice little deck to sip a cold one and check the surf.

Huntington surf inn has the perfect location just next to the waves of Huntington pier and also walking distance to the restaurants and bars of the city. The staff had some really good recommendations for places to eat and drink that fit us perfectly! Also, the rooms were clean, nice and has cool design.
Manager Response: Dear Terje J, Thanks so much for your kind review of your recent visit to our property. We want our guests to have a fun and authentic beach hotel experience at the Inn. Our manager Danny and his staff are very familiar with the local Beach Cities culture and lifestyle, and our rooms reflect the laid back surfer cool of Southern California. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I stayed here as opposed to the Pasea Resort and Spa where my meeting was held.  This place is SOOO much cooler!  Comfortable bed and room.  Very clean.  Free WiFi and right across the street from the beach.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear wayneremington, Well...what a succinct and kind review. We are indeed where the "cool kids" stay, but these "cool" guests are also really down-to-earth and considerate, wonderful human beings! I applaud all our great colleagues up and down Pacific Coast Highway for their excellence, but certainly you do get straight up personalized good value at the Huntington Surf Inn, as compared to the big boys hospitality chains.  I hope to see you relaxing again on our deck soon at the Inn! Thank you. L Han

Summary Heading: Nice and small hotel in lovely Huntington
Summary: This hotel has such a nice atmosphere. It immediately makes you feel at home. It's small and cosy and right next to the beach with some good bars and restaurants around. A prefect location to relax and enjoy the ocean.

The Huntington Surf Inn is an awesome place!! If you are looking for a laid back casual setting with amazing ocean views, then this is the place to be.   The customer service from the front desk was great. The gal that checked us in was super friendly and made sure my husband and I had everything we needed.  Even asked us if we needed extra towels.  We stayed in room #9 which had the perfect mix of retro and comfortable decor. The bathroom was updated with a nice walk in shower.   Would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Summary Heading: This place has always fascinated me!
Summary: Having stayed around the HB Pacific Coast Highway area for almost 25 years, this place has always fascinated me. With only 9 guest rooms plus the office and live-in staff's apartment all on the second floor level mounted on pilings and parking underneath and no place to expand, it feels like you are at the beach. I remember seeing the rooms being remodeled a couple of years ago, they all have their own theme and you pick your own available room when you make reservations on-line. The rooms are adequate sized with a roomy tiled shower and bathroom skylight to brighten-up the day and make up for the lack of back wall windows. The front window doesn't offer a spectacular view, but a public deck does. I had Room 3 with a head-banger rock band decor which kept me happy. A flat-screen

We really enjoyed staying at this cute, quaint little hotel. Each room has a cool theme, ours was all about surfing and skateboarding. The room was clean and well maintained with fresh sheets and towels. Nice oversized shower,  a sunny deck with a view to the ocean where we ate breakfast. If we ever come back, we'll stay here again.

We had 4 rooms with a total of 16 people staying at Huntington Surf Inn for a birthday "Pub Crawl" celebration.  This place has a great location, just a few blocks from all the HB action on Main Street. Everything we needed was within walking distance.  The rooms were very cool!  All were clean with plenty of room.  We all enjoyed the deck for our gathering, even ordered taco's in from SuperMex and enjoyed a great dinner while watching the sunset! The staff was so helpful and friendly!  Hope to be back soon!

Loved this place, literally across the road from the beach. The room was really nicely decorated in surfer style, including the toilet flush being a little surfboard! It was very clean and there was a little porch to sit outside and enjoy the sunset. Short walk to shops and restaurants, etc. I'd stay again. Reasons for "only" 4 out of 5: Parking was a bit tight even with a small car, and the motel was relatively pricey.

Loved the comfy bed and updated bathroom and decorated rooms !! Down to earth, friendly people, it felt like you were staying at their house yet totally private and independent. We will definitely be back here !!

The owners were nice. The rooms were modern and clean. We especially enjoyed the location of the hotel to the ocean and numerous shopping and eating establishments. The little coffee shop on the next block was awesome. We were on a first name basis :)

Great location. Super friendly and helpful staff.  Alissa was wonderful.  We stayed in room 9 which was beautiful and reminded me of Hawaii.  The views of the beach from the large window was amazing.  The large lanai area is a bonus and full of more breathtaking views of the ocean.  Will stay here again.  So much better then the hustle and bustle of the over priced larger hotels in the area.

Summary Heading: A great find!  Perfect location. Super friendly staff.
Summary: The location is perfect. Everything you need for a vacation is within walking distance. The Inn has a lot of character.  It's cute, clean, and the staff was very attentive and friendly.  I will definitely return.

Awesome place to stay close to the beach, restaurants and bars.  Amazing patio with wonderful ocean views.  Would stay again if traveling with friends or a spouse. For a family vacation, I would most likely choose to stay at a larger hotel with more amenities and a pool. Overall very cool place.

Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay in Huntington!!
Summary: Perfect location, friendly and clean.  Right across from the beach and super close to all restaurants, coffee and bars.  The staff always goes over and above to make our stay enjoyable.  My kids and I love coming here every year!

The place was amazing! So cute! Has everything you need and the location is the best! I have never stayed someplace with such friendly staff! I was impressed how clean the bathroom was! When I first made the reservation I spoke with someone named Peggy and she was so helpful and sweet. Check in time I met Danny and he was the friendliest guy ever & so helpful checking in and leaving. As we were Leaving a woman who worked there cleaning the rooms walked by with her arms full, gave us a warm hi & do you need help taking your bags down..... I loved the vibe.... The location and the staff and can not wait to go back with my family!

Summary Heading: Cozy and convenient right on the beach.
Summary: Great property with outstanding staff.  Cute rooms and a nice patio where you can enjoy the beach and sunset.  Walking distance to everything you want to see in Huntington Beach.  I have stayed here both with my wife and other times just with friends.

We love the Inn!  It was my first choice to spend my birthday and Fourth of July.  Perfect sunset view from the deck. Each room is unique in decor, not "cookie-cutter", and each has comfortable beds and lots of pillows. The Inn's close proximity to shops and diners without the noise is a real plus. Park the car under the inn and walk anywhere! Rent bikes if you want. The ocean is directly across the PCH, and the pier is a five minute walk away. Huntington Beach has the best Fourth of July we've ever experienced, and the Huntington Surf Inn made it easier and more accessible to enjoy. We watched the parade from the deck.  We have stayed here many times and every time is very comfortable and enjoyable.  Thank you Danny and family!

Summary Heading: Visiting Southern California for a Wedding
Summary: The Huntington Surf Inn is the ideal venue for visitors looking to experience Southern California's surf and sand. The Inn is conveniently located near Main Street, the Huntington Beach Pier and only steps away from the beach. Although parking is available, we were a short walk from all the attractions and did not need to rent a car. Our hostess and host (Barbara and Danny) were extremely attentive to our needs - on one occasion staying up late to accommodate us when our flight was delayed. The perfect base for our Southern California adventure. We will definitely stay at the Huntington Surf Inn the next time we are in town!

I came with my 13yr old son looking for a comfortable place close to the beach and sites of the Huntington Beach community. We'd never been there before and the staff, Barbara and her husband, were extremely helpful with things to do and places to eat. We got a room with 2 queen beds. There was a fridge and a small table and bureau but that's pretty much all that is in the room itself. That's all we needed though. The AC worked well and kept us cool at night. The bathroom was clean and larger than I expected considering the room size. We didn't need anything more than that so for beach accommodations that you can see from the deck of this hotel, it was perfect. The deck allows you to check out the wave action when you wake in the morning as well as provide a place to hang before

Need a microwave in your room? Done.  Need more ice, done.  Need free WiFi, done.  Need to order a pizza to your room or any food, done!  This place will help you with anything you need.  The views from the rooms are spectacular,  and downtown Main st. and pier are in view and walking distance.  Their huge community balcony is smoking friendly with beautiful views of the ocean and sunsets.  I will only book  my vacations at this place when we visit huntington beach. Very friendly managers and owners. Love, love this Inn. Thank you Barbara and Danny for such a great stay everytime we're there. See you soon!

Wonderful non traditional hotel with only 9 rooms! Very accommodating. Nice, clean, close to everything. Free WIFI, fridge in room. Quiet. Nice cozy upper deck with beautiful views of the ocean. Managed by a very nice couple. Would definitely go back!

This is a great place to stay. Across the street from the beach, comfortable beds, clean rooms, nice bathroom and very friendly staff! The towels were very rough, but other than that I couldnt have asked for a better place!
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany, Thank you for your recent stay!  Thanks also for your kind comments.  Of note, while we no longer use fabric softeners at the Inn to avoid the rare allergy issue, we remain on constant lookout to make sure you have great products on hand such as brand new high quality towels. We look forward to  taking care of you again with your next visit. L. Han General Manager

Summary: This hotel is amazing!!  My girlfriend and I stayed here about a month ago just for a little getaway. The staff is extremely friendly and the manager is from Huntington beach so he had great insight on fun activities to do and great places to see. It's located right across from the beach and literally only two streets down from Main Street and the Huntington pier so your in perfect location to do anything hang out on the beach and hit the water, stroll down the pier, or see the nightlife on Main Street. The hotel even has a deck with an amazing view if you just feel like kicking back having a beer and watching the sunset. There is no question that this will be my future destination when traveling to Huntington Beach, and will be recommending it to all friends and family or

Summary Heading: Awesome location, clean, and unique hotel!
Summary: Our family stayed here in March 2016. We reserved two rooms and loved both of them! The hotel location is awesome--directly across the street from the beach. You can walk about 2-3 blocks down the street and cross over to the pier and the beach. The hotel was very clean, with newly renovated bathrooms. The hotel had beach chairs and umbrellas to borrow. The decor was so fun--our kids loved it! We like to stay in unique hotels, but sometimes the cleanliness or safety seems comprised--not the case here! We stayed in Room 1, which had a king sized bed and was on the corner overlooking the street and the ocean. It was a bit louder than the other room we stayed in because of its location on the street and it had a second window. The other room was Room 4, which had two queen beds.

I absolutely love this hotel and the staff ....they are absolutely the best.... friendly, helpful and nice....  They even had an extra set of dominoes to let us borrow-customer service was top notch !!!!  I would like to give a shout out especially to Danny, Barbara and assistant manager Alissa for everything they did during my stay and can't wait to come back in July !!!!!   Thank you again for everything!!!!

We had a great stay here!! Room was perfect, owners were awesome, and all the other guests were also friendly! Just a 5 minute walk to Main Street and right across from the beach! Room 1 had a nice view of the ocean from the room! We won't stay anywhere else when in Huntington. Thank you Huntington Surf Inn!

I love staying at this hotel. Every time I come to California, they are the first ones I think of. Staff is extremely friendly, rooms are super neat and always clean and the location is PERFECT. Highly recommended for your trip!

Summary Heading: the place across from the beach
Summary: the room was clean and the staff were friendly and took care of you. you get up in the morning get your wet suit on walk across the street and you are in the ocean ,you can't beat it ...after surfing you grab a cup of coffee and a great burrito. there's nothing fancy about the Huntington INN its the location and that makes it great

We stayed here for 2 nights.  The location is great.  It is a house away from a 7-11 and block away from a CVS.  Only a few blocks walk to great dining and shopping.  The room was clean and neat.  The beds were soft.  The bathrooms were redone last year and were beautiful stand in tiled showers.  The beach is right across the street but the entrance is maybe 1/2 block over.  The manager was really nice and helpful recommending restaurants, etc.  The themed rooms are a lot of fun.

Summary Heading: Great Inn at a great location
Summary: This little Inn has a great view in a great location right across from the beach and the Huntington Pier, Main Street were only 3 blocks away. I would recommend the Huntington Surf Inn to anyone. It is a cute little Inn and every room has its own theme, we had the surf themed room.  We went as a family for my daughters Jr. Beach Volleyball tournaments and we watched the AVP Pros play right down the beach from the Inn.  Everything is within walking distance, great restaurants, shopping and the beach. You couldn't ask for a better location.  The Managers were great friendly and easy to talk to, they provided us with a map and asked about my daughter’s tournaments it really a great stay.

The people that worked there were super nice & willing to help make the stay great. We walked to shops & restaurants. The beach is right across the street. I would stay there again. Not fancy but clean and the bathroom looked recently redone.
Manager Response: Dear panisjulie, Thank you so much for your recent visit, and your kind comments. We are a family owned beach hotel, and certainly aim to provide great value so that our guests can find "room" in their vacation budget for other exciting experiences in our wonderful town. Of course, you will still find features that belong to many fancy resorts, but in our place they are complementary, and our towels are just as thick! We are thrilled that you notice that the bathrooms are recently renovated also.  Best wishes for a great summer, and we hope to see you soon. L. Han

Summary: Excellent hotel, service, location, and overall experience. The rooms are amazing and the location is superb.  2 block walk to the pier and hot spots on Main Street. Will stay here again.  The rooms are unique.
Manager Response: Dear brianbeckav8, Thank you so much for your recent stay! We appreciate the fact that you notice that we stand apart in Huntington Beach (as well as up and down the coast) for the small hotel experience with complementary amenities, uniquely decorated rooms, and lots of TLC from the staff. We really value our repeat customers, and would be grateful for the opportunity to serve your family once again soon! L Han

Summary: Great small hotel,walking distance to the beach,pier,and downtown.                                         The room was clean and functional.The room was small and a little dark but served its purpose.The young couple running the hotel were super nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Lori A, Thank you so much for your kind comments about our managers and the Inn. Our goal is to provide you with great customer service in addition to great value for your stay. We just renovated our rooms and will always look for ways to serve you better!  L. Han

Summary: Easy in and out. Perfect spot. Everything you need. Friendly management. Lots of clean towels, all the amenities you need. Just far enough from the pier that you don't have all the craziness and just close enough that you can walk there in three minutes.
Manager Response: Dear arikreisler, Thank you for your recent stay and for noticing one of our hidden charms. We are indeed an oasis of peaceful relaxation surrounded by all the frenetic charms of the Pier and Main Street night life.  We also pride ourselves in our ability to provide you with the amenities of the big chain hotels while adding an element of fun with complimentary use of beach toys, boards, and personalized service. Thank you once again. Our staff looks forward to serving you again soon.  L Han

Summary Heading: I love everything about this place! Stayed here over 10 times last year!
Summary: When I first met the managers to Huntington surf inn,  Danny and Barbara, they were incredibly nice, friendly,  and so accommodating!  I only book a room there when I come to stay in H.B. I love the convenience of how close it is to downtown, and the view of the ocean is to die for from the balcony!  When I travel to H.B., I will only stay here! Worth every cent!  See you again soon!

Clean comfortable room (#1).  View from room and deck was great.  Great location, easy walking distance to all the action on Main Street and pier.  Stayed here while on business trip so only negative I can write is that there was no iron/ironing board in room - however to be fair,  I also did not bother asking the office if they had one for use.  Would stay again if in the area.

Summary Heading: Great spot close to everything in HB
Summary: I decided on booking here because of its proximity to the beach, close to the main HB strip and the price. We arrived a little bit early and we're happy that our room (number 5) was ready as it was an unusually cold and windy day and we just wanted to unpack and relax. We were able to park our car in a free parking spot downstairs and within minutes were unpacked in our room.  The room was great, the bed comfortable, the shower was hot and worked well and the wifi was spot on.  We had an issue with the tv and it was fixed right away, no problems. We also asked for beach towels and they were supplied straight away.  There was a deck area with a view of the waves up the beach north of the pier and to the other side you can see the start of the pier. Would be a cool spot to chill

Summary Heading: Great team, great location, great price
Summary: I called five or six places when researching my trip. Debbie was the first person I spoke with that I felt really cared about me as a customer, and cared about what I was looking for in a hotel during my stay. I was so glad I actually got to meet her during my stay! Everyone was really friendly and helpful with answering questions and helping me make the most of my trip.  The location was perfect, it is within walking distance from everything. But it is also far enough away from main street that it is quiet. And the view of the sunset couldn't be better!

Clean room  (no.5 in Surfer attitude ), walking  distance  to Main Street and  Pier. Safe  and comfortable Parking. We were welcomed very friendly and got  excellent advice for Restaurants. Highly recommended.

I've stayed here twice. It is the only place I like/want to stay at when visiting Huntington. The good folks that own/take care of the Inn are wonderful. They are super friendly and welcoming. The Inn is awesome. Comfy beds/pillows, roomy bath space, SUPER awesome rooms that are each creative and different. They even have beach towels, umbrellas and beach games you can borrow for FREE. All the rooms have microwave, fridge, flat screen tv with all channels including on demand watching. If that's not enough they are right next to the beach. Literally you just cross the road and you're on the beach. I forgot to mention you don't have to pay for parking!! (they may be the only place in California that does this).

Friendly staff, unique and clean rooms, very affordable nightly rates, new bathrooms, views of Huntington Beach, a short walk from downtown, free parking, cool patio for hanging out, free towels and beach chairs and toys for use on the beach provided by staff, the staff - Danny & Barbara - also gave us great recommendations and directions to restaurants and elsewhere in the area, very helpful. We would recommend Huntington Surf Inn and we will definitely stay here again if in the area.

Summary Heading: Great place and staff to make you feel welcomed!
Summary: Hate to give away the best place to stay while visiting the beach but this place is close to everything and shared patio is great to sit and enjoy ocean air. Great place for couple getaway or a group of friends to all get rooms and have privacy but all still be so close as the hotel is small and feels like family.

Summary Heading: A hidden gem right on Huntington Beach!
Summary: I book a room at the Huntington Surf Inn when I come down to run the Surf City Marathon.  The staff are so pleasant and the room is wonderful.  There is a nice deck from which to enjoy a friendly beverage and welcome a lovely sunset.  Cheers!

Summary Heading: California dreaming and the perfect location
Summary: At the last minute my Partner and I decided to beat the Minnesota cold and escape to warm southern California.  It needed to be easy, fast, inexpensive and most importantly fun.  We found all of this and so much more in the Huntington Surf Inn.    You know you have found a great place when the Manager on duty tells you, "I will let my Mom know you are coming" then to be greeted with a warm smile and "oh my Son told me about you" made it all the more perfect!  That is the hallmark of this property, personal warm service. Check in was a breeze and speedy, allowing our short vacation to begin without a hitch. These days to actually have someone check on you that your stay was good is nice, to have someone who REALLY cares is beautiful.    The room was very clean and very hip.  The

The Huntington Surf Inn was our base camp for a weekend in the LA area recently. It had come highly recommended from a friend who was also there at the same time. The rooms were reasonably priced and the location was great! We ended up with room 8 of 9 which was as far from PCH as possible but that's okay because it was nice and quiet. The views of Huntington Beach from the patio area of the hotel were a great way to start the day.   The bathroom was a nice surprise, much nicer than we expected, the bed was comfortable but not the best I'd ever had at a hotel. I slept well so it was sure good enough. There is a fridge in the room but no microwave so if you bring leftovers back home you better like them cold. The on site parking was perfect for our stay.   The staff was awesome!
Manager Response: Dear traviss698, We appreciate your recent stay and kind words. The bathrooms were recently renovated, as we strive to give you great value with your stay with frequent renovations during our winter season. We indeed have microwaves on site, they are available for check out at the front desk. We look forward to taking care of you again! L. Han

Summary Heading: Great Location, lovely Rooms, Good Vibe
Summary: Stayed for 2 Nights. On a Business Trip. Location great, close to iHop, Shops, Pharmacy, Beach etc. Surfer Vibe Feeling, great and lovely Staff. Felt comfortable, Rooms lovely, wanted to stay for longer:-))
Manager Response: Dear Miraesthetic, Thank you for thinking of us for your business trip. The Inn has high speed Wi-Fi and other amenities that will help the business travelers work efficiently so that there will be time left to enjoy your favorite beverages on our wonderful deck or to catch some of our famous waves across the street. Thank you again, and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect Stay in a Beautiful Location!
Summary: LOVE the uniqueness, history, and personality of this spot!  The owners are great, and I loved that each room is different and you pick your room when making the reservation!  Great location close to the buzz in Huntington Beach and the pier as well!
Manager Response: Dear KeriD, ...and we LOVE your review KeriD. Thank you for recognizing who we are and what we strive to be every single day for our wonderful guests. It has been a labor of love for all of us at the Inn. Hopefully we will have the opportunity to serve you again soon! L. Han

Summary Heading: Another trip, Another stay at HBI, Another flawless experience
Summary: Needed a place to stay in Cali for the New Year's Eve weekend as I was going to the LAST MOTLEY CRUE SHOW EVER!! Didn't want to stay in LA so we gave our friends at HBI a call and they had availability so we booked a Thursday-Sat stay at our home away from home.  We flew into John Wayne Airport and picked up the rental and headed to the Inn. We arrived very early (10:30 am) and said hi to Barbara and Danny who remembered us from our stay over the summer. Danny told me there was a guest in our room (#9) and he would call me when it was ready. So we walked 5 minutes to our favorite eatery in HB, Primos coffee/Sancho's Tacos to grab some coffee and grub...the food was awesome as usual and then we walked across the street to watch people play volleyball on the beach. At around 12:30
Manager Response: Dear Scott K, Welcome back Scott and what a way to celebrate the new year at the HSI :) You already know that you both are always welcomed as members of our extended family here at the Inn. I am sorry I did not get a chance to personally introduce you to other aspects of Vietnamese cuisine, but there is always next time. We are now almost done with bathroom renovations so that your next stay will even be nicer. Pick a weekend when the Red Sox will come in town, email me, and we look forward to seeing you again! Thank you for your kind words and your continued patronage Scott!! L. Han

Summary Heading: Great location- clean! updated bathrooms- friendly staff- would definitely stay again
Summary: Traveling with husband and daughters- looking for a quiet night after spending days in Pasadena at the Rose Bowl - This is our third trip to Huntington- hotel is a great location- very friendly and helpful staff- clean rooms and updated bathrooms, just across the street from the beach- there is a great deck you can sit on and watch the sights-
Manager Response: Dear Tilley1, Thank you so much for choosing the Inn for your lodging of choice in HB. Fortunately, as  you have noticed, the Inn attract visitors in the know who want to avoid the hustle and bustle of our colleagues that belong to the national chains while still being close to the pulse of all the fun activities of this town. We really appreciate our guests as, frankly, we really don't advertise much at all. A lot of the guests have become like family friends, and really make those long days running the Inn that much more rewarding as we all sit together and chat at the deck. Please accept our great appreciation for your visit, we hope to see you again soon! L Han

Summary: I love staying in locally owned hotels and this is one of them. The rooms are cool - decorated with surf themes. There is plenty of room and the shower is nice and big. It's not fancy but I would definitely stay here again. Location is great - 2 blocks from Main St and the Pier.
Manager Response: Dear Megan G We love that you love staying in mom and pops kinda places. We want to be a great value so that you can do it all in HB and still have some change left over for ice cream down the street on Main. The Inn is a labor of love for a bunch of well meaning folks like Danny, Barbara, Alissa, and Peggy...so I am grateful for your patronage and kind words Megan! See you soon. L. Han

Summary: We really wanted to stay here because the room featured a gigantic mural of Jimi Hendrix and Jimmy Page! Plus More! Great location and all the amenities you would need. Daniel was super nice and accommodating! We will definitely be back this summer to surf! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Jessica F I love your "Plus More!" comment!! very cool... That aside, I am glad that Danny was able to take great care of you, as that is what the Inn is all about. This summer come on down to surf with us. Everything is just across the street, and you can be in the water in a few minutes then be back to hang out with us and Jimi et al. We look forward to basking in your wonderful presence soon. Take care, L Han

Summary Heading: Great location, clean rooms, excellent service
Summary: Cozy little inn located just a couple blocks from the pier and the restaurant/shopping district around Main Street. Room was clean and roomy. Service was friendly and quite helpful. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear brian123... Nice interesting choice of nickname.  We also appreciate your choice of the Inn for your recent visit. The entire staff are proud of the fact that you have recognized that we are indeed so close to everything cool about downtown HB and yet still can provide you with a high value and well meaning experience. We hope to see you again soon and thank you always for your kindness. L. Han

Summary: Cute little spot I stayed in while attending a conference at the Hyatt that was sold out down the road. A pleasant 12-15 min walk to the congerence from the Surf Inn. Kitschy decor - it's a motel. Friendly staff. Do the next guest a favor and replace the showerhead in Unit #8 - it's like showering in laser beams. If the other units have that showerhead replace 'em all. Also consider better fans/venting in the bathroom which steams up instantly with water dripping from ceiling. This could be related to the showerhead btw as it is such thin streams it is likely turning to mist too quickly.
Manager Response: Dear Michael L, Thank you so much for your visit to the Huntington Surf Inn, and for taking the time to send us some heads up! The showerhead can be controversial...many guests do love the strength of the stream. Of note, we just remodeled the bathrooms and indeed incorporated new humidity sensing fans as you suggested. Hopefully you will be able to visit us again soon and test them out. Once again, please accept our gratitude for your stay and kind comments. L Han

Summary: Friendly staff at this small hotel with uniquely decorated rooms. The location is within walking distance to the beach, the pier and Main Street restaurants and shops. I chose it for those reasons, plus for the lower price. The website lets you choose which room you'd like to stay in. We had Room 2. Although the black paint was a little strange at first, it stayed dark, good for sleeping in. The bathroom was good sized and had a nice walk in tiled shower and a skylight. Only bummer was that the room does not come with a coffee maker, but having called ahead, I brought one. It was my friend and I with both of our sons (ages 7 & 8). It does get noisy with the traffic on the PCH, but we felt safe and would definitely stay here again!

I found Huntington Surf Inn on the Internet because I was looking for a place to stay on Pacific Coast HIghway since I was going to a concert at a restaurant on PCH and didn't want to drive all the way home afterwards.   Because I grew up at the beach (Hermosa Beach), I'm always attracted to all things beach-like and surf-like so I started with seeing the name; then loved the fact that it's not a huge place; then loved the fact that each room is different.  Once there, it was even better than I expected! So clean, great size room and closet; loved the creative pictures on the walls and the surfboard flusher on the toilet - all in all, I loved my stay and can't wait to go back for a week one of these days.

Friendly welcome; a real individual feel to the place - not an identikit hotel. Great position just across from the Ocean and near the pier. Ideal for taking in HB without need of a car.  Would certainly return.

Right across the street from the beach. There's a larger resort on the beach so no view from the rooms, but well kept and owners are always around and very helpful. My room was decorated in surf decor including a large mural on one wall. The shower was large and amazing, too. Highly recommend and will stay here again when back down in HB.

My wife and I stayed here 1 night Halloween eve so we wouldn't have to drive back to LA after a fun night at Oktoberfest. This place obviously is not a 5 star hotel so even though there are a lot of great reviews expectations need to be tempered. First of all, you can not beat this location. I can not recommend staying in Unit 9. it is the largest and quietest room with an amazing sunset view. The other rooms are nice too but not quite as nice as #9.  This is a nice family owned establishments that have that personal touch you don't get at a Holiday or Best Western.  Peggy, the owner's mom was fantastic. She provided us with a beach umbrella and bodyboard free of charge. She was gave us tips and let us park our car beyond checkout while we ate and shopped around. The hotel is

Summary Heading: Good, clean and right on the beach.
Summary: Mondo turbo wayrad cool! The language holds no higher praise. Nice rooms. Helpful staff. Free parking. Clean. Close to beach. A good value. Nice deck overlooking the beach. Easy walking distance to everything.

Danny and the staff at the HSI were just delightful... friendly and helpful.  Our room, which we stayed in last year, was once again clean and affordable.  Very short walk to the Pier and Main Street... cool!

The room was very clean and cozy. The decor was supremely kitsch, super clean bathroom and the bed was oh so soft, close to the pier, shopping and dining. No coffee in the room but has a fridge. Great coffee a short walk away.

I wouldn't normally take the time to review a hotel but Huntington Surf Inn definitely impressed me. It's a quaint little 9 room hotel located directly across PCH with easy walking access to everything downtown Huntington Beach has to offer. From check in to check out it was an enjoyable trip. Rooms are just the right size for up to 4 people. Nice mini fridge and good size bathroom. Don't expect the amenities like coffee in the room or a continental breakfast. But if you need chairs or toys or even boogie boards for the beach, they have them for you. I could rave all day about my stay, but you just have to experience it yourself.

Room had all we needed (i.e. refrigerator, close to beach, restaurants, etc.)  and was clean. Very friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are rather dark but that's not a problem if what you want most is sleeping. Staff would deal quickly with any rowdy behavior - a big plus! Fortunately we didn't encounter any.

Loved staying in this american flag astronaut themed room. Fun place to spend some great days in Huntington Beach. Staff was great, beds were comfortable, overall terrific experience! We're 3 60's women from Atlanta, OC and San Diego who take a fun weekend every year for 40 years and this was a highlight!

Friendly staff, clean room and bath room,, close too beach, comfertable beds, great wifi, Tv with movie channels.  .  Parking right under room.  Short way to all facilities like surfing, restaurants and shoping. Great stay for my son and I :-)

Great place excellent rooms in beach style decoration. We stayed in room 9 which is a detatched room from the rest of the hotel. Own parking space too. Friendly staff great place to stay. They don't do breakfast but in 2 minutes walk is a gas station where you can get refreshments for a very reasonable price. Rooms are very clean and tidy .

This is certainly a unique hotel. I am going to try to review it fairly, as it is in the category of a budget hotel, so you can't expect it to be as comfortable as a more expensive place.  We stayed for 2 nights on a weekend. The best feature of this place is the location, everything quite close and walkable. The managers are very friendly and helpful, and suggested good restaurants nearby. They provide towels and chairs for the beach, which is really handy. For a very casual or family get away for the beach, I guess this would be good. However - it really isn't exactly "cheap." Especially with all the taxes. Cons - the so-called "décor" was just weird and ugly. Our room was paneled in old, paint peeling siding. Not charming, unless you relish sleeping in an old shed. Ugly. I

Summary Heading: Great service, location, with a classic vibe.
Summary: Stayed here with my girlfriend during the summer and overall place was great.  Definitely a unique design to all of their rooms.  Rooms were clean and nothing noted.    Some of the things I thought were a plus were:  Boogie boards and Beach chairs to use for guests! Outstanding balcony with amazing views. Very friendly customer service. Seconds away from the beach, pier, and shopping area.   In particular Danny, an employee that I saw throughout my 3 day stay was very friendly.  Recommended me for a few places to go (we ended choosing his recommendation doing the party bus that stops at the triangle and newport for only $5 or so).  Very nice guy as was his lady friend. Funny they were taking care of a small puppy at the time there! Thank you for the friendly service.

We had the "Surf Room" with one wall covered with vintage surfing pictures.  Very friendly laid-back hotel.  I loved the skylight in the bathroom.  Our room was quiet, even though we were close to PCH.   No view from our room, but there was a nice hotel deck if one wanted to hang out and look at the ocean.

Summary Heading: Very affordable option on Huntington Beach
Summary: The Huntington Surf is a classic older property with no frills but plenty of character and friendly service.  The complimentary use of chairs, umbrellas and beach toys was very much appreciated.  The rooms are good sized and clean.  Parking was adequate.  The only recommendation we have for the Surf is to invest in better beds.  We found ours to be very firm and uncomfortable for us.  Otherwise, a great trip and would be a place we would consider again.

Great stay with warm, welcoming and informative managers.  Danny and Barbara are the best!  We loved Huntington Surf Inn with its quirky rooms and great location. They make you feel like family. Can't wait to visit again.

Visiting the beach in Southern California during the summertime can be impossibly expensive. We have a large family and were looking for a budget friendly escape to meet and gather at. While we did not all stay at this inn...we did gather and enjoy one another's company on the wonderful deck over looking the stunning Pacific Coast.   This inn has only 9 rooms. Each room is decorated in a different way~~ our particular room had a large rock n roll mural on the back wall and black glittery ceiling. The idea that the inn is small was appealing to me. I love to lounge at large hotels...but my heart is always seeking a unique ~~ smaller~~ more individualistic place to stay...and the Huntington Surf Inn covered this completely. This inn is right on PCH. You simply hoof it down a block

This was a great location in Huntington Beach.  The owners on property were so nice and friendly. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will stay here again the next time we are in HB.  Two blocks from 5th Street where it all starts.  Coffee place next to Sanchos was nice and close - very important!

Very nice management, very friendly, clean rooms, nicely decorated. A great place close to the beach and to the pier. Beach towels and umbrell and boggie boards for free. We stayed here the second time and will come back!

We stayed here as part of our California road trip and it wonderfully served our needs.  Across the street from the beach, local shopping and restaurants, it was the ideal location.  The hotel staff were very accommodating to our late arrival and departure.  Highly recommend it for fun and relaxed accommodations.

Summary Heading: Our stay at Huntington Surf Inn
Summary: We loved our room, it was clean, quiet, and decorated super neat. The help from the office was super nice. This is our 5th time coming here and we'll be back next year! One of the things we like, the rooms are each decorated in a different beach theme.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near the beach
Summary: Walking distance to Huntington Beach. You literally cross the street and you're there.  Awesome people run this place and the rooms are clean and just what you need.   Close walking distance to shops, restaurants and the pier. I recommend 23° for burgers and beer.

Summary Heading: Great Retro Feel and Perfect Location
Summary: Nice rooms with a different theme in each room. You clearly get the retro feel in this renovated motel. The management is great and you feel welcome once you arrive.  They have complimentary towels, beach chairs, boogie boards, and a deck you can relax and watch the sunset in the evenings. One thing I wish they had was a coffee maker in the room but otherwise, wonderful!  Would come back again!
Manager Response: Dear Rowena N, We appreciate your kindness in taking the time to write this review. The entire staff is proud to provide you with an old time approach to lodging, and our retro feel hopefully will bring you a little closer to the beach vibe of this great surf town.
