We will continue to provide added values like beach towels, boogie boards, etc... so that you can just come without much encumbrance and enjoy the best of Southern California culture.  We hope to see you again soon, and please know that we appreciate your business. L. Han

Summary: Very nice rooms very close to main St and the beach can't get a better deal than this. Highly recommended and would rate it higher if I could. The rooms are beach themed and kept clean has fridge TV and nice bathroom. They even let you borrow boogie boards towels and other stuff for the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Rcongelliere, Thanks so much for your recent stay and kind review. We are really grateful to you for bringing up our goal to be a high value lodging for our guests by providing reasonable rates and meaningful perks to go along with our customary exemplary service. Thank you also for mentioning our bathrooms. They were recently remodeled to accommodate your beach lifestyle, with large showers and comfortable tilework. We look forward to serving you again soon. L. Han

Summary: Small, boutique type inn.  No frills but has everything you need.  Very clean. Close to beach and downtown.  Has a small outdoor deck you can view the beach and ocean. The management is very friendly and accomodating.  Can't wait to come back to HB.
Manager Response: Dear debzster, Thank you so much for your recent review. July is a busy time at the Inn, and we appreciate your patronage. Since we are a small local property, our "frills" center on great customer service and meaningful money saving items like complementary Wi-Fi, parking, and use of beach items like boogie boards, chairs, etc.. to allow our guests to have an honest experience like we all used to do in great beach towns like Huntington Beach. We hope to have an opportunity to serve you again soon, and thank you much for your visit! L Han

Summary Heading: Great Stay, close to EVERYTHING you want and need in Huntington Beach!!
Summary: Stayed at the HBI July 15th -19th. Was going to see the Red Sox in Anaheim and we usually stay in Newport Beach but traveled a little north to Huntington Beach to get a little more night life and surf feel. Very glad we did. Literally a 5 minute walk to the Pier, the beach, the best coffee shop for breakfast (Primos) and tacos for lunch and dinner (Sanchos). All the surf shops and restaurants are a 10 minute walk away. You can't find a better location IMO. The hosts (Barbara and Danny) were extremely friendly and I met the owner (Long Hahn sp?) the night before we left. He was an avid baseball fan (Cubs) and an all around great conversation and generous. So much so that he brought my wife and I and our guest Vietnamese sandwiches for our ride home the next day. I can honestly
Manager Response: Dear Scott, What a pleasure to have met you, your wife, and your guest a couple weeks ago! Danny, Barbara, and I thank you for your kind words. They perfectly captured who we are and what we stand for at the Inn. As a business, the Inn tries hard to give guests an honest stay with great customer service and meaningful amenities. Our goal is to have satisfied customers who, in many cases, also have become friends that we look forward to welcoming back each year. In your case, your humble, down-to-earth, and straightforward style, in addition to being fellow Red Sox fans, made it easy to appreciate your patronage of the Inn.  Once again, allow me to thank you for your generous words and your warm friendship. Let me know how we can serve you in the future. Hopefully the Cubs will win something someday and we can both laugh over it! L. Han

Summary: My friend and I stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn for a long weekend.  This is a no frills place with only 9 guest rooms.  The rooms are clean and comfortable and each one has a different theme.  The bathrooms were fairly clean as well although they could use some extra care.  If you arrive at night, make sure you close the bathroom door when you go to bed as there is a skylight in the bathroom and it gets awfully bright in the AM.  While the inn is just across the Pacific Coast Highway and you can see the ocean from the inn, you can't really see the ocean from the rooms.  That said, there is a nice deck you can sit on and relax while looking at the surf.  There is no place to work out at the inn nor do they have coffee or breakfast.  The great part about the location though is
Manager Response: Dear WPIBeaver, Thank you so much for your recent visit and review. Our hotel is a 9 room inn with a decidedly different focus than your typical chain hotel. We keep prices lower than our peers and our frills are those that make your stay more meaningful such as exemplary customer service, free beach gears, free high speed Wi-Fi, and free parking, as you kindly noted. Because of our small size and the fact that we are frequently sold out, the free parking is indeed limited to one spot per room. Overall, our aim is to have our guests have a fantastic yet economical experience in our wonderful beach town.  We appreciate once again your visit, and wish you happy travels. L. Han

Summary: Excellent location, very friendly and clean. Free parking. Close to the city center and just to cross the road to go surfing and swimming. Great staff and kids were very happy to be able to use the morrey boards in free access. Hope to come back soon because we loved Huntington.

Very nice location near the beach and pier. Friendly and helpful staff. Free parking and free loan of beach gear. We would definitely stay here again on the next trip to LA! Tony, Caroline and Beatrice

Very clean, they gave us boogie boards to use, and the receptionist was smokin hot! Covered parking was nice. Very close to the shops on main street as well. The rooms were painted very creative and the bathroom was classy and stocked! I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Robert M,  Thank you for the enthusiastic comments about the Inn, and about Barbara, our assistant manager! We recently remodeled our rooms to continue our homage to the Southern California surfing culture. The Inn is indeed a labor of love for the owners, managers, and staff, and we appreciate the opportunity to serve you again soon!  Best regards, L. Han

Summary: Each room has its owne unique beach theme. It was so close to the beach and to main st. we never move are car. I would recommend this this hotel.  The staff was very friendly. The room are clean. They are not fancy but I thought were very rooming for 2 people.
Manager Response: Dear Ann I, Thank you for your recent stay, and for posting that interesting surfing picture in room 5. I am glad you took advantage of our complementary covered parking and great location as you found everything within close reach of the Inn. As you noticed, the Huntington Surf Inn is a property quite different from the chain properties of the area. We are a lodging that harkens to the simpler days of Americana beach travel. We keep things simple, but do provide you with all the cool amenities like fast WiFi, free parking, beach toys/boogie boards, beach towels, etc... so that you can relax and just focus on a great beach adventure. Take care and hope to see you again soon,  L. Han

Summary Heading: Great Place with a Local Feel
Summary: My husband and I found this place over a year ago and now it is our 'Go To' when we visit Huntington. I've stayed at resorts in the area before but this place makes you feel like a local. It's small, only 9 rooms, which makes it feel more laid back and personal than chain hotels. The manager and his wife are so friendly and hospitable, they are always ready with a smile and a recomendation to make your trip more enjoyable. The rooms are clean and updated with new furnishings and decor, not old, or overdone and stuffy like others in the area. The sun deck is perfect for having your coffee on in the morning, sun lounging during the day or hanging out at sunset. The hotel is right across the street from the beach and one block down from the main beach entrance. Sure, it's not a

Summary Heading: Love it and won't stay anywhere else
Summary: So easy close to the beach, Main Street, and never have to move your car. Clean rooms small and a bargain compared to the Hilton and other on PCH hotels. It might be tight with kids but as far as just an anniversary with just the wife at the beach you couldn't find a better place

This hotel is fantastic I recommend anyone staying in Huntington to check this place out first when looking to book a place to stay! Super friendly staff who went above and beyond for us. Easy to book a room online or over the phone. They let us park there before our checkin time and when we called ahead our room was ready early for us! Very clean rooms all with a unique look and feel! Staff gave us a map of the area and recommended all different types or restaurants to try! When it's time to go to the beach it's only a short 5 mintue walk away. The staff has everything available to you that would would need for the beach! Sand toys, boogie boards, soccer balls, volleyballs, paddle boards seriously everything even chairs and umbrellas!! So wonderful to have especially when

The staff here is friendly but that does not make up for the old funky rooms that are musty and loud next to pch. The other reviews were misleading and we wished we had not booked in advance as we wanted to leave when we got there.  It seems like they tried some renovations but it feels like a shabby motel.
Manager Response: Dear bhresort, Thank you for your stay, and your recent review. We are a small property that, at its heart, is a beach inn. We want to be different from local chain hotels and hope that guests would appreciate the Inn's universally praised customer service, beach amenities, and cool décor that reflect the casual life of sun, sands, and surf. With regards to noise, Huntington Beach is certainly not a sleepy beach town. Our proximity to its dynamic Pier and downtown, as well as PCH, will indeed mean that the hotel is in the middle of a lively environment. Our best wishes to you for further discoveries of fun destinations and interesting lodgings in your travels. L Han

Summary Heading: An excellent hotel in a great spot with really friendly and helpful staff
Summary: We stayed in room 9 which is one of their two largest rooms. The accommodation was very good and the theming in the room was well done. The location is stunning; 50 yards from the beach and the room has nice views over it. The staff are very friendly and gave some great recommendations for what to do in the area. We slept really well, the hotel is on the PCH but it's quiet. All in all, very happy to recommend Huntington Surf Inn.

Summary Heading: Great Boutique Hotel on the Pacific
Summary: Stayed 4 nights over Memorial Day and it was a great experience from check in to check out. We had Room 9 and it was spacious, clean, and comfortable. Love the large shower with window opening to a view of the Pacific. The beds could be a little softer and the walls are thin, so you do hear people and noise outside. The views are great and location is perfect. You are very close to the main street and pier with lots of restaurants and shopping within walking distance. The beach access is right across the street and the bike path was great for running with optimal views of the ocean. The managers were exceptional and always helpful.

We had so much fun staying here. You are in the best location right across from the beach and a short walk away from coffee, CVS and main street. Danny checked us in and was super cool. We stayed in Room #9 and it was shockingly clean and cute in person, the pictures do not do it justice. We stayed here for one night and stayed at a local fancy hotel for a few nights, as soon as we got to the other one we immediately said we miss the surf inn.

We looked at a lot of hotels prior to traveling to Huntington Beach but the Surf Inn really stuck in my mind because of how cool all of the rooms looked. We booked our reservation last minute and only stayed for one night but I wish we had stayed longer. The room was clean and even cooler than it looked in pictures. The deck outside gives clear views of the ocean, which is just across the street! The shower was amazing (a good bathroom is crucial to me when choosing a hotel) and the toilet flusher was a little surfboard on a wave! The room came with all of the amenities you could ask for (toiletries, hair dryer, wifi, cable, etc.) but without being a cookie cutter hotel. The staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful. The woman who check us in (owner??) was so sweet and

Summary Heading: Awesome boutique hotel in Huntington beach with great view of Pacific
Summary: What a great location on PCT right across the beach and within easy walking distance of the pier.  Loved the deck outside that you can see the ocean from.  Nice friendly and helpful staff. Close to the shopping and restaurants like Duke's.

Summary Heading: Right across the beach, walking distance from the center
Summary: This small inn features 9 "surf themed" rooms and a large communal deck overlooking the Ocean. Rooms and deck (and desk) are all on the second floor, while the first floor (street level) is a garage for the guests' cars.  We had room number 3 which was spacious, with 2 comfortable queen beds, a drawer, a small fridge, tv, table and chairs and a rather large bathroom with a lot of space for wet/sandy beach equipment (you can hang your wetsuit comfortably).  Wi-fi is provided, while breakfast is not (but there are loads of places to have breakfast nearby).  The inn is on Highway 1 so you can expect a bit of traffic, but the rooms all face a smaller street and they are reasonably sheltered by the deck, so all in all nights were quiet and restful.  When we checked-in we discovered

We really loved the themed room and the great deck outside that you could see the ocean from. Quick walk to all the restaurants and shops. Very helpful and considerate owners. Would definitely stay again.

Just got back from the Huntington Surf Inn and I am so happy with everything! It is a comfortable hotel with all the amenities that anyone could want-location within walking distance to everything, parking, beach towels, boogie boards, cool rooms, patio with a view, nice owners who are available and ready to help and so much more. My sons absolutely loved the decor in the rock n' roll room and the cozy, safe atmosphere the hotel provided. We will be back there next time we visit, it is a gem! Thank you Huntington Surf Inn!

We are city folks in LA and this is our 3rd time coming back to the Huntington Surf Inn.  It is nice to get away from the metallic city and be by the beach.  Every time we are here  we experienced nothing but positive experiences.  And, this time is no different.  We checked in late and found that our beautiful blue boutique room was still reserved for us.  Staff was pleasant and welcoming.  Upon entering the room we noticed it was recently remodeled, the furniture, beds, and bathrooms.   It looked very GOOD!  For those of you who are looking to stay at a unique place, this is it!   It is not a cookie cutter hotel room like the others.  It was recently remodeled by the famous designer, HGTV Antonio guy.   I heard he was also the original designer of this place.  Theirs is a

My friend and I went for the last weekend of spring break and had an amazing time! Check-in was at 3, but we got there a couple hours early and our room was ready which was awesome! I absolutely adored how each room had a different theme. It's the perfect distance from everything! Main St. and the pier are a one minute walk away. The little deck had an awesome view of the beach as well. The owners were so nice and welcoming. I'll definitely be coming here again!

As a 20 year old college student from Irvine coming here for spring break vacation recently with my 2 other college friends, we stayed at Huntington Surf Inn.  They have a parking structure downstairs for guests which makes it convenient especially at the beach location.   The parking lot was neat and clean.  Upon checking in with friendly staff, we found our room to be pleasantly clean and nice with a cold refrigerator.      The bathroom is AWESOME---beautifully decorated and clean  as we have been told by management it was recently remodeled.   There is so much to do in the daytime within walking distance.  Nighttime is nice and quiet.  No rowdy crowds.  All this on top of being across the street to go surfing…….WOW! WOW! WOW!    My friends and I highly recommend you beach

This is an excellent location for a surf holiday.  Amazing customer service with all the nice touches of a family run business.  Fridges in the rooms, free beach towels, boogie boards, umbrellas and chairs.  Great surf styled rooms and comfy beds. Thanks for the great stay!

I have stayed here before and decided to return based on my previous great experience. Rooms are cool,clean, interesting, staff was friendly, owner was very accommodating. Loved the proximity to the beach. When I travel, location matters the most to me, along with value and customer service. I will return the next time I am in town

Friendly staff, very helpful with any questions about the area. Very convenient location to downtown and beach. Nice little family run place in a great location, with neat decorating in all the rooms. We would stay here again.

Summary Heading: Not Bad but not that great
Summary: Decently kept ma & pop motel on the Pacific Coast Highway with decent views of the ocean from the communal deck (Which we enjoyed using to watch the sunset).  The owners were VERY nice and helpful, very personable. Each room is decorated differently so it was fun picking out a room, but over all, this place is not as nice as the website makes it out to be.  For the money, we would have been better off staying a few more miles inland to get a nicer place and driving to the beach.  I also thought it was interesting that the majority of the furniture in our room (room 2) was from Ikea.  If you are dead-set on staying on the beach and don't want to spend a fortune, this place would be ok but overall I don't think I would recommend this place.

I would like to preface this review with the fact that we travel often and stay in hotels on almost a monthly basis; this will be the very first time I have ever written a negative review. Pulling up the the motel was very underwhelming. There were flies everywhere when we parked and it's just not the fanciest from the outside, which is ok. We checked in and the lady has crazy hair like she just woke up, but she's nice enough. When we get to our room our first impression is positive. It's a boutique style and fairly large with a good-sized bed. Upon further inspection, though, we found black hairs in the bed and all over in the shower, mold along the outside of the shower doors, and stains on the comforters as well as the towels. That night the traffic and bystander noise was so

This was a great throwback hotel. Took me back to my younger days when you actually needed a "key" to get into the room. Staff was great. Hotel near everything and has the basics in the room. We had a great time. My daughter loved it too!

I stayed here for a business trip and absolutely loved it! The staff was attentive and so nice! Plus, it's right by the beach and restaurants. The rooms are all uniquely decorated and spacious with really nice bathrooms. There was also a spot outside where you could sit and hangout while enjoying a couple beers. All in all it was a great place to stay and I will definitely be back!

We stayed hereat the last minute when all rooms were filled in Anaheim . Great choice.  Small , quiet clean, on PCH.  You can see the pier from the deck. Remember, this is a older beach  Hotel that has survived. So every thing is basic. The shower weas the best in the last three hotels we have been too. Traveling now before Europe . Walking distance to great food, either on the pier or Fred's Mexican on the corner. 7-11 on the corner for fuel or small things. Surf shops, Beach life , I wisoh I had a week. Thanks Danny door squeezing us in the last room.

I chose the Huntington Surf Inn for myself and a group of coworkers while on a business trip, as opposed to just another Best Western, etc. We loved it and had a great time - the location was stellar, close to the beach and to great restaurants, and the rooms are adorable (I chose it because of the uniquely decorated rooms). Great little spot, we would all stay there again!

Can't ask for a better location as far as proximity to the beach and shopping opportunities. The room was decorated so cool, I took pictures and sent them to friends. Very comfortable bed and the room was immaculate!!! Cleanliness trumps everything in my decision on where to stay. When I visit Huntington Beach again, the Huntington Beach Inn will be the place for me.

We enjoyed the Surf Inn at Huntington Beach Ca. The room décor was eclectic and fun.  The proximity to shops, great dining and the beach was all within easy walking distance.  The beds were comfortable. the rooms clean and the staff was great.

Nice small hotel close to Huntington Beach pier and shops.  Room 1 has great view of ocean from front window. Room is large and comfortable. Not like your everyday motel.  Deck is nice to sit on in the afternoon, but be aware that if you have room 1, 2, or 3 you will hear people talking while they are sitting on the deck at night.  No coffee maker in the room, but nice little coffee shop 2 blocks down the street.  I stayed here by myself and felt secure and comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this to friends and family.

This was a great hotel nice friendly staff awesome location. Danny and Barbara are really nice people very helpful. They do a great job keeping up with the rooms very clean. Hotel has a good view to the beach.

We had our friend's stag here over a weekend and booked the whole place out.  It was perfect: great staff (Danny and Barbara), awesome location (beach, nigh life, shopping), and great rooms (each has its own style).  The hotel supplied beach chairs and boogie boards which was great.  Cheers Danny and Barbara!  Piotr

I stayed at the Surf Inn when running Surf City race. The owners of the hotel are really nice and very flexible. I came in 3 hours before the official check in time and the room was ready. Not a problem at all to check out late or leave my car at their parking lot for the rest of the day until my flight time. The rooms themselves are super-cool. Now, if you are craving 55 layers of covers in a room that looks like a part of Palace of Versailles, forget about it. This is *Surf* inn, a super-chill place. Walls have cool murals and the furniture is minimalist, but comfortable. The rooms are clean and, I'd say quiet. The location is awesome, literally across the street from the beach, right next to downtown. Will definitely come back next time I am in the area.

This hotel is a hidden gem!  Great place to stay. Loved the beach vibe decorations in the room. Friendly staff, great deck to view ocean/sunset.  Just a few steps to the pier.  Wish I'd discovered it sooner!  Will DEFINITELY be back!

By far the friendliest host I've ever met. The rooms are full of character, are clean and comfy. The location is great. I loved my stay here - I just wish it was for longer! This place was recommended to me by a friend and I was not disappointed. Thank you. X
Manager Response: Dear AL51GAV, Thank you so much for sharing your kind thoughts. We stand apart from other fine establishments in HB by our dedication to customer service, good value for your travel dollar with complementary amenities like parking, Wi-Fi, and beach gears, and interesting rooms decorated by the supercool Design Star Antonio Ballatore. We really appreciate your patronage, and treasure the fact that you were referred by another guest. We promise you that we will continue this tradition of service, and look forward to your return. Thank you. L Han

Summary Heading: It was a great stay, really enjoyed it.
Summary: The guy who ran it was excellent. Very customer focused and friendly. Rooms were kept clean overall stay was great! Free body boards and towels are free to use for the beach. Takes about 1 minute to walk to the pier from hotel. I would recommend to anyone interested staying in Huntington.
Manager Response: Dear Cmpayne, Thank you so much for your recent stay. Complementary use of beach gears was something we have implemented to add to the fun factor of your stay. Why not have a good lodging experience and still be able to have some loose change left for ice cream on the beach is an important part of our philosophy. We appreciate your kind sentiments, and look forward to serving you again soon. L Han

Summary: I think I set my expectations too high based on the other reviews. The rooms are large, but the paint color choices are an eyesore. The towels and linens are dingy. I couldn't lock my room door; I had to lock it from the outside and then shut it. I couldn't find anyone to tell about the lock or to ask the wifi password (rang at the front desk and called a few times). I know, I should go enjoy the beach (which is super convenient), but I had some work to do. I think for the price (and I do like to support smaller inns), I would actually choose to stay at one of the more established hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Sam B, I would like to thank you for your recent stay. Your constructive comments are certainly valued and factor in our evaluations of how to serve our guests better. I hope we will have an opportunity to serve you again as certainly you have had an atypical experience at the Inn. Of note, our paint colors are indeed different from those of the typical lodgings. Hopefully our iconoclastic approach to room decorations will give a sense for our beloved guests of the fun of life at the beach and the Inn. L Han

Summary: I stayed here in the beginning of October and I loved it. The staff are SO helpful and friendly. They have body boards and beach towels that you can use for free. They told me where to find the best/cheapest bike rental, surf lesson, and food. All of their recommendations turned out to be great! It is close to all amenities, shopping, food etc. Can't get a better location than this. The rooms are really cool, and big. I stayed in room 1 and the view of the beach was great. A/C worked perfectly and the shower was pretty neat too. They have a nice little patio area to sit as well. The room was very clean and well maintained. Staying right on the beach isn't cheap but I think this place is one of the least expensive. I plan on staying here again next summer! Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear sohnias, Thank you very much for your recent visit. You are indeed astute for noticing that lodging space is in high demand by the beaches of HB. We are very proud to be able to still provide a great beach presence while maintaining a nice personal experience and reasonable cost for our guests. We of course are always looking for ways to improve and just completed a refresh of our rooms, including cool designs from Antonio Ballatore, the original designer of our iconic rooms. We appreciate your nice review, and look forward to you joining our ranks of frequent flyers!! L Han

Summary: so delighted to discover this gem at the beach . The rooms are large , room 1 is has a sea view.you can borrow beach towels , body boards etc for free.Perfect location. Huntington is so beautiful. Really friendly owners , typical of the laid back friendliness of the town . We didn't want to leave .
Manager Response: Dear Annie B, We agree that you should not leave. HB is just a gorgeous place where life feels good. Our staff at the Inn embraces this beach lifestyle as we are locals who surf and ride our bikes and do what you do! Thank you for your appreciation of our town, our Inn, and our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon. L. Han

Summary Heading: Great location, swell staff, close to Surf City Marathon start
Summary: I stayed here Feb 2014 the night prior to the Surf City Marathon in Huntington Beach.  Good location near the beach, quiet, helpful staff.  The owner left each resident a case of bottled water as we were likely all Mara-runners.  Interior decore of the place was unique - I was in Unit # 5 - each room is different / special.  Price was spendy, but so is everything in So-Cal (Paradise).
Manager Response: Dear PDG2, It has been almost a year since you visited. We want to thank you for your kind patronage and appreciate that you remember little details like the complementary case of water for each of the marathoners. The Inn is always about good karma. We want to provide you with a good experience for the money, and anything we can do for you...we shall! Thank you again for thinking of us and we hope to see you again soon. L. Han

Summary: What a wonderful place, can't say enough positive things about this hotel. The most hospitable staff, Danny and Barbara are truly wonderful! Awesome location, cozy rooms, beautiful view... Just got home and counting the days until I can go back! Thanks for everything!! See you next year !
Manager Response: Dear Lishdeekay, Thank you for your recent stay. Danny and Barbara appreciate your sweet comments and stand by ready for your return. We try hard to give you a fantastic experience, and our goal is to combine great value with best of class customer service. We wish you a new year filled with fun travel, and hope to see you very soon! Take care, L. Han

Summary: This place is all about the location, simply unbeatable position a stone throw away from huntington beach. Rooms simple but  individual and cool designs. Owners are really nice and helpful too. Definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Steve R.  Thank you for your kind words. We will hold you to your promise to be back, and look forward to serving you beter in the future. We just redecorated our rooms, and we would appreciate your presence to enjoy them with us.  Take great care and have a happy and healthy new year.  L Han

Summary: Stayed here with my wife and 2 young daughters, we all agree that this place is awesome!  The location is terrific, waking distance to everything, the beach, the pier, Main Street, everything. The staff is very friendly and helpful, they have beach chairs, toys, etc. that you can use at no charge. The shared deck/patio is great to see an awesome view and just chill out for a bit. The Surf Inn is much better than the cookie cutter hotel chains...we will definitely be back. We love Huntington Beach and the Surf Inn makes it even better!
Manager Response: Dear jazzpitt88,  We really appreciate your comment about the fact that we are not the cookie cutter chain hotel. We take pride in the fact that our guests have not only the authentic beach experience but also total access to modern amenites like awesomely fun rooms, high speed internet, and covered parking. The deck is certainly a great gathering place for us. We have met so many friends there over a glass of wine at sunset, and we really look forward to your return!!  Take care and have a great new year.  L Han

Summary: I booked all nine rooms for a weekend for my wedding in Sept 2014.  The location is awesome being right opposite the beach and only 2 minutes walk from Main Street.  There are convenience stores just around the corner for all your needs.  The staff were superb throughout and accommodated all our needs.  The rooms are spacious and well equipped.  The best feature of the hotel is the awesome raised deck that has an incredible view of the sunset.  As the rooms all have fridges it's great to have a drink here and watch the sunset.  I highly recommend this hotel.

Situated just across PCH with a view of the ocean. The shared deck area made for a great place to meet other guests, sip a glass of wine and watch the sunset. Danny, the manager is super friendly and helpful. No complaints, I have already booked my next stay.

This place is a GEM!! Perfect location. We walked everywhere and easily went back to the hotel twice to drop off shopping bags and grab swimsuits and it was no big deal. The rooms are so fun! The decor is awesome. The beds are comfy. The bathroom and showers are new and clean. They have a patio area to sit and relax with a great view of the beach and ocean. Looked like there was a grill available too. They also have beach chairs, towels, sunscreen, volleyballs, etc. available to use for free. We grabbed some chairs and went down to the south side of the pier for a fire on the beach. The managers, Barbara and Daniel,  were SO friendly and personable and you can tell they work hard and enjoy what they do. You MUST stay here!!! I will absolutely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Harley87,  Thanks so much for the heartfelt review. We love our guests and really appreciate the privilege of having met so many wonderful folks from across the world. Danny and Barbara's kindness and joie de vivre are indeed buoyed by great guests like you, and we hope to see you again very soon! Take care,  L. Han

Summary: Yes, it's a motel, but what a motel!  Great decor, nice shower, excellent management!  The fabulous deck with a sweeping view of Surf City all the way to Long Beach and the Palisades!  Plus free covered parking!  Walking distance to EVERYTHING!  Very comfy beds!  All in all a fabulous destination stay!

Directly across the street from the beach and 1 block from downtown HB.  Great stay.  Themed rooms made it a non traditional room. But very fun.  This is not the hilton. But a very clean motel with on site management.  Wonderful people who run this inn.  They made sure towels were always abundant and very personable.  Room very clean.  Comfy beds.  Boogie boards, sunscreen, umbrellas, etc are available at no charge.  This is definitely a beach motel that is very well kept.  Would stay here again.

My daughter and I enjoyed our stay with Huntington Surf Inn, the managers of the hotel were very pleasant and friendly.  The walk to the beach effortless and the views outstanding.  Oh how I miss being there,  will definitely stay again whenever I am able to visit again!

Stayed there 4 nights, got a discount for multiple nights (although still pricy!).  They have loaner beach stuff which makes enjoying the beach easy.  The Sunset from the raised common patio area is fantastic.  AC blows much more on one bed than the other... expect the classic room temperature argument if you're not staying alone.

Summary Heading: Great time in HB and comfortable clean digs
Summary: I booked this spot to attend the HB Music Festival last weekend. If you want a hotel chain environment this is not the place for you. But if you like interesting, chill, fun atmosphere, then I would recommend room 5 with the surf decor.  Management are young, hip, charming and helpful. Everything as clean and comfortable.  This is a small plac in the heart of HB across from the beach.  If you travel a lot and are often disappointed, don't blame the place....it's your karma.  Michele

We stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn for one night on our way to Disneyland last week.  It was our first time out in California, and we wanted to have a night on the ocean.  The location of the hotel could not be more perfect.  The pier and Main Street are a 5 minute walk away.  The beach is right across the street, and the excellent deck provides a great view of everything.  The deck was also the perfect location for my wife and I to relax while the kids went to sleep in the room.  Right next door you can find a 7-11 where you can purchase coffee, beer and snacks.  Check in was very fast and efficient.  We had been in our room for 5 minutes when the owner knocked on the door with extra towels in hand.  We were provided great information on the area both at check in and check

We've stayed here 6 or 7 times - if you want a laid back place to stay while you're in HB - STAY HERE!!!  The ocean is across the street, downtown HB (& the pier) is a couple blocks away, beer right down the stairs at the 7-11, awesome tacos a block away at Sancho's and a nice raised deck to hang out on.  Just park your car, and you won't need it again until you are done with HB and on your way back home.  Great people running the place - not much more you can ask for!!  Once again - STAY HERE!!

By far the best hospitality I have received at a hotel!!! The manager was the nicest guy, even brought us extra towels and check to make sure everything was as we expected. I will definitely be coming back! The room was so quaint and right off the main balcony where we watched the sunset with a glass of wine. Totally exceeded my friends and my expectation. Highly recommended!!!

This was our 2nd time here and we really like it. The young couple who manage it, Barbara and Daniel,  are friendly and efficient. Free boogie boards, beach chairs and beach towels. You can walk everywhere. Simple rooms. We will be back again.

Everyone there was extremely nice and took care of anything we needed without hesitation. Even got a call for something we left and it is being shipped back. Thanks Danny! I would recommend Huntington Surf Inn to anyone looking for a place to stay in Huntington. Great location and killer vibes.

Great laid back hotel with unique artwork by pro surfers just a 5minute walk from the hustle and bustle of Huntington bars and beaches. You're better off here than the over-priced resort hotels. Free car parking, cool staff and owners!!

It takes a certain kind of person to appreciate a hotel like this. Everything about it was like you were staying with friends at beach house. Managers are down to earth, the vibe is low key,rooms are clean and location doesn't get any better.  I look forward to returning. :)
Manager Response: Dear whitney u, Thank you very much for your kind words and your recent stay. You are 1000% right about our place, and we are so grateful for that! The entire staff of the Inn wants to give our guests the fun beach house experience of the carefree life of Southern California sun, surf, and sand, and to combine that with the best in customer service items like beach gears, Wi-Fi, and parking. Our guests have typically become friends, and your return visits are something we dearly look forward to as the chance to revisit and catch up with each other. In that thought, we hope to have the opportunity to serve you soon. Take care, L. Han General Manager

Summary Heading: Location, Location, Location (Beate and Carmelo from Toronto)
Summary: We would both like to thank Danny and his wife Barbara for being so easy going and super helpful. The hotel was in a great location: just across the street from the beach, a few streets away from Main Street, a 7-11 right there for our morning coffees, a CVS pharmacy a block away where you can get great prices on wine, munchies etc. We rented bikes from Mike (ask Danny) to get us to Newport. The Inn is a rarity as it's still in theme with what I'd expect to find in a surfer town. It's the only one of it's kind. Even if you are used to the cookie cutter model of the chain hotels, you won't be disappointed with this place. It's clean, cute, safe, and we'd love to go back. In fact, we originally only booked two nights so we can check out other places, but loved this place so much
Manager Response: Dear Beate and Carmelo, Wow...thank you for your lovely review. Danny and Barbara were honored that you elected to extend your time at the Inn. It was a great compliment to the property and its staff, and you really validated the extra hard work that our managers put in each day! Our rooms are all unique, but you are right that rooms 1 and 9 are indeed special. They give a good sense of the proximity of the ocean, and certainly accentuate the open air feeling of our Inn.  We truly appreciate your patronage, and look forward to seeing you soon. L. Han

Summary: Excellent little place. Barbara & Danny are friendly & helpful, they are good managers.  There are even beach chairs you can borrow and beach towels. The property is super clean and it comes with free wifi. Great location - walk to anything. Each room is so cool - you'll love it.
Manager Response: Dear RONICongers_NewYork, Thank you so much for your recent stay and your kind review. Thank you also for noticing that we do provide guests with items like water, beach towels and beach chairs as part of the TLC you deserve when you stay at the Inn. Barbara and Danny treat our guests like family. They appreciate your encouraging words, and were thrilled to have had the opportunity to take care of you.   Hope to welcome you back soon! L. Han

Summary: Had a great time. Close to beach and shops. Well worth the stay. The manager there when we checked was very helpful and caring on how we were doing. For the price and the view,  Absolutely no complaints....
Manager Response: Dear Herb E, It was indeed our pleasure to have served you and your family. We appreciate your kind words and certainly will always try to be an affordable and authentic lodging solution for guests traveling to Huntington Beach for a little sun and sand. Over the years, we have continued to add little TLC items to make our guests' visit more memorable, and look forward to taking care of you again soon. Take care, L. Han

Summary Heading: Cute little motel just steps from the surf
Summary: Cool little motel (8 rooms) on the PCH in Huntington Beach. Very close to the beach and the downtown area. Staff was super helpful and accommodating. Rooms very basic but clean and comfortable. Beach gear (towels, chairs, boogeyboards) provided for guest use. Kind of expensive for a motel, but HB is expensive and you can't beat the location. It is probably a good value in the off-season. We would stay there again.

I had to find a room new Main Street in Huntington for a quick overnight stay and found the Huntington Surf Inn on a Google Maps search. At over $100 less than the other hotels in the area, it was definitely worth the price! It looks a little divey when your driving past it, but the rooms are super-cute, very clean, and our bed was really comfortable. You get one parking spot with your room, which if you've ever tried to park on PCH near Main Street in downtown Huntington is quite a gift!! The parking lot is actually the lower half of the property, so the spaces may look a little small since you're parking between the support beams holding up the deck and the rooms, but my full size sedan fit without a problem and there were a couple of midsize SUVs parked there when I arrived,

Summary Heading: Best hotel to stay in Huntington Beach
Summary: My boyfriend & I recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Huntington Beach. The rooms are clean & non of them smell like cigs. Everything is close by from shops to clubs & of course the beach. The parking is free & is secure the staff are nice I've been here many times in the past and never had any problems. I would be coming back soon for another weekend 😁

We had a great time! Great location, very friendly staff- clean comfortable room and free parking! The rooms are well maintained and very clean. Shower and bathroom great. Walk in closet. We had a frig. A few minutes walk from the pier and Main Street!

We spent 2 night at this hotel and it was a great place to stay for a couple of days. The reason that I don't rate it as "Excellent" is that the AC blew directly in my bed and it was hard to sleep. Very nice staff!

The staff were super nice and helpful. There is a very good and chill vibe at this hotel/motel. Right across from the beach and very close to Main Street, where all the restaurant/bars and shops are. All the rooms are decorated differently with unique surfer styles. Bathrooms are clean and seems newly renovated.

The location is great, it's a short walk to many restaurants, bars and shops. It's right across the street from the beach.  You just park your car when you arrive and leave it in the covered parking lot until you leave.

Our family of 4 (2 adults, 2 kids, 8 & 5) was headed to HB for the first time and we wanted accommodations right by the beach.  After reading tripadvisor, we decided to give the Surf Inn a try.  I looked up their FB page and sent an inquiry and Danny responded within 10 mins.  We stayed in room 7 which had 2 queen beds and a large shower.  The access to the beach was fabulous and like others have posted, the Inn provided beach chairs, beach towels, boogie boards, beach straw mats, and even had shovel and bucket to build sand castles. (We had our own).  The room had a dorm size refrigerator and good size a/c wall unit.  And there are 8 parking spots below the rooms (the rooms are on the 2nd story) but there are 9 rooms.  Even so, there is a spot for the 9th person on the back
Manager Response: Dear Kyushujet,  Thanks so much for your recent visit and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  Our entire staff appreciates your recognition of our efforts to treat guests like family members. We are indeed very different from other hotels on Pacific Coast Highway. As you kindly noted, our prices are beyond competitive with our peers on the oceanfront. Complimentary services such as  parking for one car per room, bottled water, and high speed Wi-Fi are some of the ways we maximize the value of your stay.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the near future.  L Han General Manager

Summary Heading: great beach hotel close to Main Street and HB pier.
Summary: My family stays here every time we visit HB. Can't say enough about the staff. Danny was extremely helpful with check in. Hotel has free rentals for kids wanting to boggie board. Great surf and beach hotel. Super close to Main Street and Pier, doesn't get much better than this.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Huntington Beach Inn!  Danny and his wife (the managers) were so friendly and personable.  The price was a bargain for the location!! With only 9 rooms, this was a cozy get away spot for our family of 4.  Our kids loved this place, too!  Since we flew in, the inn loaned us beach chairs, an umbrella, a cooler, boogie boards, a volleyball, and beach towels!  There is an open deck to watch the waves from, the beach is across the street (literally a 3 minute walk), free parking is right beneath the building, and Main Street with shops and restaurants is a short way away.  Make sure to check out the market and vendors on Tuesdays at Main Street!  Taco Tuesday and sales await!  We can't wait to come back!

Amazing location right on the beach front just up from the pier but the room was dark and very basic! The main light switch didn't work and on elf the side lamps didn't work either! We stayed two nights and noticed on the second that under the beds were filthy, covered in trash and dust! Very bad housekeeping!! We were awaken up at 4am by someone playing music next to us! The walls were so thin, understand some noise is expected when staying somewhere like that but not that loud and for over an hour! No one was in reception to speak to so we had to put up with it! Decor was dull, nothing how I imagined a 'surf inn' to be like- lacking character  So overall great location but very overpriced for the room you get!

Attended a family wedding in CA a couple of weeks ago. We had Room #8, which was quiet and off the street, very clean and with a huge shower. The deck was a great place to meet up with the rest of our family and friends. Everything is close by - literally a few steps to the beach, shopping in downtown was only a couple of blocks away. Each room has its own quirky vibe. Can't wait to come back and visit everyone so we can stay here again. Thank you Dr. Han and staff for making us feel so welcome!

Loved staying at this hotel and will definitely be back.  The location is amazing. Right across from the beach and walking distance from everything.  The staff was extra friendly and did everything to make sure our stay was memorable.  I would 100% recommend :)

Clean, Comfy...and Wonderful! What an escape and we felt like family!!! Quiet and a lil' hop skip over to Main Street and the Pier! Will definitely be back to soon to enjoy this hidden nook....Exactly what the "Doctor" ordered.....Thanks Doc  :)
Manager Response: Dear Heather B,  Thank you so much for choosing the Inn for your visit to Huntington Beach. It was truly our privilege to have met y'all and please know that we too reveled in the magic of your kindness and generosity. Please let us know when your travels take you back our way so that we can again take great care of you both as exalted members of the HSI family .  L. Han General Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn for my friends wedding recently and it was an absolutely great experience. The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean, and it was very close to all the action on main street. The bars & restaurants were all very close. It was nice to wake up every morning and be able to walk out front and look at the ocean. Would definitely recommend this for anyone who wants to enjoy Huntington beach.
Manager Response: Dear 8ronjon, What a great pleasure to have had the opportunity to host your friend's wedding party. The entire staff of the Inn truly appreciates your kind comments and misses your affable presence on our deck, especially during the early quiet moments of the morning. Hopefully your travels will bring you back to the Inn soon. Best wishes for a great summer!  L. Han General Manager

Summary: Staying at the Huntington Surf Inn to celebrate my 20th birthday was something I would never forget because of how awesome it was! Everything was convenient and walking distance for me and my friends who were staying over for the night. The beach, the pier and the main street we're all so close to the inn and the people at the front desk we're so chill and awesome! I would definitely come back to stay again soon!
Manager Response: Dear Victor M, What can we say other than that we have got to see you for your 21st birthday next year!! Thank you so much for sharing your great experience with our Trip Advisor friends.  Our new managers Danny and Barbara are indeed wonderful folks with a great flair for customer service. As your lodging choice, we will continue to think "outside the box" to help you have the best possible experience with your visit to beautiful Huntington Beach. L. Han General Manager

Summary: Great customer service nice rooms fair price had a great time. Would DEFINATELY stay again ....close to downtown Main Street Huntington Beach and the beach 👍👍 the rooms were immaculate and Awesome view of the beach just across the street !
Manager Response: Dear L0riAnn83,  Thank you so much for your recent visit. We are continuously looking for ways to improve the customer experience and to couple great service and creature comfort while maintaining the charms of being an authentic beachside lodging. We appreciate the acknowledgment of our great location. Of note, one of the awesome hidden feature of the Inn is that our manager Danny grew up surfing in Huntington Beach and played football for the local highschool. He will be a great resource for all visitors for what to do on Main Street and other attractions in the area such as surf rentals etc.. that are all within steps of the Inn. Thank you once again and we look forward to serving you on your next visit.  L. Han General Manager

Summary: We stayed here a couple of years ago and came back this time.  We noticed that the inn was repainted with a fresh sky blue and gray color.  It was nice because it matched the blue ocean across the street.  Loved the fact the beach is right across the street for our early morning walks .  Service at the front desk was professional when we checked in and our room was clean.  We will be back again this summer!
Manager Response: Dear KDebson, Thank you so much for your return visit to the Inn and for noticing our new colors and complementary water bottles. We have recently refreshed the Inn with enhancements to not only our facilities but also to our amenities. In addition to complementary Wi-Fi and covered parking, we have added Arrowhead water bottles in the room, 250 thread count linen starting in July, and higher end toiletries. We are also going Green, with efforts to improve water conservation and improve our carbon footprint.  All these changes have been made with one goal in mind: Your satisfaction in your lodging choice. We really want you to be proud of your association with the Inn, and look forward to serving you again this summer. L. Han General Manager

Summary: To be honest we were disappointed. We had high hopes given the many positive reviews here but the reality was a pretty drab Cagney & Lacey motel type of place. Nothing wrong with that but we'd gotten the impression it was something more?  The gentleman that checked is in had clearly been enjoying a drink as he asked me 3 times the same question in between stumbling around the reception area. Room was very noisy (road and old fashioned window rattler air con unit) and bed was, well, awful actually. Oh and check out took an age.  This all sounds terrible and it's not meant to. I've stayed in far worse - we just had perhaps high expectations.  Great location though.
Manager Response: Dear wipeout75, Thank you very much for your recent patronage. We are happy to report to you that the Inn has implemented a few changes  to ensure continued exemplary customer service to add to our already well know convenient location and value. We simply want to serve our guests like family members, and our heritage as a beach inn with simple beach living lifestyles has been attractive to many of our visitors.  We certainly will continue to find a happy combination to maintain this heritage with creature comforts and enhancements that will improve on your guest experience. We look forward to another opportunity to serve you soon. L. Han General Manager

Summary: Location, location, location! This was my first trip to SoCal and I wanted to stay a stone's throw from the beach. Great location!! with a hip vibe....definitely not like so many generic chain hotels out there. The owner was onsite visiting the property during our stay and was clearly very committed to delivering excellent customer service. My room was very clean and comfortable and I had a great few days enjoying the beach and exploring this charming area. I am already planning my next trip back to Huntington Beach and will definitely stay here again....it's a great value for fun and funky, cool and comfy.
Manager Response: Dear Misha60091, Thank you so much for your kind review! The Inn is proud to treat all our guests like family members, and is particularly grateful for those like yourself who appreciate our efforts. We are constantly looking for ways to improve the value of your stay. We have recently made a few changes to our procedures and personnel to improve the "guest pampering" experience, and to ensure continued exemplary customer service. We certainly look forward to the opportunity to serve you again in the future. Best regards, L. Han General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Huntington Surf Inn for 4 nights. The experience was wonderful to say the least. The manager printed out our park passes efficiently and had them ready at his office for pickup.  Parking was wonderful as it takes us about one minute to walk from our parked car to our room......Our room was clean and tastefully designed which was to our liking.  Being runners, we are literally steps from the beach so running on the beach front was a breeze!!  In 2 words,  "highly recommended".
Manager Response: Dear jasperjarvis, Thank you so much for your helpful comments and recent stay. Seasoned travelers like yourselves are the reason why the Inn constantly look for ways to improve and enhance the overall guest experience and bang for your bucks. We appreciate that you have chosen us for your lodging needs. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here and would stay again, though I agree with other reviewers what you're really paying for is location.  I had a conference at the Hyatt and decided to book here instead. It was more affordable, the 15 min walk to the Hyatt was enjoyable, and the staff was friendly. You can probably gather from pictures that each room has a fun/quirky vibe.    The room was very neat when I arrived. Beds were comfy and the shower (no tub) was spacious and had good water pressure. Mini-fridge was handy.  I had to close my window room at night because the main road was pretty noisy, but I never heard anything from neighboring rooms. You don't have your own patio, but there is a large shared patio that overlooks the ocean. It was a nice place to read and relax. Parking is below
Manager Response: Dear Mallory M,  Thank you so much for your recent stay. I appreciate your comments as well. Our location right on PCH does mean that there will be some noise from cars during certain busy time of the day. At night traffic is at a minimum, and most rooms are very quiet indeed.  Our pricing is very competitive with our neighbors on PCH. We pride ourselves on added values like complementary parking and high speed Internet access so that you will not incur other charges during your stay. We are in the midst of adding more values to your stay with more amenities such as business printing, and as always, great customer service.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again soon. L. Han General Manager

Summary: We booked the Huntington Surf Inn based on so many positive Trip Advisor reviews. Unfortunately, we can't rave about our stay here.   We booked room 2. Although cutely decorated, the room was one of the smallest motel rooms we've stayed in. I like a firm bed, but the bed here was firm to the point of uncomfortable. There were only about 3 light bulbs in the small chandelier and one of them was burned out. In the bathroom there is literally 3" of counter space to place a hairbrush, toothbrush/paste, makeup, etc. and that's it.   The only amenity was a small fridge. No coffee maker and no hair dryer. Provided toiletries were one small bottle of shampoo and two small bars of soap. If you need conditioner or lotion, bring your own.   We didn't appreciate being woken up at 3 a.m.
Manager Response: Dear QueenMumOregon,  Thank you for the opportunity to be your host on your recent visit.  You are right that our location is ideal for visitors who want to experience a combination of the beach life of southern California and a vibrant downtown scene with great shops and restaurants. We appreciate your comments about bath amenities, and will switch the one bottle shampoo-conditioner out for separate shampoo and conditioner bottles. Lotions are available for guests as well in each room. The Inn has a surfing heritage that focuses on the simple beach living lifestyles of the beach cities. Along with shampoos et al we have meaningful complementary amenities like parking and Wi-Fi that our guests have appreciated. I do think that it is our privilege to further pamper our guests, and will incorporate your kind suggestions in the neverending quest to be a great and affordable lodging for surfers and queen mums alike. Please take care and thank you once again for your patronage. L. Han General Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed here while vacationing in So-Cal. The online photos and descriptions were appealing so I decided to book the room site un-seen.   When we arrived I was happy with the location but that was soon followed by disappointment. The room we stayed in was #9 for $200 for the one night. Although the room had a good ocean view and unique decor, there were other aspects that will keep us from ever staying here again.   Immediately my wife spotted random hairs all over the pillows and linens. I later found hair on the bathroom floor and on the "clean" towels. The toilet seat was splattered with paint and who knows what else. The in-room fridge seemed nice until it began to buzz loudly every ten minutes. We went out for the day/night to Main St which was very close and
Manager Response: Dear JSauceda,  Thank you for your review.   We noted that you found the pricing to be not to your liking. Our prices have always been competitive and, as noted by other guests here, often are lower than many of the hotels on Pacific Coast Highway. We also noted that you had experienced noise from the street. Our location on Pacific Coast Highway and proximity to the beaches and the water indeed will expose you to some traffic noise. It is part and parcel of the Huntington Beach surfside experience. With regards to the noise from the neighbors, our manager James stayed in the quarters right next to you. While neither he nor other guests were disturbed by the noise, we do take your comments seriously and will continue to look into ways to improve our overall guest experience.  Regards, L. Han

Summary: You simply cannot beat the location of this hotel... a block away from Main Street and right across from the beach. Perfect!  As long as you're not a person who likes newer, well-maintained hotels, then you will be OK with this hotel. This hotel is definitely an older, funky beach hotel. Clean? Yes, but I've seen cleaner. We stayed in room 2 and one of the bed spreads had what appeared to be an old blood stain on it. There was a little trash stuck behind the little fridge as well. For a family of 4, this room was a little small, but we weren't in the room too much anyway.  So, stay at the hotel for the location and price. You can't beat it.
Manager Response: Dear PsykoPup,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate that you are cognizant of our unique approach as one of the very few authentic surfside lodgings in southern California. We will take your constructive notes to heart and continue to improve the experience of our similarly unique guests.  The entire staff of the Huntington Surf Inn looks forward to the opportunity to serve you again.  L. Han

Summary: The wife & I rode out bicycles down the Santa Ana River Trail from Corona and wanted a place to stay Saturday night. Room #9 was GREAT--!!!  Big Shower, very clean room - comfortable settings with an ocean view... We locked our bikes up down stairs with no problems, we felt very safe. Highly recommended-!!!
Manager Response: Dear Mark H,  Thank you so much for your kind review. Room 9 is indeed a good beginning for a nature trip like yours. The reclaimed wood decor is the first step to the enjoyment of the green culture of southern California and Huntington Beach. We are grateful for your visit, and hope to host you again soon. Next time perhaps you will have the opportunity to explore other amazing bike trails in the beautiful sea scapes and nature preserves of our town. Please take care,  L. Han

Summary Heading: Better be ready to checkout on the minute.
Summary: The place is pretty good. BUT at 11 am sharp management comes knocking and yelling at every door that it's checkout and to get going. Very rude very unprofessional no class. For this reason alone I will never stay again or recommend. My wife and I were blown away that they did that, same with some of the other guests.

Summary Heading: little motel with lots of personality
Summary: Nice people clean rooms. Just a short walk from everything you would possibly want to do.  The beach pier and Main St only steps away. Amazingly Beautiful view of the morning beach from room #9. We will see you again soon HSI!

This hotel is close to everything! A great staff and home like expierence! I was little late getting in and i got a call to make sure everything was ok. Very clean and the pictures are just what you get. It's a small not chain unique hotel. MUST Stay and check it out.
Manager Response: Dear Tammy J, Time has indeed flown by since your family has stayed with us. The entire staff of the Inn want you to know that we appreciate your very kind review and for pointing out that our pictures are quite accurate in depicting the rooms. No Photoshop that's for sure! As a tiny lodging in a popular tourist destination the Inn has to double the effort to compete with the national chains that dominate the business. You and your family's encouragement are the fuel that propel us forward indeed. Thank you once again, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve  you soon. L Han General Manager

Summary: We only stayed 1 night so did not get to enjoy the Surf Inn I was looking forward to.  Major construction going on and they  probably should not have been receiving guest.  We were not informed of construction until the day before our arrival.  Change of room (no big deal to us).  Except the next morning the sawing began at 800 am and we could literally open our room door and touch the saw without leaving the room.  The room they gave us looked just like the picture except they were not the standard  queen size beds 60 inches x 80 that we were use to.  Maybe doubles?  I woke up in the middle of the night and was cold.  Could not figure out how to get the heat on (air condition was not on)  so finally put on a sweatshirt and sweatpants to stay warm.  Due to the size of the beds
Manager Response: Dear JettaSeattle, Thank you for taking the time to contribute your review. We are a small, intimate property and are certainly trying to remodel and improve to serve our guests better this year. We are sorry that your stay was affected by aspects of this effort. The measurement you gave were correct for your queen beds, and our mattresses from Ikea have queen or king certification. One of the advantages of a small inn is that we are easily available to help you if you have any questions about the operation of devices in your room. We look forward to another opportunity to serve you in the future. L. Han

Summary: located on the beach, the owners will help you to appreciate the city and the history, not only the beach to visit. the rooms are on the way to be renewed and the surfing style is very nice. I would go back very soon
Manager Response: Dear Francois,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate your patience with us during our recent efforts to make the Inn an even better place for all of our guests. Your next stay will be a fantastic experience with great fun and great value, and we look forward to serving you again soon.  L. Han

Summary: This hotel had everything we were looking for... price, cleanliness, close to the beach, shopping and eating and something with a local feel. The Surf Inn is very unique and close to all attractions. We didn't use our rental car one time after we checked in. Owners are very sweet and helpful. Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear 702daniel, Thank you so much for your kind review. You are right in that we are blessed to be so close to all the main attractions of Huntington Beach. With our free parking, our guests don't have to worry about in/out privileges or the extra cost of leaving the cars in parking lots while they enjoy a day at the beach or at other establishments like restaurants or shops.  We hope that you will have the opportunity to revisit, especially after our recent remodel. Please take care! L. Han

Summary: I took my 15 year-old daughter and her friend to Huntington Beach for 5 days before school started this fall.  Our goal was to have a worry-free beach getaway.  This Inn was a great solution.  With its location right across the street from the beach, and a close walk to anything we needed, we were very satisfied.  The managers were very attentive to our needs.  Julie noticed one of the girls got a nice sunburn early in the trip an offered us a bottle of Aloe that had been left by a previous guest.  We were also provided with beach towels.  We purchased boogie boards and left them at the Inn for future guests to use.  It was a fun trip with lots of memories.
Manager Response: Dear ladydi67, We are happy that you had a great time in Huntington Beach. The Inn provides a great home base for those who want to not only explore the classic beach culture of Huntington Beach but also world class facilities like Disney World, etc... We are looking forward to your return to enjoy some of updates we recently made to make the facilities even more hospitable and comfortable for our great guests. Have a great year! L. Han

Summary: Was the best room! Great great ocean views, love the colors and the decor was fabulous. The staff did everything they could do to make our stay the best.  Always smiling, great food recommendations, will be the only place we visit when we hit the beaches again.
Manager Response: Dear Lori S, Thank you so much for your review of our great staff and your mention of room 9. Room 9 is certainly a fan favorite, and now it is even better after the updates we just performed. We miss you and look forward to your visit soon! L. Han

Summary: We were completely disgusted from this hotel. From the beginning, we were thrown off by the owners who lives in the office with their several Birds. The room cleanliness was disgusting. The comforter was filthy; had dirt and smelled of dirty hair, and the bed was not even fully made. The closet doors were off the hinges, and the lights in the room did not work making this dreary room even more depressing. When I walked into the bathroom, there was some type of white scum coming from the ceiling leaking onto the green wall that was painted over numerous times. The shower was black, and the TOWELS!! They were supposed to be white, but they had several stains on them making us not even want to touch them! Not only was this place gross, we felt very unsafe. We booked to stay here 3
Manager Response: Dear 97unknown,  Your comments illustrated how difficult it can be in our industry to find something "just right". Indeed, it seemed like the reviewer right before you stayed in the same room and had a very positive experience with his quarters and with the managers.  We certainly are not happy that you did not have the same great experience as most of our guests have had over the years. We do appreciate this opportunity to review your comments in our ongoing quest to make the Inn the best it can be to serve our guests' travel and lodging needs.  In the future, if your travel takes you to Huntington Beach, we would love to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Please take care,  L Han

Summary: This funky renovated hotel was great.  Loved the decorations.  I got a very good night's sleep, the owners were super nice, and it was just a few blocks from downtown.  Only complaint is that they didn't have conditioner or lotion for toiletries, so be sure to bring your own.
Manager Response: Dear E L,  Thank you for your recognition of our uniqueness among lodgings in Huntington Beach. Our managers James and Julia do appreciate your sentiment and our entire staff look forward to your return.  We are evaluating new vendors for nicer toiletries with our remodel, so you will find fancy lotion and conditioner galore with your next visit.  Please take care!  L Han

Summary: The Huntington Suft Inn is by no means "fancy". It however does dail it down a notch and point out what is really important -like the view from room #9! What a gorgeous sunset, and you can see it from the shower if you're running from business to dinner, like I was. Great location and nice people taking care of you = a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Monica U,  We appreciate your reference to one of our favorite movies! Although we don't have Helena Bonham Carter, we do focus on a very comfortable stay for our guests while striving to provide our business travelers with a responsible lodging solution with complementary parking, Wi-Fi, and flexible check in/out policies. Our next update this winter will include redesigns that will enhance your experience, and we look forward to serving you again soon.  Thank you!  L Han

Summary: This odd little inn is hard to describe. Less than 10 rooms? Eccentric Julie and her birds check you in? But our room was just right, the location on PCH1 a block  from Main and boardwalk, plus a well-kempt tidiness make this one a win.   Clean that shower, please, and we'll be back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph58,  Thank you for an interesting take on our tiny Inn. Julia sure loves her birds, but all who come to the Inn know that she loves her guests just as well. We appreciate your comment about the shower. You will be pleased to know that while our showers are meticulously cleaned daily, they are headed for renovations this winter to handle better the sand and sea water that is part and parcel of our surfing heritage. Thank you again, and we (including the birds) look forward to your return.  L Han

Summary: This is a super small inn, with a prime location walking distance to main and the pier. It's nothing fancy but for the price and amazing location it's a great find! It's owned and managed by a really nice couple. We had a great stay at the surf inn and will certainly be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Rrowland326,  Thank you so much for your kind comments about our James and Julia. As managers, they certainly have been beloved by our guests. Our guests's encouragement and support certainly have cheered them on to be awesome in finding ways to take care of you better. Our Inn's culture is entwined with great customer service along with great value, and we do promise to always try harder for you.  We appreciate your visit and hope to see you soon.  L. Han

Summary: We found this one on trip adviser and travelling south on highway 1 we chose this for our end of trip 2 night stay. The room was fantastic with a view of the strip and the sea.  There is private parking with your reserved spot a must for the area as parking is expensive and difficult to find.Ideal for a walk into the main street and plenty or restaurants. Dukes is close a must and great value.  Paul and Debs UK
Manager Response: Dear Paul and Debs,  Thank you so much for your stay. We are indeed a mellow place to finish up your California trip, and we really appreciate your gracious comments.  The Inn is committed to giving guests a good value. We are happy to serve as a home base for your automobile, and, as you mentioned, have noticed that guests often leave their cars at the Inn to enjoy the gorgeous sceneries and weather during the short walk to attractions in Huntington Beach like downtown, the Pier, or across the street to the beach. As an aside, we also have been so fortunate to have had many wonderful guests from the UK. We appreciate you and look forward to your return visit. Cheers,  L Han

Summary: Love this place! Has a beachy vibe. Rooms are clean, staff is friendly, liked the skylight in bathroom. Sat up in bed and I could see the ocean out the door. The patio is a great place to watch the sunset. Steps away from the beach and Main St. would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Amermom2,  Thank you so much for your visit to the Inn. You captured the essence of our place...wake up, admire the sand and the ocean across the street, and in the evening, enjoy the sunset on our deck, all within steps of the awesome shops and eateries on Main Street. We are always grateful for kind guests like your family, and look forward to serving you again soon.  L Han

Summary Heading: love the atmosphere, detest their internet service
Summary: I love this place for it's amenities, atmosphere, cleanliness, service. But I come to HB to work. The internet service in the rooms is abysmal. If you are here for vacation and want your kids to participate with you instead of have their heads sunk into their smartphones. This is great. Lots to do here. But if you have to work a little while you are at this hotel, you might want to stay somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear KayakerKelly,  You are so nice to begin the review with giving us kudos for "amenities, atmosphere, cleanliness, service". I and our staff thank you very much for your kindness.  James has informed me that your computer could not be configured to take advantage of our free wireless N Wi-Fi service. Historically, we have had very few issues with our wireless service. Indeed, Wi-Fi at the Inn has often been cited by our guests as trouble free and fast ever since we installed an advanced wireless network that is backed by Verizon's fiberoptic FiOS system in 2011 to provide additional value to our guests' stay. We do take seriously your constructive comments of course, and will continue to monitor this issue. We hope you will give us another opportunity to serve your business needs soon.  L. Han General Manager

Summary: I'm a little late on writing this review, seeing as we visited here in April of 2012 but this hotel is in the perfect location; it is within walking distance of the shops as well as the pier and has beautiful views of the water. The staff was great and overall the four of us had a very pleasant experience. We now know where to stay next time we are in HB!
Manager Response: Dear Sarah P,  Actually it is so great to see that you still remember fondly your stay from April. To take the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor is an act of kindness to us, and we sure appreciate it. We have had guests of all flavors from all corners of the world. Having you say that your family will choose the Inn again for your next visit is an honor, and we promise to continue to get better with our coming redesign with Antonio Ballatore so that we will be able to serve you to the best of our ability.  L Han

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Inn on Labor Day weekend and never wanted to leave! You can see the ocean from the rooms, the deck was amazing, the rooms were very clean, and the service was excellent!! We will be returning very soon! I don't think we will ever stay anywhere else in Huntington!  The Powells
Manager Response: Dear Renee P, Thank you very much for allowing us to host you during Labor Day weekend. We appreciate so much your wonderful words in appreciation of our strengths and want you to know that great performance by the staff is certainly inspired in many degrees by the incredible sweetness of guests like yourselves. We look forward to the opportunity to enjoy your presence soon Mr. and Mrs P. L. Han

Summary: HSI is a nice hotel simple but clean good for those who want to stuck surfing.wake up and just check the waves from their nice tower. It lacks some comfort if you are traveling with family but sometimes is important you left it behind and just relax with the simple vibe. James and lulie are nice and made us as feeling at home. Tks
Manager Response: Dear Renato-rio, Thank you for your recent stay. You are so right that our heritage is that of a Southern California beach inn with simple aspirations: great value, great customer service, and great convenience for our guests. James and Julie will be pleased to hear that you felt at home during your visit. Many of our guests, especially those from other countries, have echoed this sentiment. It really makes us feel good that they know we care. Please come back soon to join us on the deck to enjoy the sunset in the evening and the waves in the morning.  Thank you and take care,  L Han

Summary: Everything was wonderful. Great service. The staff is very down to earth and kind. Rooms are very cool and clean and the location is amazing!! Do yourself a favor and stay there!! This hotel is a hidden secret in Huntington beach!!
