Manager Response: Wow and thank you to aprilsh!  As a low key property in Huntington Beach without much marketing, we are really thrilled by your kind comments. We have lots of repeat business from loyal fans, and are so glad to be recognized by so many kind folks like yourself on TripAdvisor. HGTV Design Star Antonio Ballatore will be back to redecorate our rooms this fall, and we hope you will have a chance to visit some soon-to-be classic rooms from him in the near future.   Please take care and know that we appreciate you!  L Han

Summary Heading: Great location and very good value.
Summary: What a wonderful gem,we where worried about the size of the room but where every happy with the space we had,family of 4 was comfortable in this hotel, the service was very friendly,the room was very clean and most of all the location was amazing. A walking distance to the pier,and the beach,the store and everything else. We loved it,parking was complimentary we left our car at the hotel and walked everywhere.We enjoyed a late night at the deck you can sit down,relax and enjoy what is happening on the road and the pier.We recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear allouzee,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review from a TripAdvisor Top Contributor. Kind comments from experienced and astute travelers like yourself are a real pat on the back for those of us in the hospitality industry. You will be pleased to know that we are planning a refresh to the Inn that will make your future stay an even greater value. We still will be committed to providing guests with complimentary parking and WiFi, and certainly shall provide excellent customer service as always.  Once again, thank you, and please take care,  L Han

Summary Heading: the best hole in the wall make you feel comfortable wonderful place I have stayed in Huntington Beach
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. The people who run the place are absolutely amazing and make you feel like you are part of the family. Only 9 rooms. All decorated differently. Clean. Well kept. And just a stone's throw from the pier. We will go again for sure. Really nice people. Very comfortable place.
Manager Response: Dear gengolden,  Thank you so much for your refreshingly candid review. We are indeed culturally a beach inn that aims to please our guests with great customer service and a personal touch that sometimes can be missing in bigger hotels. As we continue to renovate and remodel our rooms and facilities, we will still be the mom and pops place that hopefully will give you a more cozy experience with your next visit. See you soon!  L  Han

Summary: So convenient great deck to sit on rigth by the beach nice rooms main street right there the peir very close management very friendly we will stay here again if you go to huttington beach this is a great place to stay
Manager Response: Dear zamboni123,  Thank you so much for your recent visit. You are right that a bonus of having our deck is that we have met so many new friends with the beautiful backdrop of the Pacific Ocean and PCH. Time spent with wonderful guests after a hard day's work always gives us a sense of optimism that our world will be alright. We hope to see you again soon, and thank you again.  L Han

Summary: Room nicely furnished, clean, location in walking distance to pier, eating places, shops, beach across the street. There is a patio to sit and watch the sunset. Free parking in the shade, we could even leave our car after checking out. Nice and friendly staff. We will come back!
Manager Response: Dear zooz42,  Thank you so much for your patronage and your review. We are proud that we have met so many great travelers who have become regular guests.  Our location is indeed ideal for your visit to Huntington Beach, and our rooms are frequently updated as well to give you a excellent and unique lodging experience. At the Inn, we believe that great customer service is always a work in progress, thus we are inspired by your kind words to keep on improving.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  L. Han

Summary: What a friendly little hotel. Right across from the beach,And walking distance to the peir, Fine dining, shops and everything you want to do in huntington beach. The staff were out of the way friendly.They have parking for one car at no charge.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher B,  Thanks so much for taking the time to post your kind comments.  We realize the importance of giving you peace of mind in your choice of lodging when you vacation in Huntington Beach. Free parking and wi-fi as well as exemplary customer service are among the things that we are committed to provide you with each stay. We hope you will be able to visit us again soon. Please take care, and thank you again.  L. Han

Summary: You will not regret staying at the Huntington Surf Inn.	The owners are friendly and very helpful. The room we stayed in was clean, quiet, and felt very homey. The themed rooms (we chose the Jimi Hendrix) are a fun atmospere and my friend and I were wow'd when we walked into our room! The parking was cover which was nice. The location is perfect, just a few short minutes walk and your right on the beach! We were overall EXTREMELY SATISFIED with our stay, and will definitly revisit.
Manager Response: Dear 129beth,  Thanks so much for your kind comments. The Jimi Hendrix room is one of our most requested rooms, and was originally set up by Antonio Ballatore of HGTV Design Star fame for a famous surfer named Kohole Andino.  We have a fun surfing heritage that hopefully rubs off on all our guests's experience while visiting beautiful Huntington Beach, and we promise to continue to treat you like our family with your future visits.  Take care, L. Han

Summary Heading: Great place made me want to definitely visit again!
Summary: I can say enough how nice and we much we enjoyed our visit. The care takers are so nice and welcoming. The location of the inn is perfect, right across the beach! The pier is literally 3 or less block's and so is main street with restaurant,shops and bars galore. The rooms are nice and cozy. We stayed in room 8, very nice size. Now maybe some rooms are a bit smaller,but this is a inn not a corp.run hotel, so take in consideration. I think they all looked fine me. Parking car is right below the rooms in car port. Mini fridge in room, and care takers have beach stuff for you to borrow. Such a great, nice stay we had. We will definitely be back to inn and h.b to visit the beautiful beach, tasty restaurants and cool bars again!
Manager Response: Dear Joe E,  We are grateful for your recent stay and your insightful comments. The Inn is so close to all the great attractions of Huntington Beach, but is protected also from the crowds so that you will be able to enjoy the natural beauty of the sand and waves of SoCal living. Thank you especially for mentioning that we are not a corporate type of lodging. Being mom and pops means that we will know your names and preferences, and can offer you cool stuff like free wifi and free covered parking that will enhance the value of your stay.  Please take care and we look forward to serving you again soon!  L. Han

Summary: The Surf Inn provided what we needed, a safe place to sleep near where we needed to go.  The experience was overall positive and the staff was very friendly.  My only complaint was the matresses were rock hard.  The room was unique, not particularly nice, but nothing wrong with it.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you so much for your visit and your kind comments. We especially appreciate your sentiment about staying with us again. It is gratifying to hear that as hoteliers. This will remind us to keep trying harder to take care of encouraging guests like yourself. Your comments about the mattress will be incorporated into our year end redecoration and upkeep plans. Please take care, and hope to see you soon.  L. Han

Summary: On a whim we decided to visit HB and the Surf Inn. It was the best idea I have had in years. The Surf Inn was really laid back and close to everything. We had a great time. We missed the managers, they were out playing cowboy at some dude ranch in Montana. The manager's Sister-in-law was really cool and very helpful. She helped to make our stay very relaxing and enjoyable. The Surf Inn's location was very convenient, it had a 7-Eleven right next door and a really great doughnut shop a block away. We will be planning a return visit in the future!!! A trip to the Surf Inn will cure whatever ails you.
Manager Response: Dear bull4647,  Congratulations on a great moniker! Thank you also for your kind words.  Lori, who filled in for James and Julie during their vacation, was fantastic. I am sure she was just as gratified as I was to see your gracious comments. The local doughnut shop is a hidden gem in Huntington Beach. Kudos to your being saavy travelers indeed. We look forward to taking care of you again soon!  L. Han

Summary Heading: JAmes and Julie are the best
Summary: I stay at the Surf INN anytime I'm close to the Pacific Ocean. James and Julie who manage the place treat it as if they owned it themselves !!! Great place !! Great people !!!! Thanks again and again  Dominic
Manager Response: Dear Dominic,  On behalf of James and Julie and the entire staff....we appreciate so very much your wonderful words. We will keep on trying our very best to keep y'all happy again and again also. We hope to see you again soon.  Please take care,  L. Han

Summary: The women at the front desk was over the top nice. We I walked in the room I was really happy with the cleanliness of the room and bathroom. Has a nice patio overlooking the ocean and flat screen tv. I would stay here again

I stayed in the surf-themed room 5 for the last weekend of the US Open of Surfing. I couldn't have picked a better location! The beach, the pier, restaurants, and stores are all just a few blocks away. The rooms are clean and comfortable, and the free parking spot was a huge plus. The decor of the room was so fun that it added a special touch to my vacation. I'll definitely stay here again the next time I'm in SoCal!

I needed a quick beach getaway, and this hotel was perfect! I stayed in Room 1. It is the end/corner room, so I had 2 windows, both facing the ocean. The room was clean and comfortable, and the owners were fantastic hosts. You can't beat the price for this location: across PCH from the beach, and just a block or so from the HB town center. Can't wait to return!

Found this little jewel online when looking for a place to stay in HB that was by the ocean. James and Julie are fantastic hosts. We stayed in Room 9 and Room 5 during our stay. Both are nicely designed and unique in character, quiet and clean. From the patio you can see the beach and the ocean and there's a nice breeze to be had up there.   The hotel is within walking distance of the beach and main street and the pier. Perfecto!  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Carol P,  We are so grateful that you stayed with us and that you noticed how hard we try to be of good value and good service to our guests. A small lodging like ours allowed our managers to spend some time getting to know our guests. What has been very special for us to have learned over the years is that many guests have been so kind, nice, and generous like yourselves. For that, we thank you also.  We look forward to the chance to take care of you again soon!  L. Han

Summary: We are current staying at this great retro-style hotel.  The price is very reasonable considering the hotel is located directly across from the HB pier & beach; walking distance to shops and restaurants.  We are in Room 8, which is at the back of the building; furthest away from the street.  The room is clean and comfortable and meets all our needs.  All rooms are on the second floor, with a parking spot on the ground floor.  What a plus!  We would definitely stay here again.

The Surf Inn is in a great location. It is a locally owne and operated hotel & they are great people! If your looking for a great price on a room with an awesome location, this is your hotel! When we return to HB, we will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Megan G,  Thank you for your stay. We want you to have a great experience and are grateful that you recognize our efforts. This fall we will do a refresh to the Inn, and look forward to pleasing you during your return visit.  L. Han

Summary: My husband & I stayed only 1 night but after meeting the managers James & Julie we wish we could have stayed longer. We sat on the patio & talked with them for a long time.  They were veryattentive to the other customers & made sure they assisted them with anything they may have needed. Our room was clean & comfortable & it had a beautiful view of the ocean.  We had a great  time at this "not your  ordinary" hotel & we can't  wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear KristyDH,  Thank you so much for visiting our "not your ordinary" hotel! We are a simple gateway to your nice California vacation, and we want to be a part of the sunshine that is such an integral aspect of the Huntington Beach surf culture. Please give us the opportunity to take care of you again like our own family soon!  Have a great summer.  L Han

Summary: This review is long overdue. I have stayed at this fabulous location no less than 5 times in 2 years. The last time was about 2 months ago. As usual, my room was stellar and the customer service over-the-top friendly. The managers, Julie and James just make you feel like family......I've read the most recent review and refuse to believe it.(they rated the Inn as terrible) All you have to do is read the cazillion other great reviews and it is obvious it simply cannot be true. Don't pass this place up travelers!!! I can't wait to go back. (I say that every time!)
Manager Response: Dear girlchef1,  Thank you so much for thinking of us and for your continued patronage. James and Julia are indeed well loved by our guests, who appreciate their homespun sense of fairness and kind hearts. We also appreciate your tip of visiting the website to look at all the pictures of the rooms. Of note, we just replaced the carpets in the rooms so that our summer crush of customers can enjoy the lodging just that much more. Have a great summer, and we hope to see you soon.  L Han

Summary: This place is just great. Fantastic location, quiet, brand new rooms, and lovely hosts. Stayed here for my birthday for two nights on our Californian road trip in room 9 - which has an amazing view! 2 min walk to main st with Cafes, restaurants, shops and the pier.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly R,  Thank you so much for your kind comments and for staying with us during your birthday! As you know, we are constantly updating our rooms to maintain a great experience for our guests. It is a matter of pride for us that you will get a good experience when you stay at the Inn, and that you will have the chance to meet new friends who may make your trip that much more memorable. We look forward to serving you again!

Summary: I recently stayed at the huntington Surf Inn and had one of the worst experiences of my life.  The first four days were ok except for the owner Julie who at random would just come in the room with out knocking.. Once coming in on my naked daughter and other times when people were sleeping. Also if you lose a key at the Huntington surf inn you are charged two hundred dollars.. This happened to me very suspiciously on the second to last day of the trip.  Our room was finally cleaned for the first time and our room was left unlocked and the key was gone.  It felt like a great scam to me.  I was so infuriated that i left a day early which i had previously paid for.  The owners proceeded to yell at the two 15 year old girls i had with me when i sent them to give them the remaining
Manager Response: Dear Kdance11,  Thank you so much for your recent stay. We wish that you had an experience more similar to many other guests who have graced our property over the years, most of whom having expressed warm comments about their hosts at the Inn.  However, we do respect your opinions, and pledge to incorporate your thoughts into our efforts to hone the customer service experience at the Huntington Surf Inn.  L Han

Summary: Excellent, friendly and personalized service any time of the day. Great location with a view of the ocean from the large patio. Competitive prices. Each room is decorated differently. Shops and restaurants with-in walking distance. This is my go-to place every time I visit the area.
Manager Response: Dear Taylor B,  Wow....Returning guests who are kind, gracious, and astute!  The Huntington Surf Inn is indeed fortunate to be your lodging of choice when you find time away from the beautiful South to visit the West Coast. We thank you again, and want you to know that we will strive to provide you with a feeling of personalized care in this era of ersatz and robotic lodging service and experience :) Looking forward to seeing you very soon!  L. Han

Summary: The one thing to know is this is an older property. It has the feel of a retro 60s hotel room, and is a little worn. That said, you are right across from the beach, the rooms are very clean, and there is a nice deck that overlooks the ocean. A parking spot is included, which is a big plus. We had room 8, and did not hear any PCH traffic, or have anyone walking by our door. The staff was very nice and helpful. Would stay here again. You are close to all HB attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Sheryl B,  Thank you for your recent visit. You are indeed right that the Inn is very close to all the major attractions of Huntington Beach. We are a surf property with lots of character and we try hard to give you great value for your stay. In the quest to give you a great lodging experience, the Huntington Surf Inn is excited to be heading to a refresh this off season. We look forward to seeing you again and to surprise you with even better value for your return visit.   L Han

Summary: Loved this place, close to everything, main street,pier etc. Comfy beds & James & Julie are amazing,lovely people. Only spent one night here but would definitely stay again when coming back to America.
Manager Response: Dear Aussiekelz,  The Huntington Surf Inn loves our Aussie guests. Y'all have ranged from sublime to simply supercool. We even hosted the recent Aussie US Open champ Sally Fitz....so our appreciation for all things Australia continues unabated. We look forward to the opportunity to see you and take care of your lodging needs soon!  L Han

Summary Heading: Best Customer Service and Spot on the Beach
Summary: We have stayed several times. They managers treat you like your the only guests around.  It is in the very best location.  Right across the street from the pier, the view is incredible.  Restaurants close, clean, excellent patio. We will not stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Dear Lori S,  "We will not stay anywhere else!"  Wow, you sure know how to make your innkeepers happy! We thank you so much for your kindness and loyalty. Julia and James care so much about giving you fabulous experience, and as a whole, all of us at the Inn are committed to helping you achieve a restful stay where your lodging experience will add to the pleasant memories of a great vacation. Please accept our thanks once again.  L. Han

Summary: The location of this inn was 100% walkable to everything downtown: including restaurants, market, and beach.  The room was very up to date, super clean (my husband is a hospital admin over housekeeping and is picky - he says this place is CLEAN!!).  Only advice is to not expect a microwave or ice machine.  The fridges are great.  The 7-Eleven next door is great for ice and if you buy something and are polite, they will let you use their microwave.  100% would go there again and recommend to fam and friends.
Manager Response: Dear bakedziti27,  We are hungry just from checking out your great nickname :) First, a big Thank You for your kind comments. Discerning guests like yourselves can see through the unnecessary fluff that we eschew to provide our guests with an authentic surfside experience that is real and a great value. That said, we also appreciate that you noticed how fastidious our housekeepers are in giving you a clean and comfortable experience. Of note, we do have microwaves available. They are stored away to keep things neat in the room. Please just ask James or Julia if you need one for your room. Thank you so much once again. We look forward to serve you again soon.  L. Han

Summary: My brother and I have stayed at this place at least four times in the past ten months. absolutely great experience every time. Great deck with great view, rooms are clean, great detail, can walk to the ocean, walk to downtown, great couple that run the place. what more could you ask for?!? easy to check in and out. absolutely love james and jules. This is the place to stay in Huntington!! -little brother
Manager Response: Dear Tait K,  Thank you so much for your continued patronage of the Inn. Four times or more in ten months means that you are the loyal guests that we love to take care of!  We are grateful always, and please know that we pledge to continue to treat you like our own!!  Take care,  L Han

Summary: Excellent location, easy walking distance to Huntington Beach pier, downtown area, and there's not many hotels that close. Downside, place was poorly maintained, for the price we paid, wouldn't stay there again.  People who worked there and cleaned the place seemed nice enough and probably did a good job. I got the sense they tried to clean it well, but just didn't get sense of confidence that the owner has maintained it well enough to charge so much. Had a dirty feel. Carpet seemed old with some stains, sheets etc had some stains. But worst part was that doors were dirty needed repainted and the shower floor was nasty dirt-stained, needs replaced or strong bleach (I can post picture).  Towels were like sandpaper. There was no curtains over the window blinds, so it let light in,
Manager Response: Dear palmeirense, Thank you for your kind patronage of our little surf inn. Your comments certainly give us pause for reflections on how to serve our customers best.  As is the case with locations so near to the ocean and the beach, maintenance to give you the best possible values for your stay is a year round affair. For example, your room's carpet is a little over two year old and was hand picked by HGTV Design Star Antonio Ballatore. Yet it is due for change soon to maintain a high level of aesthetics and functionality. We want to reassure you that the entire staff is doubly committed to aggressively maintain the property to give discerning travelers like you a great experience.  That said, our identity is indeed that of a beach inn. Comparisons of our prices and appearance with other beach properties have often confirmed that we are a high value lodging destination.  Finally, your comment about the inability to use our office computer is noted. Please forgive our discomfort with using our computer to log on to a website we don't recognize to download and print your document. Perhaps we should have discovered another solution that would have been more convenient for you and Julia, our beloved front desk staff. Thank you once again. We appreciate the opportunity to think about how to serve you better. L. Han

Summary Heading: Wonderful rooms & location- terrible customer service
Summary: Great room and location! Loved the patio overlooking the beach and the location of the hotel to the beach and downtown area. Room was beautifully decorated. Front desk greeter was so crabby and unwelcoming. Not a good feeling when you first check in or check out. I have worked in hospitality -specifically front desk- for 5 years and I was very surprised/not happy with how we were treated. Attitude up a storm!!
Manager Response: Dear Cmcclincy, Thank you so much for your visit to the Inn. We appreciate as well your instructive comments.  We strive to give our guests an excellent experience, and many have commented on their gracious time with James and Julia. Knowing their distinguished history. I hope you will take into account the other guests' positive experience, and overlook any "anomaly in the weather" with this recent visit and come back to us soon. Our appreciations, once again. L. Han

Summary Heading: Surfs inn is the hidden gem of Huntington Beach
Summary: Where to start? We have been coming to Huntington surf inn for 2 years now and the stay has gotten better each year! The rooms are each unique with awesome individual themes, the beds are comfortable, and the rooms are extremely clean. This place in located 2 blocks off Main Street and is extremely close to many restaurants and shops. The view is spectacular looking right over the Pacific Ocean. There is a large roof deck where guests can gather and relax during the sunsets. The true anchors to this place are the managers James and Julie. These two are perfect for such a unique hotel and really made our stay. From the stories, to life lessons, these two are really the reason we booked again. They share a true compassion for their guests and are always available to accommodate
Manager Response: Dear Ehall77, Thank you so much for your continued patronage. We are indeed a very different lodging than the chain hotels that are ubiquitous to Huntington Beach. We welcome you home with each visit, and revel in your joy and success in coming back to our beautiful city and incredible beaches. Friendships formed at the Inn really allow us to endure the occasional rainy days that is part and parcel of life in the lodging industry. Please accept our gratitude for your friendship and repeat business! L. Han

Summary: We stayed for one night at this great place.  We booked last minute on a side trip to take a break from the Disneyland portion of our trip and wanted to visit Huntington Beach.  We were so impressed with the simplicity of the Inn.  The room had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.  2 beds, bathroom, nice decor. A nice deck to sit and take in the breath taking view of the beach.  It was so awesome we are going back to stay for 2 weeks Aug 2014 to take in the Nike Surfers competition and simply enjoy the laid back vibe in Huntington.   Such a convenient location walking distance to great restaurants, bars, shopping and of course the beach.  It does not get much better than that.   The staff is very pleasant and checking in and out was simple and easy and of course we had
Manager Response: Dear gabriel449, We thank you so much for your kind patronage during your busy trip. We are truly grateful that you have taken the time to write down what is truly the essence of the Inn. The Huntington Surf Inn is proud to be a fun, sensible, and practical place where you will be amongst friends and feel like you can be at the beach or some cool shops or a fine restaurant within moments after arrival. We promise to always try harder to keep your business and look forward to serving you again during the US Open! Please take care.  L Han General Manager

Summary: Stayed here in February and loved it. Stayed in room 5 ( with the big wave on the wall) Comfortable bed, pillows and plenty of towels. Julie and James were extremely lovely and so helpful with any requests we had. We rented bikes for the day and they even offered to lock them in their garage for extra safety. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone. Yes the traffic was kind of loud but we brought earplugs with us- easy!
Manager Response: Dear bectrip, Thank you very much for your  kind review. Indeed the strength of any lodging is its staff, and certainly James and Julia have always tried so hard to impart that feeling of family toward our guests.  As you noticed, the beach and Pacific Coast Highway can be lively. We applaud your graciousness in celebrating our location and working around some of the inherent limitations of beach life.  Hope to see you again soon! LH General Manager

Summary: Pros: The location is great, right on Pacific Coast Highway, directly across the street from the beach and only a few blocks from Main St and all the action of downtown Huntington Beach. The price is good for the location. Most beachfront hotel/motels charge a lot more. I took the advice of some of the other people who posted comments, and reserved a room toward the back of the building, farther away from the street. I did not have any issues with street noise. The bed was comfortable and I slept really well. The room was clean. No bedbugs (I checked!). The building is old, built in the 1960's, so it isn't the Hilton, but who cares? If you want the Hilton, it's down the street, but this place is a good value, a good location, a clean room and a comfortable bed.  Cons: The bed

We had a great experience.  This is not an upscale hotel - the rooms are fairly small, it's an older building, there are no coffee makers or ice machines ... but, it is an amazing location, Julie and James went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable, and we had an incredible experience.  If being right across the street from the beach, three blocks from the Huntington Beach Pier / Downtown, having free parking, being able to walk everywhere, and staying in a friendly casual place is more important to you than being in a more upscale place (for the same price) but farther from the beach, then I recommend the HB Surf Inn.

Right on Pacific Coast Highway. Clean, plenty of space and friendly hosts.  Was recommended it by a colleague who stayed at Huntington Surf Inn on our previous trip to Huntington Beach. After my stay I would recommend it to travellers looking for the relaxed feel and not wanting the formal hotel experience.

The service was great. Very friendly and accommodating. The room, well, it is very old and small. I guess they have done as well as they can with what they have but dont expect a nice updated room as if you were staying at a chain. Again, service is great but room is small, old and not well insulated from the road noise or the room next door. If you are traveling alone or with one other friend for a night this place should be fine but it would be very tight for a family or an extended stay.

Nice small place, clean comfortable and 5 min walk to Main street. Free Parking for those staying at hotel (1 space per room booking). I prefer this to the Hilton down the road. Great value. Super close to the beach. Had room #1 with the beach view. Nice little terrace to chill out on. No food or drink facilities but that doesn't matter as its only a short walkaway

This is the best hotel we have ever stayed at. I would recomend it to anyone and everyone! The rooms are so neat and the sitting area was really relaxing. I loved how close it was to the beach. I defiantly plan on staying here again!!

Summary Heading: We were made to feel extremely welcome :)
Summary: Great place to stay in Huntington Beach. Excellent service and James and Julie made us very welcome and feel right at home. It is located directly across from the surf beach and approx. 150m walk from main street. Would definitely stay here again! We had room 9.. spot on :)

Nice small hotel without the $27 a day parking fee. Manager was very nice and provide my wife a blanket. We stayed in #8 room and was very quite. Located two blocks from the pier and several nice Resturant. Checkout Rubys at the end of the pier and Dukes. Very safe area to walk around after dark. We had a great stay.

We are return visitors to the Surf Inn...The rooms are clean, and each has a different theme.Julie ,and James manage the place and made us feel like being with family ! Ideal location, just steps away from the beach, with lots of shopping close by. For us, this is the only place to stay for a great getaway !
Manager Response: Dear surfin59,  We are moved always by comments from guests like yourselves who are like family to us indeed. Hope to see you again soon and thank you for pointing out our strengths in customer service and our great location. Please take care,  L. Han

Summary: Had horrible experience w best western across the street so we came here and boy are we glad we did!! The women up front (Julie) was more then friendly, rooms are super cute, clean, convenient to Main Street and beds a comfortable. Defiantly will be back!!!

Summary Heading: So close to being a perfect hotel
Summary: My family and I stayed in 3 rooms for 4 days as we were in town to hold a Memorial Service for my brother.  He was a lifelong surfer and his favorite place was Bolsa Chica State Beach, just up the road from the Huntington Surf Inn.  The hotel is in a perfect location, within a short walking distance to Huntington Beach Pier, beach and restaurants and shopping.  Nice to be able to stroll down rather than have to hop in the car and look for a place to park.  The couple who run the place are good people.  The rooms are a nice size and were perfect for our needs. It is right across the street from the ocean and sitting on the outside terrace is quite peaceful.  There are two items that need attention and this place will be perfect.    The rooms need a thorough cleaning.  There was

Summary Heading: Going to stay as a surfer, you can't ask for much more.
Summary: If you want some quiet, go for room 8.  It's furthest away from Pacific Highway and you can barely hear any noise pollution. Then again, I went in the middle of the low season, so I can't speak for peak season.  When you contact them, you get a reply as if it's a big business of some sort.  It's a family business.  The husband or wife will be the one replying.  They are very friendly people and will do everything they can to help you.  Obviously there was different manageI don't know about the rest of the rooms, but I'll write my review purely from what I experienced.  I had a large flat screen TV, Queen sized (comfy) bed, private bathroom (each room has one), a small fridge, microwave, chest of drawers, a table with two chairs and a light, and unlimited fast wifi.  Bedrooms are

I found this motel via TripAdvisor at the last minute and had a nice stay.  For someone who is obsessed with surfing the place had great ambience.  Room 5 had a blue wave painted on the walls, and funky pictures of well dressed animals as well as old black and white photos of surfers.  The managers Julie and James were very friendly despite me checking in quite late, and they let me check out late as well.  It was not noisy.  The only con is the shower could use some modernizing.  The location is great for the beach and surfing.  For lovers of Vietnamese food and pho Westminster is a short drive away.  Overall I had a great time and look forward to coming back.
Manager Response: Dear tigrio72,  Thank you for your gracious feedback. You hit it out of the park with the comments about the tasty Vietnamese cuisine awaiting our guests about 10-15 minute drive away in Westminster.  Indeed, while we are a surfer inn that has hosted some of the great surfers of our time, we take pride in our patronage by guests coming from all corners of the world for vacation or for business. We hope to be the destination that will provide you with a great service amidst a sense of having a home away from home. We want you to know that we are in the midst of another cycle of updates and modernization of our facility. We hope to see you again soon!  L. Han

Summary Heading: It's was a great room in a great location!
Summary: Great room! 2 streets from Main Street! Quiet hotel we were able to party on Main Street and then come and sleep very comfortable! The rooms were unique and very cool! Great service! Would defiantly stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Lovelyalways1, Thank you so much for your kind words. We are indeed lucky to be in a great location, and, as you have seen, will continue to work hard to provide you with a memorable stay in terms of lodging location, amenities, and most importantly, fantastic customer service. Happy New Year! LH

Summary: This hotel is the only place I will stay in Huntington Beach. The last visit was the 5th time I have stayed at the Inn. I'm usually in room 6 and feel right at home when I "move in". I sleep like a baby every time I'm here.  Julie and James who manage the place are fantastic. They are very hands-on and go above and beyond to make sure you are happy. Whether I need extra pillows or towels it's no problem. I highly recommend the Tuesday night street market a few blocks away. Super fun! See you soon Julie and James cuz I'm coming back in a few weeks!
Manager Response: Dear Tori C, Thank you for your continued patronage. Guests like you keep us humble and your kindness inspire us to continue to improve. We are heading into a season of updates for the property, and look forward to serving you again soon. L. Han

Summary: I really wanted to like this hotel, but it didn't work for us.  We just needed a simple room to stay the night while traveling from Santa Cruz to San Diego. I liked the idea of supporting a locally owned hotel, but I wish I had made another choice. The biggest irritation was that the hotel left the lights on outside the rooms (for safety I presume) and the rooms didn't have proper window coverings. I felt like I could have read a book just by the light coming in through the window blinds. Since we were traveling with a toddler, it was especially annoying. The street noise was pretty high as well and the carpets were really dingy. It could be great for other people, but it just didn't work for our family. I'm glad that there are independently owned establishments, but this one
Manager Response: Dear Lisa A,  Thank you so much for your visit. Huntington Beach lodgings like the Huntington Surf Inn appreciates your sentiment about your patronage of small local businesses.  We certainly took note of your sentiment about lighting and noise. Our location right on Pacific Coast Highway and immediately across the Ocean means that we will not be absolutely quiet or completely dark at all time of the day. It is part and parcel of our fantastic oceanside location, as many guests have addressed in other reviews.  We would like to reassure you also that additional blinds are installed in our rooms for guests sensitive to any amount of light. We will be more aggressive in pointing them out for our guests upon arrival. Your comments on the carpet reflect your visit at the end of our year. Although our carpets are continuously being lauded by most of the guests, they are cleaned with high frequency, and are being changed annually. Your room's carpet is scheduled for change this week as a part of our routine year end maintenance.  We hope you will have another opportunity to return. We look forward for your kind patronage, especially from the standpoint of a unique and very small lodging.  Thank you again.  L Han

Summary: We arrived in the US after a long overnight flight and drove to Huntington Beach where we were booked to stay at the Huntington Surf Inn for two nights. We arrived around 10:30am and decided to see if we could get our room early. Julie and James greeted us with friendly faces and let us check in straight away which enabled us to get some much needed rest. They are extremely friendly operators who ensure their patrons have the kind of holiday they are looking for. The rooms were clean and beds comfy. It is walking distance to everything and enabled us land in the US, get our bearings and rest up in a friendly atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear Nat E,  Thank you so much for your stay. Your review is a good reminder for all of us that the little touches count, and we will be sure to remember this to keep on taking great care of our guests. As many of our guests have noted on TripAdvisor and elsewhere, we are a small property and we will always treat you like our own! Hopefully we will have the chance to take care of you again soon.  LH

Summary: A great place to stay. Julie & James make you feel very welcome. Nice & clean with good shower & parking, walking distance to the beach, shops, bars and restaurants. I'll be re visiting as soon as time and money allow.
Manager Response: Dear chrisgurr,  We thank you for your continued patronage. Return guests are our biggest affirmation that we are on the right path with our customer service as well as with our goal to be a honest to goodness value in lodging right on PCH.  We really appreciate your picture of the sunset. Hope you will have fond memory of time on the deck with your friends at the Inn.  Take care and hope to see you soon,  L. Han

Summary: Surf inn is very good, nice rooms good atmosphere and a beautiful view. You can park your car downstairs and it's only a few minutes from beach and center. The rooms are not very big, but clean and with a warm interior.

We stayed there only for 1 Night and it was awesome..nothing to complain!Very friendly owners and beautiful location,beach- a just 2 min walk and to the Main Street only 5minutes..we will be back for sure...!!

The Huntington Surf Inn is a little gem!  The managers are really great, you feel very welcome staying at the Inn.  The rooms have fun surfing decorations that really reflect being at the beach.  It was really nice to have a refrigerator in the room.  The big screen TV was awesome, bigger than many hotel TVs with lots of channels.  We REALLY enjoyed the proximity to the beach, the pier, the restaurants on Main Street - you really didn't need to use the car to get around.  We stayed in room 4, didn't really notice much street noise.  Thanks Julie and James for a great stay - love you guys!
Manager Response: Dear ILuvHawaiiclh,  Wow...what can we say in response to your kind review. Your comments remind us why we are in the lodging business and encourage us to keep trying harder to give everyone a great experience! Thank you so very much for your patronage, and we hope to see you again soon.  L. Han

Summary: While the decor at the Huntington Surf Inn is a lot of fun and the customer service friendly, I couldn't help but feel I was staying in my teenage daughter's bedroom--complete with dirty shower. the Inn's location is excellent, though PCH is a busy street with plenty of street noise. If the price were forty dollars cheaper, I would stay here again. At 190 a night, it was a little too motel-like.
Manager Response: Dear cginther,  Thank you for your kind patronage. The fun decor in some of the rooms indeed reflect our surfing heritage. Some of the rooms represent HGTV Design Star Antonio Ballatore's vision of famous surfers' bedrooms for the Nike Motel NoTell project, and are favorites of many of our guests.  We do appreciate your constructive comments and certainly will incorporate your thoughts into our frequent moments of soul searching in the neverending quest of making the Inn the best possible experience for our guests.  Please take care, and we hope to have another opportunity to serve you.  L. Han

Summary: We had a great time at Huntington Surf Inn! The location is perfect. You just have to cross the street and you're at the beach. The shops and restaurants are at walking distance. The hotel is a bit motel-like. So if you're looking for a fancy upscale hotel, this is not the place. But that's exactly what we liked about it. Basic, clean and friendly. A good place if you're on a surfing trip like us. The patio is great to have a beer and meet other guests after a day at the beach. Julie and James are great people and willing to help you with everything at any time.
Manager Response: Dear RaymieNetherlands, We are grateful for your patronage. Our property is indeed geared for an authentic surf and beach experience, and we try hard to also give you a good value for your stay. Your deck experience was certainly echoed by many guests. It really is a highlight for us too, as James and Julia often get to hang out with our guests and enjoy your tremendous company.  Life is short...surf more... :) Please take care and, once again, thank you so much. L. Han

Summary: unsure over MANY choices we had over the holiday weekend in hotels this was the winner! without even seeing the hotel we knew this was going to provide us trusted service based off the wonderful woman over the phone. . . we would soon know her as Julie. She was above and beyond great!! Great patio view, adorable rooms, and the most CLEAN places I've ever stayed. I'm already planning my next Huntington trip and I won't go anywhere else!!! The perfect experience!  Close to everything. - Jason Street
Manager Response: Dear Jason,  We appreciate your kindness in choosing the Huntington Surf Inn as we know you have a choice amongs all the fine establishments in Huntington Beach. Your decision to come back to the Inn for your next visit is truly our biggest pat on the back.   We are grateful also for your recognizance of Julie's knack for pleasing our guests. We pride ourselves that our guests always feel that they are home away from home, and promise to always try harder to take great care of you.  We look forward to seeing you soon.Thank you again.  L. Han

Summary: Only one issue - getting ice from the 7-11 is an unnecessary pain. Easy walking distance to the beaches and the main drag. Breakfast at the Sugar Shack is a must. All day bike rental for $10 is a good deal.
Manager Response: Dear Rboedecker,  Thank you for your patronage of the Inn. Your comments are indeed insightful and will be of  help for our other guests.  Because of our very small size, the ice machine was a casualty of space and the desire to keep noises down at night. For your convenience, we included a refrigerator with icemaking ability in each room, and the 7-11 a few steps away from our property hopefully can provide guests with more choices at all hours of the day.  The Sugar Shack has indeed been very popular with our guests, and bike rental is among the most inquired activities as well because our central location really made car driving unnecessary if you want to explore the local areas. Once again, we thank you and look forward to another opportunity to serve you soon.

Summary: The best feature about this inn is that everything is within walking distance. We did not use the car the entire time. Julie was very nice and helpful. The good reviews for this inn are legit. For the price it is a great deal. The only negative is that they don't allow pets. We will definitely stay here again.

We stayed here the first weekend of the US Open of Surfing. We could not have picked a better location. We were within walking distance of everywhere we went, including the beach and pier. Having the mini-fridge in the room turned out to be really nice for us since we ended up having some leftovers from lunch/dinner, and also kept our 6packs cold which we enjoyed on the hotel patio!  It was a little more than we wanted to spend, but we do understand all hotels with this location raise their rates for special weekends like the US Open. We will definitely stay here again and recommend this to any couple looking for a weekend getaway.

The hotel is close to beach and also a walking distance to downtown, so the location is perfect. Rooms have different theme to them, so we liked it and they are clean. The manager and his wife always were available for questions and if we needed an opinion of what places we should see.  We really enjoyed the stay at the hotel.

Summary Heading: Great Inn Prime Location on PCH
Summary: I don't normally feel compelled to share my experiences with others but my recent stay was such a great experience.  I had been promising my girls a nice relaxing weekend at the beach and did this place deliver!   From the moment we arrived, the managers Julie & James made us feel so welcome.  Whether it was retrieving my daughters earring out of the shower drain ( James to the rescue ) to making sure we were comfortable, I just cannot say enough about them.   I awoke to the patio with a beautiful view of the beach.  I stayed in room 2, which was more than enough room for my daughters and I.  Nothing fancy but very pleasant and with that down home feel.  The location is prime close walking distance to the pier and Main St.  This inn is certainly not the Hilton Waterfront down
Manager Response: Dear Mlsalas,  You have done it! Our response to your kind words is simply "WOW!"  Easily the best thing about running the Huntington Surf Inn as a micro property amongst the hotelier giants in Huntington Beach is the interaction with guests like you. We pledge to stay true to this spirit of hospitality and help all of our guests have an affordable, relaxing, and comfortable experience. We all deserve a little kindness, and you have indeed made us feel special!  Thank you and hope to see you very soon.  L. Han

Summary Heading: Chill spot across from the beach
Summary: Only nine rooms and the manger was sitting on the deck watching the waves when I showed up. They are a very nice pleasant couple from Tucson and the place they keep is spotless. It is not fancy but the location is perfect. Quirky rooms each with a theme to them. My only notes of caution are form light phobes or light sleepers. The room is on the PCH and can be a little noisy from street traffic. And the very bright room has shades and blinds but it was still bright in the morning with them drawn. It was fine by me because I had an early flight but had by girlfriend been there she'd have been complaining loudly!   All in all, I recommend this as great value in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Great location! Will stay here from now on.
Summary: Small gem across the street from the beach. Within walking distance of shopping, dining, etc. The rooms are on 2nd floor & parking underneath. Common patio with spectacular view of beach. Owners were the nicest people.

We found the Huntington Surf Inn on Trip Advisor when planning a cross-country trip for a friend's wedding.  Our friends were staying at the Hilton Waterfront down the street, but we simply could not afford to stay there so we chose the Huntington Surf Inn.  We are SO happy with our decision!! Our friends actually said they wished they booked with us instead of the Hilton! The location couldn't be better--steps from the beach (we could see the ocean from our window!) and downtown Huntington.  We stayed in Room 9 and it was wonderful! Our room had a large king bed, table and chairs, dresser, closet, fridge, and bathroom.  Definitely big enough for the two of us! We've stayed at countless B&Bs and although this is a smaller spot (not a B&B but it only has nine rooms), we felt the

Summary Heading: Convienent to the beach, restaurants, etc,.  Room are too dark, black ceilings?  Rooms are very clean but lack a comfortable cha
Summary: Friendly service.  Rooms are too dark, limited privacy, and lack comfortable chairs.  Needs vending machines for ice, and there is limited parking.  Friendly service makes up for limited amenities.  Convienent to the beach, shops, restaurants.

We stayed here overnight and the experience was great! We stayed in room 4 and it has 2 big beds. The restrooms are clean and dainty too. Parking and wifi are free of charge. The location is great  - just a a few walks to the beach, shops and downtown. Julie and James were very accommodating too. They allowed us to stay in the room for an hour until our shuttle service arrived. I'd love to stay here again.

Summary Heading: Little motel with a big view
Summary: Huntington Surf Inn isn't fancy. But it's clean, comfy and perfectly placed within a short walk of the pier, dining and shopping. The big deck gives guests a fine view of the beach. Julie and James are friendly, efficient managers. Room #3, the Hendrix room, has purple shag and a purple ceiling, along with two queen beds and a large shower. We wished we could've stayed longer!
Perfect location, clean and friendly.  We enjoyed our stay and it provided everything we were looking for.  We liked the unique decor, it is something different!  We would stay there again!

My sons and I stayed over the weekend of July 13th and found the Inn to be just want we wanted. Steps away from the beach, entertainment and dining which was great we didn't have to drive anywhere or look for parking.   With only nine rooms you get to meet other guest as well as the staff.  We enjoyed talking with Julie and Danny on the deck.  We are looking forward to staying with you again.  Thanks again for your warm hospitality.

Summary Heading: a great place to stay for the surf
Summary: Seriously, I'm not even going to get into it because for what I need and the location and price, it will surprise you.  The managers Julie and James are seriously just awesome.  They are honest, good people on the inside and they "get it."    I honestly don't have anything else to say about this place except that it was a perfect stay to catch a couple waves, go for a run, go to my favorite fish taco joint and sleep and take a shower.    If you are prissy and a pain in the butt and need to have every single creature comfort in the book, go someplace else.  I adore and respect this place so much.

Julie and James (and the friendly and always smiling cleaning boy) made all the diference, that's for sure. Beautiful city, honest hotel with an amazing view and nice people trying to do their best: how could it be different than excellent??? Thanks for making our family vacation unforgetable, friends! ;)
Manager Response: Dear SurfingCarioca,  We want to thank you so much for your kind review. You captured our essence indeed when you said that we are an honest hotel. Our goals always will be to give you a great experience at a fair price, amenities that make a meaningful difference like free wifi and free parking, and of course, great customer service from staff who are encouraged to think outside the box to make your stay better.  We have been very fortunate to have gotten to know so many wonderful guests from all over the world. We count you among our friends as well as look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  L. Han

Summary: If you're looking for a super fancy place to stay, this is not your hotel. However, if you want a clean, comfortable room just a short walk from the beach I highly recommend it. I took my teenage daughter and her friend on a trip to Huntington Beach last week and I'm so glad we chose to stay at the Huntington Surf Inn.  Julie and James were very friendly and made us feel at home. A very different experience from staying at a huge hotel chain.   Just out your door is a big deck with a great ocean view. We were able to walk to the beach instead of paying $15 to drive and park at the beach. There is a 7-11 and a CVS within walking distance. Also, the main street for shopping and dining is within walking distance.....just a couple of blocks.  We were able to park at the hotel (free
Manager Response: Dear Erin S,  Thank you so much for your incisive comments. James and Julie certainly care very much about our guests, and they do wear their hearts on their sleeves, so to speak. Indeed, as a very small company, our priority is to take care of you as we would our own family.   We are glad you enjoyed the free wifi and parking. As a beachside inn, we pride ourselves for having an unique experience where you will be able to enjoy a nice lodging in a very convenient location, with all the kindness you would expect from friends and family...while still having some change left in your pocket to enjoy all the great things that Huntington Beach has to offer.  James and Julie look forward to serving you again soon, and want to thank you very much for your kindness.  L. Han

Summary Heading: Nice, inexpensive hotel..steps away from the beach!
Summary: Me and my 3 daughters stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn while visiting Huntington Beach.  The managers onsite made us feel like we were staying with family...a drastic difference then staying at a chain hotel where you are only a room #.  They remembered my name and said hello everytime we saw each other.  I loved this hotel because of its originality...each room is designed different so it made it fun to choose our room!  The bathroom could use a little updating but other than that...we loved it and would definitely return.

Summary Heading: Great location, good management, a safe place to sleep not much else.
Summary: This is a great place to stay overnight for those who want to be close to the beach - only steps away and accross the PCH.  Also a few blocks to the Main Street in Huntington Beach.  The managers are very friendly and accomodating.  There is not much more to this place.  The room and bathroom are small and not very new. I can't say there were not clean.  We would probably not stay here again. There are much nicer beaches and less expensive places to stay in Southern California and Central Coast.  Our favorites were Laguna Beach and Pismo Beach.  After Huntington Beach we went to Venice and Santa Monica Beaches and would not go back there.  Too many homeless, strange, tatooed people at all three.
Manager Response: Dear Travelbugxox,  Thank you very much for the opportunity to serve you at the Inn.  As one of the great surfing cities of the world, Huntington Beach is an iconoclastic place where you will certainly experience many of the unique aspects of the surf culture. Of course, our location across from the ocean, right on Pacific Coast Highwa, will reflect some of this surf and beachside culture and quirks that have been considered to be quite charming by so many of our guests, as evidenced by their reviews on this site. We hope that you will consider another visit to Huntington Beach, and our Inn.  Take care and thank you again,  L. Han

Summary: nice handy location to the beach,  I did like the wallpaper in our room!

Summary Heading: Huntington Surf Inn - On the beach!
Summary: This is a great little hotel & we enjoyed our stay.  There were 4 of us, 2 adults and 2 older children.  I booked after reading all the reviews on Trip Advisor and we were very pleased.  Pros -   - It is right across the street from the beach  - Very cute and clean  - Free parking for 1 car under building  - Managers on property are very nice & helpful  - Next door to a 7-11 for easy access to soft drinks / ice / coffee, etc.. 1 block from CVS for the rest  - Very close to restaurants and shopping, 2-3 blocks  Cons -   - The beds need to be upgraded, more of a "futon" style mattress and not very comfortable for us "older' folks - I'm sure the younger ones don't even notice  - The rooms are small, so for 4 of us, it was a bit of a logistic issue, but then again, you are not in

Stay here. Has everything you need (location; free parking; air conditioning; great view; walk to beach, restaurants & pier).  Also, nice neighborhood, plus 20% off coupon for a good restaurant close by.  Can't beat this place for a beach getaway for a few days.

The Huntington Surf Inn is a nice quaint motel right across from the beach, a few blocks from the main drag in Huntington not far from the Pier.  With only a few eclectic rooms (the décor is very "surfer kewl") this is not a hotel so don't expect the Marriott in a big city.  We got to peak in a few of the rooms and some were awesome.  The staff was very accommodating offering honest views about the area and genuinely concerned that our stay was comfortable.  I felt like we were staying with long lost cousins!  The rooms are clean and they don't seem to put up with much non-sense.  I suspect the partying in Huntington can quickly escalate which would not be good for such a small place.  We had to check out a little late and it was no problem at all.  They run a tight ship getting

We really enjoyed our stay here! The hotel is so close to the shops, restuarants, and pier! The staff is amazing! The rooms are hip and comfortable! The view of the ocean and the breezes are wonderful and we will be back - can't wait!

well my wife and I stayed here in May had a great time no problems Room 8 was great!!!! the only thing i would change is the porch light would not turn off but i can live with that. And the shower was GREAT me and my wife had a lovely time. in and out of the room...
Manager Response: Dear jaydee48_12,  Thank you so much for staying with us. Your comment about the enjoyment of life "in and out" of the room really brought smiles to our faces. We will discuss the hall light issue that you mentioned, and will find a solution that can balance the need for lighting in the hallway and maximizing guest comfort and convenience. Thank you again, and we hope to see you soon.  L. Han

Summary Heading: Great location, comfortable beds, excellent value
Summary: This Inn is across the street from the beach. It has a nice deck you can relax and enjoy the sunset or breakfast. It's a couple blocks from Main street Huntington Beach. Overall a great place to stay a night or 2 to enjoy the beach, there is no pool but the beach is right there. It is right on Pacific Coast Hwy so the road can be noisy. Overall a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear ntaormina,  Thank you so much for choosing the Huntington Surf Inn as your lodging of choice in Huntington Beach. We pride ourselves in giving you an honest experience and appreciate the fact that, as a saavy traveler, you have seen through the fluff and identified keypoints that make the Inn a preferred destination for many of your fellow guests.   We promise to continue to take great care of our guests, and to develop ways to improve the value your stay. We hope to see you again soon!  L. Han

Summary: Perfect location and great hotel with warmth and personality.  Walking distance to everything.  Great parking when we did need to drive anywhere.  The trip was to San Deigo and Orange to look at colleges.  We chose Huntington for something different and are so pleased that we did.  Huntington Surf Inn was my daughters idea and it worked out prefectly.  We were able to visit the colleges on her list and even see Hollywood Blvd. and Venice beach.  We will stay at Huntington Surf Inn when we are in southern California again.
Manager Response: Dear cam w, It was indeed our pleasure to be your host. We are grateful that your daughter researched our property and allowed us to share a little bit of California hospitality with your family during an undoubtedly momentous trip to look at colleges. Your kindness in reviewing us is much appreciated, and will remind us to keep improving. See you next time in room 5! L. Han

Summary: My wife and 8yr old daughter and I just returned from a 7 day vacation in southern California.  We absolutely loved the Huntington Surf Inn run by Julie and James.  We are not big fans of the impersonal big hotel chains where you trek down long, indoor corridors to your room.  At the Surf Inn, (where all rooms are elevated/2nd floor rooms) you open your door and your outside looking at the ocean!    Steps away from your door is a large, elevated outside patio which provides the perfect place to start your morning with a cup of coffee or to end your day by watching a beautiful sunset.  Julie and James are like family, always calling you by name, checking to see if you need anything or asking about your day.  This is the perfect Mom & Pop top place to stay if you like being by the
Manager Response: Dear Kelly K, Thank you very much for your thoughtful comments. We are also especially grateful for your kindness in treating James and Julia graciously. Having only nine rooms means that you are like our family coming down to HB to visit, and the entire staff of the Inn are glad you indeed felt that way.  Our expressed goal other than awesome customer service is to provide you with great value, especially in these "interesting" economic time. Hopefully our guests will appreciate that we omit some fluff in exchange for meaningful services that will save on your bottom line like free parking and free wifi. Our deck is indeed a unique meeting point for the Inn. We look forward to seeing your family on the deck again soon at sunset! Please take care, L. Han

Summary: Perfect location we walked everywhere  we wanted to go no need to drive room 5 is sweeeeeeeet!  We will be back
Manager Response: Dear Sk8trash, We are super stoked as well that you enjoyed room 5. It is one of our iconic rooms and certainly echoes our desire to be a little different from your average lodging. We are grateful that you plan to come back, and look forward to serving you again soon. L. Han

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn for 2 nights in April 2012 and enjoyed it so much.  It is a small, homey Inn and just right for the 2 of us.  The beach is just across the street and it was wonderful!  You can easily walk to stores in Huntington Beach or drive up the coast to the Aquarium in Long Beach.  We enjoyed our stay.  The only bad thing was there was no coffee maker or a microwave, which would have been nice.  But overall it was very enjoyable, and we would stay here again.  (One negative thing was they just have a shower and my daughter would have enjoyed relaxing in a tub.  Also there were hairs in the shower and I had to clean them before we got in)
Manager Response: Dear SueHD,  Thank you very much for sharing your insights about our property. We are proud to have been able to provide you with a down home experience just minutes from the beach and fun of downtown Huntington Beach. Indeed we do have microwaves for in room use and will certainly remind future guests about their availability. We appreciate also your extra custodial work. We would like to assure you that that is an exceedingly rare event, and that certainly it is high on our list of priorities to ensure that you have a fantastic stay. We hope to see you again soon!  Take care, L. Han

Summary: Stayed with my 84-year-old mom in room #3, the Jimi Hendrix room.  Fun!   We felt like we were visiting family by Julie & James.  They are the best, down to earth, funny, nice, caring.  Forgot a bag outside our door and within minutes, they picked it up and returned it, and whenever we ran into them coming and whenever we saw them, they called us by our first names.  There are steps to the 2nd floor where the rooms are located, and they were difficult for my mom, but she was a trooper and made it up and down several times.  We visited our neighbors out on the deck.  We will definitely book it again.  We split our vacation between two motels, and I regret that.  I'll stay at Surf Inn the whole time next visit.  We didn't need a car either.  I miss J&J!
Manager Response: Dear Michele B., Wow...thank you for your kind words. J&J are nice folks and will always treat you like family. We try harder at the Inn, to paraphrase the Avis commercial, and are always grateful for the opportunity to serve wonderfully kind guests like you and your mother. Take care. Hopefully we will be hanging out together along with the other guests on the deck again soon. L. Han

Summary: Just got back after staying with 2 teenagers in Room 2! Great place....LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION, says it all. Besides that , Julie and James are so nice and  welcoming, very down to earth. Room was comfy and cozy, great bed. We even got to use the microwave ;) The sitting area is comfortable, you can sit and watch the world go by at your feet!!
Manager Response: Dear SeattleZippy, We thank you for your kind thoughts about James, Julia, and the Inn. We are glad you brought up your use of a microwave. Indeed we do have microwaves on site, and guests can just ask at the front desk for them at any time. Our deck is a favorite feature for many of our visitors, as well as for James and Julia. Who will forget the HB sunset after hanging out on the deck with fellow guests "watching the world go by"! Take care,  L. Han

Summary: Great place! Great Location! Great People! Everything in walking distance. Bring your beverage of choice and enjoy the sunset from the deck!
Manager Response: Dear David B, Thank you so much for putting it so succinctly. We will continue to improve to justify your faith in us and to be a cool joint for everyone!! Take care, L. Han

Summary Heading: Perfect location, perfect service, perfect price!
Summary: Beautiful little place. Only 9 rooms all situated above a small area for parking. Took less than 5 minute to get to Main Street and the pier (with a toddler walking). Can see the ocean from certain rooms. Amazing view of the sunset! Absolutely everything was within walking distance. Did not have to get in my car even once during our stay. Amazing restaurants and shops all within a 5 min walk or less. And most importantly, the customer service was outstanding! We are instant repeat customers! I would recommended the Huntington Surf Inn to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear hatcherfamilyman,  We have all been moved by your review and your comment about becoming instant repeat customers!  Indeed, Julia and James know customer service, and strive to treat all our guests like family.  Our goal is to provide our customers with a great experience. Travel should be a blast. We feel truly privileged that you entrusted a big portion of ensuring that it will be fun to us.  We hope to see your family again soon...plenty of room at the deck!  Please take care, L. Han

Summary Heading: Perfect weekend get-away for our first visit to HB.
Summary: I loved the location, loved that it was one block from a CVS and 7-11 for any last minute items, 2 blocks from the cutest, hippest downtown with great food, shops, happy hour specials and people watching and great views of the ocean. The rooms were recently remodeled and the pictures on the website don't do it justice, so much creativity and modern art in the rooms. A little noisy as it is right on pch but that's A fair exchange to be right across from te ocean. The heater in our room didn't work but we were there on a rare weekend when you would even need a heater. Not many amenities but there is not much more we could have needed besides the mini fridge. Overall very satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear craymond1,  Thank you so much for your great review. Indeed our location has been a blessing. Most of our guests have not needed a car after arrival to our location. We are especially proud that you enjoyed the decoration of your room, as we wanted to present our guests with a more personalized approach to hotel room design as befitting a property of our size. You will be pleased to know that we have taken your review in account and have readjusted the heater, which will come handy this fall, and right now the a/c is working well.  We are ready for you to come back!  Take care, L. Han

Summary: Great location, nice room, good value. Everything is a short walk away.  Beach is across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Ahwaziran, Thank you for your succinct review of the Huntington Surf Inn. Although we are indeed blessed by a location so close to the beach and activities of Huntington Beach, we will continue to strive to make your visit a pleasant one with great customer service and cool rooms at affordable prices. We hope to see you again soon! L. Han

Summary: We had the pleasure of staying at the Huntington Surf Inn in Huntington Beach the night before we raced the Surf City Half Marathon.  We found the hotel clean, convenient and with the friendliest staff around!  We were greeted with smiles and suggestions and I even was able to borrow a hair dryer so that I could look good after the race ( A girl has got to do what a girl has got to do!).  The only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is because we were in room #1 and the Hotel Sign was really bright throughout the night (thank goodness for my race headband!) and the traffic was pretty constant (until they closed down the PCH) sometime during the night.  I would highly recommend this hotel, just make sure you stay in any room but room #1!
Manager Response: Dear Patty0625,  Thank you so much for your kind review. We are sure you looked great after the race, hair dryer in use or not!  You are indeed correct that our location allows our guests to be in the thick of the race. Over the years, the Inn has been privileged to host many racers, and has strived to give you a peaceful and quiet rest before the race as well as complimentary late checkouts.  Of note, room 1's views of the ocean and Pacific Coast Highway does make it a little livelier than some of our other rooms. We apologize that we did not get the opportunity to show you the roll up blind hidden in the window that would have blocked out lights effectively for you. We will be putting a placard in room 1 to remind guests that they have this option available. Once again, thank you and best wishes for future successes in this incredible feat of sportsmanship and endurance.  L. Han

Summary: As someone traveling alone, I doubt any other place could have felt quite so much like home. The Inn's small size, family-business feeling and incredibly kind and helpful couple manning the place made for a great 3-4 days stay there. I can't imagine any other larger hotel lending booties to a surfer in need... then again I may be wrong, but that was just one of many helpful gestures the landlords extended me during my stay. Huntington beach is all the better off with the Surfer's Inn and I would definitely go back there next time round!
Manager Response: Dear Stewie G,  Thank you for the exceptionally kind words. We love our guests, and have been blessed with many many great ones. You came all the way from Hong Kong, and deserved the very best we can offer in customer service and TLC.  Come on back anytime, and we will keep the booties around for you!  Happy New Year,  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary Heading: Just an all-around great place to stay!
Summary: This place is just a really nice place.  It's not a big hotel, so you get friendly, personable owners that are there to greet you, nice clean rooms that have a cool, laid-back decor and feeling, parking just steps from your door, couple blocks from everything, including the beach.  And the price is much less than other area hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Beachx3,  Thank you so much for your review.   You really captured the essence of who we are. We want to be very personable and friendly while providing you a lodging choice that has all the modern facilities at a fair price so that you can still have some change left over to enjoy the incredible attractions down the street in Huntington Beach. When you are tired, c'mon back to the Inn and watch the sun set with us on the deck.  Thank you again. Please take care and safe travels.  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: Managemant was amazing, professional and so accomodating. Location couldn't be better. Walking distance to bars, restauants, shopping...perect! Rooms were clean and so comfortable! Would definently recommend!

The staff, the rooms and the view make Huntington Beach and the Huntington Surf Inn a wonderful place to just kick back and relax. There are always plenty of things going on in the town to keep you busy during the day. And the night-life is just as welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear Taylor B,  Thank you for your kindness in writing this review. We are grateful for your visit, and want you to know that James and Julia will keep the doors open for you anytime. Your comments about the activities in HB is indeed very accurate. The neat thing is that the nightlife, shopping, and dining is set up discreetly so that the beach itself still feels pristine, and the waves not crowded. We look forward to serving you again soon. Bless your heart :)  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: My partner and I had business in the area and decided to stay again at 'The Surf'. On our last visit we found the cleanliness and decor of the rooms to be very satisfactory. The location is great, a block or two from all the shopping, food, and nightlife that Huntington Beach has to offer. But what really brought us back this trip was the 'staying at the family beach house' atmosphere that managers Julie and James create. They are a breath of fresh air in an industry that can often leave you cold. We can live without a lot of amenities when the 'vibe' is so good. Next trip, we may even bring our wives...
Manager Response: Dear Mark S,  On behalf of James and Julia, we thank you for your continued patronage of the Inn! We love our return guests, and really appreciate the friendship and kindness of everyone who come back again and again to us.  The Inn sure is different from the usual corporate lodging, but you know that we will always welcome you back to the "family beach house" which, in a greater sense, belongs to y'all, us, and our frequent flyers.  Looking forward to seeing the spouses one day. Wow!  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: Huntington Beagh was our last location before flying back to Australia after 11 week holiday to USA & Canada. Great location, Excellent hosts in Julie & James. We stayed 4 nights its not fancy but it has everything you need. Huntington Beach is a great place  to enjoy the California sun & sand
Manager Response: Dear pomlea,  Thank you for your review. As a regular contributor to Trip Advisor, your voice certainly carries a lot of weight for us. We consistently strive to improve the "Inn" experience for our guests. As such, we are always exploring how to balance fancy with functionality and practicality for an oceanside property with a really interesting mix of guests.   One thing that you can count on for your next visit will be our exemplary customer service and our constant desire to give you a down home experience, while still giving you, as you so succinctly commented, "everything you need".  Thank you again,  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: A beautiful little hotel right next to the beach. The staff is very friendly, flexible and accomodating. They made me feel right at home. A very relaxing and pleasing experience. The room I had was very colorful and was a wonderful compliment to the bright California sun. There is a wonderful little sun deck with a greatl view of the ocean, to mingle with others staying there, or just to enjioy a cold drink watching the sun go down. I took so many pictures from this sun deck alone! The next time I want to enjoy the California beach, this is where I will be heading!
Manager Response: Dear Alex C,  Thank you so much for your kind words. Our doors will always be open for you, and we look forward to seeing you on the deck again soon. James and Julia certainly try hard to make everyone's stay a great experience. We will remain your beach house away from home.  Fred Malzahn, General Manager

Summary: i used to live in newport beach, and found this little diamond in the rough called the huntington surf inn. i stayed there before the remodel and after.it super cute and clean..who needs fancy!!!  it is so quaint and special, i will always stay there. i love julie and james and of course bubba!!! my boyfriend. someday i will bring all my friends and we will rent the entire 9 rooms...lookout! love always michelle from ohio.
Manager Response: Dear Leigh S,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We would love to have you and your pals take over for a massive slumber party one of these days. We really appreciate our loyal guests, and look forward to serving you again in 2012! We will always try to polish the "diamond" and promise to maintain a great balance between keeping it personal while giving you the best in modern lodging accoutrements.
