Take care and thank you again.  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary Heading: Not great for families....better for singles
Summary: Property is better for singles then families...management not flexible(no late checkouts EVER!) and not tolerant of active kids. Property is basic but clean and well maintained. Excellent location. Rates 130-170 plus tax.
Manager Response: Dear harvey j, Thank you for your review of the Inn. I would like to address your comments as followed.  1. Late check out. The Inn is always committed to doing our best to honor your late check out request . In your case, there was a reservation the next day for your room, so we needed to have timely access to prepare the room for the next guest. I hope you can appreciate that we are acutely aware of the delicate balance between your desire to stay beyond the check out time and the real world necessity to have time to prepare the room to the highest standard for the guest checking in shortly after you leave. I would be grateful if you accept our apology that we could not extend this courtesy to you this time.  2. Children. Taking care of active children is indeed a delicate topic, and the Inn appreciates parental supervision of children of all ages in our combined effort to ensure a safe and fun stay for our young future guests. Indeed, the Inn welcomes and has served families of all ages, with many return vists from satisfied guests. Please see our previous reviews in TripAdvisor and other sites.   Thank you again. I am, as always, grateful for your stay and hope to have another opportunity to be your host.  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: Management here was great!  Always very friendly and helpful.  Would highly recommend this great place in a great location!

Super staff, Julie (owner) was at the front desk when we arrived, and gave us all the right places to visit in the area. Just two blocks from main st. and the pier. Hotel is nothing too fancy, but the location is fantastic, right across the street from the beach. The rooms are very clean, and artfully decorated. Where else would you find yourself sleeping beneath the image of Jimi Hendrix (could you ask for anything more?). Wish we had more time to enjoy, from what we 'experienced' in our short stay, we will return...

The convenience of being able to walk everywhere from the beach and the pier to the restaurants and bars along the main strip was priceless. You couldn't ask for better access than this. Rooms were spacious and well-kept and the prices were much cheaper than a lot of the other places offering beach access. Staff was very friendly and helpful with of our requests.

Loved the Inn and for us, everything was within walking distance.  Management was first rate and rooms are tastefully done and very comfortable.  Will be back again in 2012 for the marathon and the Inn is half a mile from the start.....just perfect!  Will definitely be staying here again.

Summary Heading: A return to the charm of beach lodgings of yesteryear where you are made to feel right at home.
Summary: The Surf Inn really is ideally situated for a visit to Huntington Beach. Overlooking the ocean it's just a short stroll to downtown. Julie and James( yes you get to know the managers!!) make you feel right at home and are always happy to help. The rooms are amazingly decked out, clean and of good size. It's a step back to surfing culture of yesteryear , a real experience to make you want to return to Huntington and the Surf Inn.
Manager Response: Dear Watercarver, On behalf of James and Julia and the entire staff of the Inn, I would like to thank you for perfectly describing what the Inn is all about. Yes, we are very small, and we are different, indeed. For certain, though, our goal is to let you have a down home experience so that you can not only truly relax by the stunning beaches immortalized by Jan and Dean and the surfer culture of Southern California, but also enjoy a safe, comfortable, and warm lodging experience where you are served by friends. The inn looks forward to seeing you again! Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary Heading: Feels like home, great location, great people running the place awesome rooms!
Summary: The location is perfect. Walking distance from food, shopping, bars and the beach is across the street. I love the rooms and all the different styles they have. The managers are awesome and will do anything for you to ensure you have a comfortable visit. Great place! When I go back to Huntington Beach I will make sure to stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Fireovermercury,  Yet another interesting moniker!  We are indeed very grateful for your kind words. I am grateful that you were happy with James and Julia's efforts, and want to let you know that your words will encourage all of us to work harder to ensure a great lodging experience for everyone. Welcome home!  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: Best hosts in So Cal.  great rooms.  and it's great for a surf trip!  across PCH from tower 6 in view of the break.
Manager Response: Dear ALRIGHTbrother,  Interesting moniker! Thank you very much for a very succinct review of the Inn. You are right. It all boils down to having kind hosts running a lodging in a great location for incredibly nice guests. Y'all deserve the best when you travel and we at the Inn have been also incredibly fortunate as well.  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: Julie and James were awesome hosts.  The location could not have been better and the deck was a great place to meet new people.  Not too many extras at this hotel, but it was cheaper than others.  The room was clean and the parking was free.  We would definitely stay here again, but we would make sure we had all the amenities we need.
Manager Response: Dear ScottFamily1120,  Thank you so much for your kind review! It is great to hear that you enjoyed meeting guests just as interesting as yourselves at the inn. On recent visits to the deck, we met a golf pro from Las Vegas, a champion surfer from Australia, a photographer, and a very nice newlywed couple. All were incredibly nice as we all shared a lot of laughter and enjoyed the views of the beautiful sunset together. We appreciate your comment about amenities at the Inn. We strive to give you the best value for your stay, and include free Internet, parking, and local phone service in your room rate. Beach towels, and other knick knacks are always available for your use gratis, as well. However, we promise to build on this to improve your lodging experience, and hopefully will have the opportunity to take care of you soon with your next visit.   Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Huntington Surf Inn for 3 nights last month - checking out OC and doing a bit of surfing - and had a great time! The rooms were cool (we stayed in the Jimmy Hendrix room) and the hosts were incredibly friendly - thanks for a fun time at Huntington Beach!
Manager Response: Dear Rob1981_11, We thank you also for your patronage. We always have had unbelievably gracious, sophisticated, and fun guests from the UK, and you continue that streak! On behalf of the whole crew, all of whom you have met, we wish you happy and safe travels. Think of us during the coming cold and gray days in London, and know that we look forward to serving you again. Fred Malzahn  General Manager

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Huntington. Hands down.
Summary: I stayed here for the us open friday and saturday. The staff at Huntington surf inn was unbelievable... in a good way! Everything was clean and well kept. and nice. they were so nice and helpful and i appreciate everything they had done to make my trip awesome.  its located in a prime spot. about a 3 min walk to the beach and main street. a lot of activities and restaurants were so close. I will for sure come here again with my friends and i next year. i was completely satisfied with my stay. and HIGHLY recommend Huntington Surf Inn!!  Thanks again, Chris
Manager Response: Dear Chris, Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate our wonderful guests, especially those who care enough to let us know that they will come back to the Inn! James and Julia certainly work hard to take care of our guests, and we hope that our good intentions shine through. Obviously the Inn is always looking for ways to improve your lodging experience. We want you to know that your words will encourage us to strive for the best customer service experience possible. Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place in a great location!
Summary: This hotel is perfectly located if you want easy access to the beach and downtown HB. You won't need a car to get around as everything is within walking distance. If you're looking for luxury accommodations with lots of amenities, this is not your hotel. But if you are looking for a clean and comfortable place at a good value - tgis is it!
Manager Response: Dear wzpilot, Thank you so much for your succinct and kind review. While we are indeed blessed with a great location, we want to reassure you and other guests that we will continue to work hard to make your stay a memorable one. There are no rules against combining luxury with fun and good value, so we will keep working toward the goal of giving you great lodging, great service, and great pricing. Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the surf inn last weekend during the US OPEN.  We had a great time and the hotel was just across PCH from the beach....couldn't have picked a better location!  The rooms were clean, and the couple that ran it were great.  There's a nice deck that overlooks the beach where we were able to hang out with friends and family during the day.  I thought the rates were a little high, but so was everywhere else that weekend.  If you're looking for a unique experience while in huntington beach, I would highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear bdb3035,  Thank you so much for a very nice perspective of life at the Inn during the amazing and exciting US Open of Surfing. With thousands and thousands of guests descending into Huntington Beach for all the festivities, room rates of beach side lodgings certainly are at the crest for the summer season.   We are very grateful for our guests' patronage, and try to maximize the value of each stay by providing complementary services that would have been extra charges in many other properties.  Best wishes for a great summer in the Windy City! Go Cubs! Bears season starts soon, wow.   Fred Malzahn

Summary Heading: Family of 5 to CA first time - Loved Surf Inn!
Summary: Flying from Chicago to CA with three kids, ages 2,4, and 6.  Couldn't wait to get to our rooms and explore sunny Huntington Beach!   We had no idea what to expect when we pulled up to the Surf Inn, but we were pleasantly surprised!  There was FREE parking (a big deal if you are from Chicago!)  We had two rooms, perfect for all of our stuff.  The rooms were so clean and fun!  It was laid back and easy, thanks to James and Julie, who were wonderful!  Not only did they take great care of us, but they were the best babysitters, always keeping a watchful eye out for three little ones who were known to enjoy running around the deck (we were the only ones there during the week).  They were beyond accommodating and just nice to be around!    The location was perfect!  Even toting three
Manager Response: Dear Christine, Thank you so much for the generous feedback. James and Julia may have to buy bigger hats now, after reading your kind words. They certainly enjoyed your presence at the Inn, and look forward to taking care of you again some day. Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary Heading: The staff was wonderful, the rooms were unique, the location couldn't be beat!
Summary: The owners were more than helpful with EVERYTHING.  Super nice people, who were more than willing to help us out, answer questions, etc.  The rooms were clean and comfortable, and totally unique in design and decor.  The location was literally a 2 minute walk to the beach, restaurnts, shops, bars, and I don't think we could have found a nicer place for the price we paid, so close to all of that.  If we ever decide to return to Huntington Beach, we'll be sure to stay at the Huntington Surf Inn.
Manager Response: Dear thebinsubtle,  Thank you so much for your kind words. We are small, independent, and grateful to have the opportunity to provide you with a fun lodging experience that reflect the easy going lifestyle of the beach and surf culture...but with customer service that makes you feel like you are staying with family, albeit without sharing bathrooms!  Your tip about Room 3 is very astute. The room was nicknamed the Jimi Hendrix room by our guests. It was designed originally for Kohole Andino, a superstar surfer, by Antonio Ballatore of Design Star fame for our Nike 6.0 Motel No Tell experience last summer. Please come back soon! Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: Huntington surf inn is in a great location. Has a great view of the ocean & walking distance from main street. Had a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Boopster4, Thank you for your "awesome" review. We are grateful for our wonderful guests, and look forward to serving you again very soon. James White Manager

Summary: Very much enjoyed our stay. Julie and James are friendly and keep the place running smoothly and the location is ideal, across the street from the beach. Renovated rooms with new paint/carpet. Everything is in walking distance.  Forget the chain hotels, this independent is all you need. And super easy to book a real reservation online, which includes real photos of the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear pandreuc, James and Julia really appreciated your encouraging words. Furthermore, the entire Inn applauds your thoughtful sentiments about our independent status, which gives us flexibility and freedom to customize the guest's experience to achieve a memorable stay. After all, our guests deserve the best! Thank you again, Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary: This was a great experience. Very convenient location. Unique room that was very clean. Friendly helpful staff. Top choice for our next stay in Huntington Beach!
Manager Response: Dear Frankepeal, Thank you for your "frank" review! On behalf of James and Julia I thank you for the opportunity to make your travel more memorable, and look forward to serving you in the near future.  Fred Malzahn General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, very nice and helpful owners.
Summary: Great place, nice surfing atmosphere. Very nicely designed rooms. The owners were nice and helpful with any questions that we had. Location is suberb, right next to pier and main street.
Manager Response: Dear Marakatti, Thank you so much for your kind review. We really appreciate your kind words about customer service! We are a bit different from the big chain hotels, and do try hard to offer our guests a fun experience and good value for the money for your visit to Huntington Beach. From a value standpoint, we hope you enjoyed some of our amenities such as complementary wifi, local phone service, and parking. We hope to see you again soon in sunny southern California. James White Manager

Summary Heading: A real gem in Huntingon, can't beat it.
Summary: Overall I loved it. Rooms were very cool and clean. The beds were comfy and they only do room service upon request which I like because I don't like having people go through my room that has my wallet, phone, iPod, etc. The couple that runs it is awesome and were very friendly. The views from the deck at night are beautiful and the location is just phenomenal. Conveniently located next to a cvs and 7/11 and a short walk from Main street, shopping, dining, etc. I will absolutely go back.

Julie and James will take care of whatever you need. We stayed in room 1 and it was spotless and everything worked. Will stay in room 9 next trip. If you are a light sleeper due to lights you do not want room 1 as the outside light will show through the blinds. I do not have that problem and slept just fine in a comfortable bed. It is just a block away from Supreme Donuts for a great cup of coffee early and all the beach activities at the pier are just two more blocks. Our walk North one block from the hotel and cross over there to the beach without the crowds. You will get your moneys worth here and the managers are friendly.

Summary Heading: I slept with Jimi Hendrix at the Huntington Surf Inn!
Summary: Okay, not really, but the mural of him, Roger and Mick was pretty cool.  My 14 year old daughter and I had a great time and she especially loved the room. It was very clean and the beds were quite comfortable.   Julie and James were terrific.  When our flight was delayed did our family call to check on us to see if we were okay? No. Julie did.  She said she was just checking to make sure we had made it in to HB safely.  So sweet!  Both Julie and James were friendly and helpful with anything we needed.  James even gave me tide information and recommended the best time to surf so I didn't get clobbered by the massive waves on Fri.  We will definitely come back to the Surf Inn.  The only draw back was that the cars on PCH were kind of loud when we were trying to fall asleep at
Manager Response: Dear JenDawn89,  Clearly you are the winner of the best caption contest :) Thank you so much for the great review. Come back and sleep with you know who again some time. We are grateful that you mentioned Julie's phone call. We care, and we are happy that you appreciate that we do!!  James White

Summary: We turned up on the day after checking a few hotels in the area.  The Surf Inn was in an awesome location, close to the heart of Huntington there is a good little surf break out from the hotel (less crowded than the pier).  Julie and James were brilliant from the moment we arrived, all the way through to when we left.  We had the end room (furthest from the road) it was large, quiet and comfortable, had everything we needed.  Definitely recommend this place.

Summary Heading: Stay, stay stay at this hotel!!!
Summary: This was my second stay at the hotel in less than a year. I simply had to return. The rooms are very chic and spotlessly clean. The managers treat everyone like family. The location is perfect. The Inn is right beside the best beach in the area and they have an elevated deck from which you can enjoy a peaceful cup of coffee or evening cocktail while gazing at the sea. If you like an active vacation there is plenty to do. The pier is a "must"! I saw a pod of dolphin during an early morning stroll. When you get hungry there are loads of restaurants along Main St. to choose from. Oh yeah, and the managers will give you discount coupons to use during your stay. ........I'll be going back in September. You can find me on the deck with a smile on my face!!!

Summary Heading: Great location~horrible if you're trying to get some sleep!
Summary: The proximity to the Pier, shopping and the ocean were all fantastic!  There was a small refrigerator in the room and a BBQ available for use if we wanted to put something on the grill.  Now the bad news~the window coverings were mini-blinds that allowed the VERY BRIGHT lights from the hotel to stream in our window which meant it looked like it was broad daylight when in fact, it was the middle of the night!.  So, 3 of the 4 of us got next to no sleep!  The other contributing factor to the loss of sleep was the nightlife was loud, loud, loud!  Loud engines from motorcycles and cars were non-stop as were the partiers....so sad to say we won't stay here again.

Great location. Friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are clean, comfortable and roomy. I felt safe and well taken care of. I was treated like family. Close to beach, shops and restaurants.  The inn is right by the highway so the vehicles could be heard at night but that is to be expected in such a busy area.

Summary Heading: Stay at the Huntington Surf Inn!
Summary: Stay at the Huntington Surf Inn!  We are thrilled we chose to stay here April 21-23, 2011. The rooms were CLEAN and comfortable, Julie and James couldn't be sweeter and the location can't be beat! Everything is within in walking distance, it's great! We highly recommend this Inn for your stay at Hungtington Beach. There is a little deck from which you can see the ocean and relax on if you are taking a break during the day or night.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, with great staff.
Summary: If you are looking for a cost effective place to stay within walking distance of the restaurants, bars and beaches then the Surf Inn is excellent. Julie & James are really nice people and nothing is too much trouble. Mr Chris Gurr London England

Summary Heading: Fantastic location and great value along with superb service
Summary: A nice gem of an inn in an unbeatable location. I was on the beach within a few minutes of my arrival. Room 9 was fantastic, with a great view. Also, the materials in this room were ecologically sustainable. The "green" nature of the room was inspiring and the integration of the ecological concepts into the room decor by the HGTV Designer Antonio Ballatore was innovative. Service was great. My room was always clean and airy. Highly recommended!

The hotel has a perfect location to surf and visit Huntington Beach. The rooms decoration are pretty cool. The staff is very friendly and polite The only one thing to improve the service  is to clean the room everyday, or at least each 2 days.

This hotel is fabulous! Each room is different. Very hip. We stayed in room 7 with the blue-sea painted walls and beautiful over sized paintings. But we could have stayed in the Jimi Hendrix room, or the black room with a crystal chandelier!  The beds and linens were super comfy. The european style bathroom has a huge shower and the towels are not skimpy. The managers were extremely friendly and gave us some pointers for local restaurants and attractions. (my favorite attraction was the roof top deck over looking the Pacific, perfect !) I cannot say enough about this place. I am well traveled and have seen plenty of hotel rooms that cannot compare. I can't wait to go back!

My brother and I traveled to Southern California to surf, we stayed at a few places up and down the coast and this was by far my favorite place.  I had stayed at the best western next door a few years back, however this trip the woman at the front desk couldn't have been less helpful or acted less enthused for my business.  I went accross the street and it was the complete opposite.  Recently under new management and the couple that runs the place couldn't have been more kind to us.  Everything inside and outside the room was clean, the bed was comfy, and the room was well maintained.  The location and the staff is well worth the price (which is cheaper then their next door neighbor), so I would highly recommend the Surf's Inn.  I will be going back again.
